## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1083">Accordion menüsü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1083">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1084">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1085">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1086">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde bir accordion menüsü oluşturur ve sağlanan üst pencere öğesine accordion menüsünü iliştirer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1086">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1087">Bir accordion menüsü, genişletme/daraltma menü görüntüleme pencere öğesidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1087">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1088">Alt menü öğeleri olarak tüm pencere öğesi türlerini kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1088">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1089">Accordion menüleri iç içe geçmiş olabilir, yani çeşitli menü derinliği düzeyleri oluşturulabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1089">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1090">Bir menü öğesi pencere öğesine alt öğe eklemek için, üst menü öğesi GX_MENU pencere öğesi olarak kullanılması önerilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1090">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1091">Tek düzeyli bir anlaşma menüsü oluşturmaya yardımcı olacak ipuçları:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1091">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1092">Bir accordion menüsü oluşturun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1092">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1093">Kondisyon GX_MENU pencere öğeleri ekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1093">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1094">Üst öğe türü üst öğeye GX_MENU pencere öğeleri ekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1094">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1095">Alt öğe türü herhangi bir GUIX pencere öğesi türü olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1095">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1096">Çok düzeyli uyum menüsü oluşturmaya yardımcı olacak ipuçları:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1096">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1097">Bir accordion menüsü oluşturun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1097">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1098">Kondisyon GX_MENU pencere öğeleri ekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1098">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1099">Tür GX_ACCORDION_MENU üst öğeye GX_MENU pencere öğesi ekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1099">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1100">Menü öğelerini tek GX_ACCORDION_MENU menü oluşturmada açıklandığı gibi üst öğe türüne ekleyebilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1100">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1117">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1117">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1129">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1129">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1130">Akordeon çizme menüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1130">Draw accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1131">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1131">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1132">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1133">Bu hizmet belirtilen anlaşma menüsünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1133">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1134">Bu hizmet normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel kondisyon menüsü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerinin uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1134">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1135">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1135">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1137">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1138">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1138">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1139">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1140">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1140">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1141">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1141">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom accordion menu draw function */

VOID my_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion)
{
    /* Call default accordion menu draw. */
    gx_accordion_menu_draw(accordion);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1153">İşlem anlaşma menüsü olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1153">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1154">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1154">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_event_process(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1155">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1155">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1156">Bu hizmet, belirtilen anlaşma menüsü için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1156">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1157">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel anlaşma menüsü olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1157">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1158">Bu hizmet, bir GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN GX_EVENT_PEN_UP genişletmek/daraltmak için olayları işleme ve bu olayları işleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1158">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1159">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1160">**accordion** Accordion menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1160">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1161">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1161">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1162">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1162">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı Accordion Menü olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1166">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1167">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1168">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1168">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1179">gx_accordion_menu_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1179">gx_accordion_menu_position</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1180">Menü öğelerini Konumlandır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1180">Position menu items</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1181">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1181">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_position(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1182">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1182">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1183">Bu hizmet, Accordion menüsünün Menü öğelerini konumlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1183">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1184">Bu işlev, Accordion menüsü görünür olduğunda normalde dahili olarak çağırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1184">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1185">Bir Accordion menüsüne/öğeden öğe eklemek/kaldırmak veya alt öğenin genişletme stillerini değiştirmek istiyorsanız, alt öğelerin yeniden konumlandırılabilmesi için bu işlev çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1185">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1186">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1186">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1187">**Accordion** Accordion Menu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1187">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1188">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1188">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1189">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı anlaşma menü konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1189">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1190">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1190">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1191">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1191">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1192">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1192">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1193">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1193">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1194">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1194">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position menu items in the accordion menu “my_accordion” */
status = gx_accordion_menu_position (&my_accordion);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the accordion menu
“my_accordion” are positioned. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1206">Animasyon denetleyicisine tuval belleği sağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1206">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1207">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1207">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1208">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1208">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1209">Bu hizmet, animasyon dizisini uygulamak için kullanılan bir animasyon denetleyicisine bellek tuvali sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1209">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1210">Bu sağlanan tuval, animasyon hedef pencere öğelerini tutacak kadar büyük olmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1210">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1211">Bir animasyon tuvali tanımlandığı zaman, hedef pencere öğesi bu animasyon tuvale bir kez çizilir ve tuval kaydırma ve/veya tuval alfa değeri değiştirerek ekran slaytı veya soldurma etkisi ilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1211">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1212">Birden çok grafik katmanı için donanım desteği sağlanıyorsa, bir donanım grafik  katmanına bağlı bir animasyon tuvali tanımlamak slayt ve soluk animasyonların performansını önemli ölçüde geliştirebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1212">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1213">Animasyon Yöneticisi bir animasyon tuvalinin, renk derinliğinde 16 BPP bir daha az çalışıyorsa soluklaştırma ve soluklaştırma animasyon türlerini yürütmesini gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1213">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1214">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1215">**animasyon** Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1215">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1216">**tuval** Çeviri animasyonunu uygulamak için kullanılan bellek tuvali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1216">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1217">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1217">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1218">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) animasyon tuvali başarıyla tanımlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1218">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) geçersiz animasyon durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) belirtilen bellek bloğu tuvali oluşturmak için yeterince büyük değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1222">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1222">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1223">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1223">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1224">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1224">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1233">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1233">gx_animation_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1234">Animasyon denetleyicisi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1234">Create an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1235">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1235">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_create(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1236">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1236">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1237">Bu hizmet bir animasyon denetleyicisi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1237">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1238">Denetleyici boşta durumuna başlatılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1238">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1239">Bir animasyon BOŞTA durumda olmadığı sürece başlatamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1239">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1240">Denetim GX_ANIMATION işaretçisi gx_system_animation_get() kullanılarak elde edilir veya statik olarak tanımlanmış bir denetim bloğu olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1240">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1241">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1242">**animasyon** Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1242">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1243">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Animasyon denetleyicisi başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Denetim bloğu zaten başlatıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1247">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1248">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1249">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1260">gx_animation_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1260">gx_animation_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1261">Bir veya birden çok animasyon denetleyicisini silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1261">Delete one or multiple animation controllers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1262">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_delete(GX_ANIMATION *animation, GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1263">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1264">Bu hizmet, giriş animasyon işaretçisi ayarlanırsa bir animasyon dizisini siler, aksi takdirde tüm animasyonlar belirtilen üst pencere öğesine ait olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1264">This service deletes an animation sequence if the input animation pointer is set, otherwise, deletes all the animations belong to the specified parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1265">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1266">**animasyon** Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1266">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1267">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1267">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1268">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) animasyon denetleyicileri başarıyla silindi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted animation controller(s)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1271">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1272">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1273">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1273">Example</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1274">Bir animasyonu silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1274">Delete One Animation</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (animation)
{
    /* Create an animation.  */
    gx_animation_create(animation);

    /* Delete an animation.  */
    status = gx_animation_delete(animation, GX_NULL);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation controller was successfully deleted and returned back to system animation pool. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1275">Birden çok animasyonu silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1275">Delete Multiple Animations</span></span>
```C

status = gx_animation_delete(GX_NULL, parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all the animations belong to the parent were successfully deleted. */

```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1289">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1290">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin varsayılan olay işlemi işlevinden ekran sürükleme animasyon kanca yordamını kaldırır ve animasyon sırasını durduruyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1290">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1291">Ekran sürükleme animasyonu kanca yordamı, bir ekran sürükleme animasyonu için olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1291">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1294">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1294">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1295">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1295">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1296">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1296">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1299">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1299">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1301">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1301">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1312">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1312">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1313">Ekran sürükleme animasyon kancası etkinleştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1313">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1314">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1315">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1316">Bu hizmet, dahili olarak tanımlanan ekran sürükleme animasyonu olay süreci işlevini bir pencere öğesi varsayılan olay süreci işlevinin kanca yordamı olarak ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1316">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1317">Ekran sürükleme animasyonu olay işlem işlevi bir ekran sürükleme animasyonu için olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1317">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1318">Ekran Sürükle kanca yordamı, hedef pencere öğesine gönderilen kalem girişi olayları için varsayılan işleyici olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1318">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1319">Özgün pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevi, ekran sürükleme girişi olay türlerini denetledikten sonra bir zincirleme olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1319">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1320">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1321">**animasyon** Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1321">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1322">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1322">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1323">**bilgi** Animasyon bilgileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1323">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1324">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1326">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) geçersiz animasyon durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1326">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1327">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1327">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1328">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1328">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1329">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) slayt ekran listesi sağlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1329">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1330">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1331">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1331">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1332">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1332">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1367">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1367">gx_animation_start</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1369">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1369">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1370">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1370">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1371">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir animasyon örneği ve yeni bir animasyon parametreleri kümesi kullanan bir animasyon sırası başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1371">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1372">Bu işlev parametrelerin yerel bir kopyasını oluşturur, yani parametre yapısının statik olarak tanımlanması gerekmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1372">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1373">GX_ANIMATION denetim yapısı uygulama tarafından statik olarak tanımlanabilir veya gx_system_animation_get () API 'SI kullanılarak elde edilebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1373">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1374">GX_ANIMATION_INFO yapısı yürütülecek animasyonun parametrelerini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1374">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1375">Bu yapının ve her alanın anlamını açıklayan bir açıklama için, bu kılavuzun Bölüm 3 ' teki Gux animasyon bileşeni bölümüne bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1375">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1376">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1377">**animasyon** Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1377">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1378">**params** Parametre yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1378">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1379">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1381">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz parametre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1381">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1382">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1382">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1383">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz animasyon hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1383">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1384">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) geçersiz animasyon durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1384">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1385">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) geçersiz animasyon tuvali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1385">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1386">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1387">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1387">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1388">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1398">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1398">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1399">Etkin süreölçer odaklı animasyonu durdurma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1399">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_stop(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1402">Daha önce başlatılan bir animasyonu durdurun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1402">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1403">Animasyon denetim bloğu işaretçisi, gx_system_animation_get kullanılarak ayrılmışsa, uygulama denetim bloğunun yeniden kullanabilir veya gx_system_animation_free() kullanarak sistem havuzuna geri gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1403">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1409">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Geçersiz denetleyici durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1409">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1422">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1422">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1423">İkili kaynak verilerinde mevcut dillerin sayısını döndür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1423">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1424">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1425">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1426">Bu hizmet, ikili verilerde bulunan dillerin sayısını döndürmek için bir ikili kaynak veri üst bilgisini ayrıştırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1426">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1427">Bu, kullanıcının bir dil seçiminden seçim yapmasına izin veren kullanıcı için bir seçim listesi görüntülemesi gereken uygulamalar için yararlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1427">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1428">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1428">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1429">**root_address** Bellekteki ikili kaynak verilerinin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1429">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1430">**return_count** Döndürülen dil sayısını depolayacak konum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1430">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1431">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1431">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1433">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) geçersiz ikili kaynak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1433">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1435">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1435">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1436">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1436">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1437">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1437">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1438">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1438">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1439">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1439">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1440">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1440">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1441">Dil tablosu bilgilerini yükle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1441">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1442">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1442">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1443">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1443">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1444">Bu hizmet, bir dizi GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER yapıyı doldurmak için bir ikili kaynak veri blobu ayrıştırır ve bu, ikili verilerde bulunan her dilin dil adlarının ve dize tablo boyutunun uygulamasını bilgilendirmenizi sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1444">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1445">Uygulama, ikili verilerdeki dillerin sayısını öğrenmek için önce gx_binres_language_count_get () öğesini çağırmalıdır ve bu işlev noktalarına put_info işaretçisinin language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER yapıları dizisine geçtiğini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1445">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1446">Bu hizmet, çalışma zamanında bir ikili kaynak veri öbeğinin içeriğini öğrenmek için uygulama tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1446">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1447">GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER yapısı şu şekilde tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1447">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1448">magic_number  alanı, ikili kaynak veri biçiminin iç doğrulaması için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1448">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1449">Header_index  alanı, dillerin ikili verilerde tanımlandığı sırayı gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1449">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1450">Header_name  alanı dil adını içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1450">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1451">Header_data_size  alanı, dil dizesi tablosu veri boyutunu içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1451">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1452">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1453">**root_address** Bellekte ikili kaynak verileri adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1453">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1454">**put_info** Veri yapılarının GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1454">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1455">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1457">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Geçersiz ikili kaynak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1457">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1458">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1458">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1459">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1460">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1461">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1461">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER language_info[4];

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_info_load(root_address,
    language_info);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1462">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1462">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1464">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1464">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1465">Dil tablosu kaynağını yükleme (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1465">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1466">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1467">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1468">Bu kullanım dışı API, uygulamaların daha eski (sürüm 5.6 öncesi) ikili kaynak veri dosyalarından dize tablosu verilerini yüklemesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1468">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1469">Yeni uygulamalarda gx_binres_language_table_load_ext() gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1469">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1470">Bu hizmet tablo kaynaklarının işaretçilerini içeren bir dil tablosu yapısı oluşturulur, oluşturulan veri yapıları kaynak verilerini "yerinde" gösterir ve kaynak verilerini kopyalamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1470">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1471">Kaynak verileri genel erişimli bir bellek konuma yerleştiril olmalı ve bu bellek konumunun temel adresi bu API'ye geçirilse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1471">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1472">Bu hizmet, dil tablosu yapısını tutmak için yeterli boyutta bir çalışma zamanı ayrılmış bellek bloğu gerektirir ve bu nedenle bu hizmet istenmeden önce gx_system_memory_allocator_set API'si bir kez çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1472">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1490">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1490">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1491">Bu hizmet, tablo kaynaklarına işaretçiler içeren bir dil tablosu yapısı oluşturur, oluşturulan veri yapıları "yerinde" kaynak verilerine işaret ediyor, kaynak verileri kopyalamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1491">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1492">Kaynak verileri bir genel erişim belleği konumuna yerleştirilmelidir ve bu bellek konumunun taban adresi bu API 'ye geçirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1492">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1493">Bu hizmet, dil tablosu yapısını tutmak için boyutu yeterli olan bir çalışma zamanına ayrılan bellek bloğunu gerektirir ve bu nedenle, bu hizmet istenene kadar gx_system_memory_allocator_set API 'sinin çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1493">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1494">Döndürülen dil tablosu, kaynak veri belleğindeki dize kaynaklarına işaretçiler içeren her dize tablosu, bir veya daha fazla dize tablosunu tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1494">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1497">**_language_table döndürüldü** Yüklü dil tablosu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1497">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1499">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1499">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1500">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) geçersiz ikili kaynak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1500">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1501">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1501">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1502">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ya da boş işlev tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1502">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1503">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1503">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    GX_UBYTE *root_address,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1511">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1512">Bu hizmet, istenen GX_THEME için kaynak tablolarının işaretçilerini içeren bir temel yapı oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1512">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1513">Oluşturulan veri yapıları kaynak verilerini "yerinde" gösterir, kaynak verilerini kopyalamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1513">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1514">Bu nedenle, kaynak verileri genel erişimli bir bellek konumunun içine yerleştiril olmalı ve bu bellek konumunun temel adresi bu API'ye geçirilse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1514">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1515">Bu hizmet, tema tablosu yapısını tutmak için yeterli boyutta bir çalışma zamanı ayrılmış bellek bloğu gerektirir ve bu nedenle gx_system_memory_allocator_set api'si bu hizmet istenmeden önce bir kez çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1515">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1517">**root_address** Bellekte ikili kaynak verileri adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1517">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1518">**theme_id** Temanın tanımlayıcısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1518">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1519">**returned_theme** Yüklenen temanın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1519">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1520">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1522">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Geçersiz ikili kaynak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1522">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1524">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz tema kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1524">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1525">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ya da boş işlev tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1525">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1531">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1531">gx_brush_default</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1550">Bu hizmet, belirtilen çizgi rengine, Fill rengine ve stile sahip bir fırça tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1550">This service defines a brush with the specified line color, fill color and style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1551">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1553">**line_color** Fırça hattının rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1553">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1554">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1554">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1555">Uygulamanın de özel renkler ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1555">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1556">**fill_color** Fırça dolgusunun rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1556">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1557">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1557">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1558">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1558">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1559">**style (stil)** Fırça stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1559">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1560">**Ek D,** desteklenen fırça stillerini açıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1560">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1561">Fırça stilleri bitwise OR işlemi kullanılarak tek bir değişkende bir araya ayarlanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1561">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı fırça tanımı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1564">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz fırça işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1564">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1570">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1570">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1571">Düğme arka planını çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1571">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1572">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1572">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1573">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1573">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1574">Bu hizmet düğme arka planını çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1574">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1575">Bu işlev normalde gx_button_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazmaya yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1575">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1576">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1577">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1577">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1578">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1578">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1579">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1579">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1580">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1580">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1581">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1581">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1582">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1582">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1597">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1597">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1598">Oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1598">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1599">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1599">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1600">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1600">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1601">Bu hizmet, belirtilen bir düğme oluşturur ve düğmeyi sağlanan üst pencere öğesiyle ilişkilendirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1601">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1602">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1602">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1603">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1603">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1604">**ad** Düğmenin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1604">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1605">**üst öğe** Düğmenin üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1605">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1606">**Stil** Düğme stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1606">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1607">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1607">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1608">**button_id** Düğmenin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1608">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1609">**Boyut** Düğmenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1609">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1610">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1610">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1611">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı düğme oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1611">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1612">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1612">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1613">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1613">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1614">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1614">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1615">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1615">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1616">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1616">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1617">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1617">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1618">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1618">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1633">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1633">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1634">Seçimi kaldır düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1634">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1635">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1635">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1636">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1636">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1637">Bu hizmet, belirtilen düğmenin seçimini kaldırıyor ve düğme stillerine bağlı olarak bir sinyal olayı oluştur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1637">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1638">Düğme stili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1638">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1639">Sinyalinin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1639">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1640">Hiçbiri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1640">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1641">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1641">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1642">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1642">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1643">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1643">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1644">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1644">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1645">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1645">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1646">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1646">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1647">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1647">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1648">**gen_event** GX_TRUE, düğme, düğme stiline bağlı olarak bir GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT veya GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET olayı oluşturacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1648">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1649">GX_FALSE, düğme normalde yapabilse bile daha yüksek düzey bir olay oluşturmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1649">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1650">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı düğme seçimi kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
