## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1672">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1672">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1673">Çiz düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1673">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1674">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1675">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1676">Bu hizmet belirtilen düğmeyi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1676">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1677">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel düğme pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerinin uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1677">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1678">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1678">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1679">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1679">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1680">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1681">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1681">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1682">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1682">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1683">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1683">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1684">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1684">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1699">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1699">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1700">İşlem düğmesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1700">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1701">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1702">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1703">Bu hizmet, belirtilen düğme için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1703">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1704">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1705">**düğme** Düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1705">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1706">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1706">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1707">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı düğme olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1711">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1712">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1713">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1766">Tuval için alfa-blend değerini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1766">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1767">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1767">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1768">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1769">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval için alfa karışımı değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1769">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1770">Tuval alfa değerleri 0 (saydam) ile 255 (tamamen opak) arasında olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1770">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1771">Katman tuvallerini karıştırmak için donanım grafik katmanı desteği veya bileşik tuval oluşturma yoluyla yazılım desteği gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1771">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1772">Tuval karıştırma için donanım desteği, tuval alfa değerini ayarlamadan önce gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API'si çağrılarak etkinleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1772">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1773">Tuval bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlı olduğunda, gx_canvas_alpha_set() API'sini çağırmak donanım grafik katmanı karıştırma hizmetlerini doğrudan çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1773">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1774">Uygulama, tuval karıştırma için yazılım desteğini kullanmak için GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE stiline sahip bir tuval oluşturmalı ve bu stilde diğer tüm yönetilen tuvaller son görüntüden önce bileşik haline gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1774">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1775">Tuval karıştırmaya yönelik yazılım desteği yalnızca 16 bpp veya daha yüksek renk derinliğine sahip bir görüntü sürücüsü ile çalıştırıla birlikte sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1775">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1776">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1777">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1777">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1778">**alfa** Alfa karışımı değeri, 0 (saydam) ile 255 (opak) arasında bir aralıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1778">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1779">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1779">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı alfa karışımı değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1784">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1785">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1786">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1786">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1797">Yay çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1797">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1798">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1798">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1799">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1800">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırçayı kullanarak tuvalde bir daire yay çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1800">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1801">Daire yay tuvalde geçersiz bölge olarak kırpıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1801">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1802">Bu hizmet için GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT tanımlanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1802">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1803">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1804">daire yay merkezinin **xcenter** x konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1804">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1805">**yılmerkez** y-daire yay merkezinin konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1805">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1806">Daire yaya **r** yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1806">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1807">**start_angle** Daire yay başlangıç açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1807">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1808">**end_angle** Daire yay bitiş açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1808">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1809">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1810">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yay çizimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1810">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1814">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1815">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1815">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1816">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1816">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1829">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1829">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1830">Tuval piksellerini taşıma bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1830">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1832">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1833">Bu hizmet, tuval pikseli verilerini belirtilen yönde taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1833">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1834">Bu hizmet, hızlı kaydırma gerçekleştirmek için GUIX tarafından dahili olarak kullanılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1834">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1835">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1836">**block (blok)** Taşın edecek alan koordinatları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1836">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1837">**x_shift** x ekseninde kaydırmak için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1837">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1838">**y_shift** Y ekseninde kaydırmak için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1838">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1839">**kirli** Blok taşıma başarılı olursa, bu işlev kaynak dikdörtgenin bu parametrede arayan için hala kirli olan bölümünü döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1839">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1840">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1840">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1841">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı blok taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1841">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1842">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) başarısız blok taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1842">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1845">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1845">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1846">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1846">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1847">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1847">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1861">Daire çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1861">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1862">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1862">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1891">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1891">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1892">Tuval oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1892">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1893">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1895">Bu hizmet, belirtilen özelliklerle ve ilişkili bellekle tuvalde oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1895">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1896">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1897">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1897">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1898">**ad** Tuval için mantıksal ad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1898">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1899">**görüntüleme** Önceden oluşturulmuş görüntü işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1899">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1900">**tür** Canvau tuval türlerinin türü şunları içerir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1900">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Ekran çizimini devre dışı bırakmak için kullanılan bir bellek tuvali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Bileşik yapı sürecinin bir parçası olarak veya tek tuvalli mimarilere yönelik arabellek geçiş işleminin bir parçası olarak etkin ekranı otomatik olarak temizlenen bir tuval.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Bu bayrak tuval çizim içeriğini kaybetmeden bir tuvali açmak ve kapatmak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Gelecekte kullanılmak üzere ayrılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Bu bayrak, birden çok yönetilen ve bileşik tuvalde bileşik bir sistem olan birden çok tuval sistemi yapılandırırken uygulama tarafından kullanılır ve bileşik donanım çerçeve arabelleğine dayalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1906">**Genişlik** Piksel cinsinden genişlik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1906">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1907">**Yükseklik** Piksel cinsinden yükseklik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1907">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1908">**memory_area** Tuval için bellek alanı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1908">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1909">Bu değer,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1909">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1910">Tuval oluşturma sırasında **GX_NULL**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1910">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1911">**ve** daha sonra gx_canvas_memory_define kullanılarak başlatıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1911">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1912">**memory_size** Tuval oluşturulduktan sonra tuval belleği tanımlıysa, bayt cinsinden bellek alanının boyutu veya 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1912">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1913">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı tuval oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Geçersiz tuval denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Geçersiz tuval türü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1920">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1920">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1921">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1921">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1922">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1922">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1951">Tuval çizimini tamamen doldurun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1951">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1952">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1954">Bu hizmet, Gux 'in belirtilen tuvalde uygulama çiziminin tamamlandığını bilmesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1954">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1955">Uygulama bu hizmeti kullanarak tuvalde hemen çizim yapılmasını zorlayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1955">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1956">Bu, tuvali görünür çerçeve arabelleğine boşaltır ve/veya sistem belleği mimarisine bağlı olarak bir hata atma geçiş işlemi tetikler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1956">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1957">Bu hizmet yalnızca uygulama tarafından, gx_canvas_drawing_initiate () ile başlatılan bir çizim dizisinin kapatılmasını sağlamak için çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1957">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1958">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1959">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1959">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1960">**Temizleme** **_GX_TRUE_**, tuval değişiklikleri ekranda temizlenir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1960">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1961">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çizim tamamlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1965">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1975">Tuval çizimi başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1975">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1976">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1978">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuvalde çizimini başlatıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1978">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1979">Bu hizmet, tuvalin güncelleştirilmiş olması gerekirken GUIX tarafından otomatik olarak gerçekleştirilen ertelenen çizim işlemi kapsamında dahili olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1979">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1980">Ancak uygulamanın GUIX ertelenmiş çizim algoritmasını atlayarak ve önce gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, ardından istenen çizim işlevlerini çağırarak ve ardından gx_canvas_drawing_complete() çağırarak tuval üzerinde anında ve doğrudan çizim gerçekleştirmesine izin verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1980">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1981">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1982">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1982">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1983">**Who (Kim)** Çağıranın pencere öğesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1983">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1984">Bu parametre, çizim kırpmayı başlatmak ve sonraki çizim işlemlerine yönelik parametreleri görüntülemek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1984">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1985">**dirty_area** Çizilen alan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1985">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1986">Bu parametre, çağıranın tüm çizim işlemlerinin kırpılmış olarak istediği alanı belirtmek için çağıranı tarafından geçirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1986">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1987">Bu genellikle daha önce kirli olarak işaretlenen alandır, ancak çağıranın kırpma alanını genişletmesi veya daraltması ücretsizdir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1987">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1988">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1988">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çizim başlatan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) En fazla iç içe geçme sayısını aşma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Çağıran için görünüm yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1995">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-1996">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-1997">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-1997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2005">Elips çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2005">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2006">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2008">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırçayı kullanarak tuvalde bir elips çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2008">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2009">Elips tuval için geçersiz bölgeye kırpıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2009">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2010">Bu hizmet için GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT tanımlanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2010">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2011">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2011">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2012">Elips merkezinin **xcenter** x-cozı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2012">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2013">Elips merkezinin **Orta ortası**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2013">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2014">yarı birincil **eksenin uzunluğu**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2014">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2015">**b** yarı küçük eksenin uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2015">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2016">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2016">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı daire çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2021">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2021">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2022">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2022">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2023">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2023">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2037">Tuvali donanım grafik katmanına bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2037">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2038">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2039">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2040">Bu hizmet, GUIX çizim tuvalini donanım grafik katmanına bağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2040">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2041">Bu hizmet yalnızca birden çok donanım grafik katmanını destekleyen donanım cihazları için gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2041">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2042">Bir tuvalin bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlaması, gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide()), gx_canvas_alpha_set() ve gx_canvas_offset_set() API'leri doğrudan donanım görüntüleme sürücü hizmetleri tarafından uygulanmasıyla sonuç verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2042">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2043">Donanım görüntüleme sürücüsü birden çok grafik katmanını desteklemezse, bu hizmet birden çok grafik katmanını GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2043">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2044">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2045">**Donanımda** uygulanacak tuval tuvali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2045">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2046">**Katman** donanımı grafik katmanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2046">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2047">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1d) görüntüleme katmanı hizmeti tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) geçersiz işaretçiler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) desteklenmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2054">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2054">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2055">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2055">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2056">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2056">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

```C

    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2120">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2121">Bu hizmet, tuval oluşturulduktan sonra tuval bellek adresini atamak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2121">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2122">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2122">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2123">**tuval** Daha önce oluşturulmuş tuval işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2123">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2124">**bellek** Tuval bellek adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2124">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2125">**memsize** Bayt cinsinden tuval bellek bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2125">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2130">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2130">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

```C
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2139">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2140">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval için fare bilgilerini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2140">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2141">Bu hizmetin GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2141">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2142">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2143">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2143">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2144">**info (bilgi)** Fare imleci bilgileri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2144">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2145">**Ek I,** bu yapıya GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2145">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2146">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Fare bilgi kümesi başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2150">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2151">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2152">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2152">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2196">Tuval atama x,y görüntü uzaklığı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2196">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2197">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2198">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2199">Bu hizmet, belirtilen tuval için bir x,y görüntüleme uzaklığı atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2199">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2200">Bu, tuvalin görünür çerçeve arabelleğinde birleşik olduğu konumu kontrol eder ve genellikle tuval fiziksel ekrandan küçük olduğunda kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2200">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2201">Tuval, gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API'si kullanılarak bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlanmışsa, gx_canvas_offset_set doğrudan donanım desteği kullanılarak uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2201">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2202">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2203">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2203">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2204">**x** Uzaklığın X koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2204">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2205">**Uzaklığın y** Y koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2205">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2206">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kaydırma ataması başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2211">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2212">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2212">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2213">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2227">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamı fırçasını kullanarak tuvalde bir pasta çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2227">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2228">Pasta tuval için geçersiz bölgeye kırpıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2228">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2229">Bu hizmet, GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT yapılandırma seçeneğinin tanımlanmasını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2229">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2230">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2231">pasta merkezinin **xcenter** x konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2231">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2232">**yılmerkez** y-pasta merkezinin konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2232">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2233">Pastanın **r** yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2233">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2234">**start_angle** Pastanın başlangıç açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2234">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2235">**end_angle** Pastanın bitiş açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2235">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2236">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2236">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yay çekme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2241">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2241">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2243">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2243">Example</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2259">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2260">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlam fırçalarının çizgi rengini kullanarak tuvalde bir piksel çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2260">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2261">Yapılandırma seçeneği GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT tanımlanmışsa, pikseli, tersi şekilde Blend, piksel tamamen opak olarak çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2261">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2262">**noktanın** x, y konumunu çizmek için</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2262">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2263">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pixelmap çizimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2267">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2268">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2269">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

```C
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2277">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2277">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2278">Bu hizmet, bir pixelmap 'i tuval arka planıyla karıştırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2278">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2279">Karıştırma oranı çağıran tarafından belirtilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2279">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2280">Alfa değeri 0 (tamamen saydam) ile 255 (tamamen opak) arasında değişebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2280">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2281">Pixelmap Ayrıca, gelen karıştırma değeriyle birleştirilmiş bir iç alfa kanalını da içerebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2281">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2282">Bu hizmet yalnızca 16 BPP renk derinliği ve üzeri sürümlerde çalışan ekran sürücüleri tarafından desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2282">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2284">**x_start** Pixelmap 'in x-Position ' i başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2284">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2285">**y_end** Pixelmap 'in y konumu başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2285">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2293">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2294">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2342">Döndürülmüş piksel haritasını çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2342">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2343">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2343">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2344">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2345">Bu hizmet, piksel haritasını belirtilen açıda döndürerek döndürme işlemi gerçekleştirilerek piksel haritasını doğrudan tuvale işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2345">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2346">Bu hizmet, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate doğrudan tuval belleğine işlenecek ve döndürülen piksel haritası çağrıyı yapana döndürülemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2346">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2347">Bu hizmetin tek bir gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate, döndürülmüş piksel haritasını tutmak için ek bellek gerektiremez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2347">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2348">Dezavantajı, piksel haritası her çizilirken döndürme kodunun yürütül olmasıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2348">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2349">Kırpma ve görünümport doğrulaması, döndürülmüş piksel haritasının işlanması sırasında uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2349">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2350">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2351">**x_position** Piksel haritasının x konumunu başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2351">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2352">**y_position** Piksel haritasının y konumunu başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2352">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2353">**piksel haritası** Piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2353">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2453">Bu API, tercih veya kullanımdan gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext() kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2453">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2454">Yine de desteklene rağmen, yeni uygulamalar bu API'yi kullanmalı ve bunun yerine gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext() kullanmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2454">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2455">Bu hizmet tuvale metin çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2455">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2456">Metin, istenen orta nokta hakkında döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2456">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2457">Metni işlemek için geçerli çizim bağlamı yazı tipi ve çizim bağlam çizgisi rengi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2457">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2458">Bu hizmet, metin gx_utility_string_to_alphamap yalnızca alfa değeri içeren geçici bir 8bpp piksel haritasına işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap işlevini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2458">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2459">Daha sonra hizmet, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate işlevini kullanarak alfa haritayı gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2459">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2460">Tuvale son alfa haritası işlenen bu hizmet geçici alfa haritasını ve ilişkili belleği serbest bıraktırıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2460">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2461">Döndürülmüş metni işlemek için geçici bir alfa harita gerektiğinden, uygulamanın döndürülmüş metin çizmeye çalışmadan önce gx_system_memory_allocator api'sini gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API'sini çağırarak yapılandırması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2461">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2462">Bu hizmet yalnızca döndürülmüş metni "bir kez" işlemek için kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2462">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2463">Aynı metin dizesi farklı konumlarda veya farklı döndürme açıları için birden çok kez çizilecekse, metin alfa haritasını bir kez oluşturmak için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() yardımcı program işlevini kullanmak ve ardından elde edilen alfa haritayı tekrar tekrar döndürmek için gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate birden çok kez kullanmak daha verimlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2463">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2466">**xCenter** Metnin döndürülecek olduğu merkezi positon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2466">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2468">**açı** İstenen metin döndürme açısı (derece).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2468">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) yeterli kullanılabilir bellek yok veya gx_system_memory_allocator atanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2474">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2474">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2477">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```
