## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2485">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2485">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2486">Bir orta nokta ile döndürülen metin çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2486">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2487">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2487">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2488">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2489">Bu hizmet, tuvale metin çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2489">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2490">Metin, istenen merkez noktası hakkında döndürülmüş olarak çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2490">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2491">Metni işlemek için geçerli çizim bağlamı yazı tipi ve çizim bağlam çizgisi rengi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2491">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2492">Bu hizmet, metin dizesini yalnızca alfa değeri içeren geçici bir 8bpp pixelmap 'e işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap işlevini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2492">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2493">Daha sonra hizmet, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate işlevini kullanarak harflerden eşlemeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2493">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2494">Tuvale son alfa haritası işlenen bu hizmet geçici alfa haritasını ve ilişkili belleği serbest bıraktırıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2494">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2495">Döndürülmüş metni işlemek için geçici bir alfa harita gerektiğinden, uygulamanın döndürülmüş metin çizmeye çalışmadan önce gx_system_memory_allocator ***API'sini gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** api'si tarafından yapılandırması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2495">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2496">Bu hizmet yalnızca döndürülmüş metni "bir kez" işlemek için kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2496">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2497">Aynı metin dizesi farklı konumlarda veya farklı döndürme açıları için birden çok kez çizilecekse, metin alfa haritasını bir kez oluşturmak için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() yardımcı program işlevini kullanmak ve ardından elde edilen alfa haritayı tekrar tekrar döndürmek için gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate birden çok kez kullanmak daha verimlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2497">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2498">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2498">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2499">**metin** Çizilecek metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2499">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2500">**xCenter** Metnin döndürülecek olduğu merkezi positon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2500">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2501">**yCenter** Döndürülecek metnin orta konumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2501">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2502">**açı** İstenen metin döndürme açısı (derece).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2502">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2503">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2503">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2504">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı metin işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2504">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2506">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2506">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Geçersiz çizim bağlamı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Yetersiz bellek gx_system_memory_allocator veya bellek atanmamış.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2509">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2509">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2510">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2511">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2512">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2512">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2544">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2544">gx_canvas_show</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2547">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2548">Bu hizmet tuvali görünür hale gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2548">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2549">Tuval daha önce gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API'si kullanılarak bir donanım grafik katmanına bağlanmışsa, gx_canvas_show() hizmeti doğrudan donanım desteği kullanılarak uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2549">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2550">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2550">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2551">**tuval** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2551">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2552">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Geçersiz tuval</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2557">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2557">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2569">Metin çizme (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2569">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2570">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2571">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2572">Bu hizmet, tuvalde metin çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2572">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2573">Bu API hala desteklenirken kullanım dışıdır ve yeni uygulamalar bunun yerine gx_canvas_text_draw_ext () kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2573">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2574">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2575">**x_start** Metin için x koordinatı başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2575">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2576">**y_start** Metin için y koordinatı başlatılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2576">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2577">**dize** Çizilecek dize işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2577">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2578">**uzunluk** Length >= 0 ise, sıfıra çizilen karakter sayısını sınırlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2578">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2579">Length 0 <, NULL Sonlandırıcı çizilene kadar dizenin tamamı çizilmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2579">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2580">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2580">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı metin çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2582">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) metin çizme başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2582">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) açık çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2587">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2588">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2589">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2589">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2665">Bu hizmet belirtilen onay kutusunu çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2665">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2666">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel onay kutusu pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2666">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2667">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2667">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2668">**onay kutusu** Onay kutusu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2668">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2669">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2670">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2670">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2671">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2671">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2672">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2672">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2673">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2673">Example</span></span>

```C

{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2679">İşlem onay kutusu olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2679">Process checkbox event</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2681">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2682">Bu hizmet, belirtilen onay kutusu için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2682">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2683">Bu hizmet, özel onay kutusu olay işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2683">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2684">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2684">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2685">**onay kutusu** CheckBox denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2685">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2686">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2686">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2687">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı onay kutusu olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2692">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2693">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2693">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2694">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2788">Bu hizmet, döngüsel ölçer pencere öğesi için animasyon adımlarını ve gecikme sürelerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2788">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2789">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2789">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2790">**ölçer** Dairesel ölçer denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2790">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2792">**gecikme** Her adım için gecikme süresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2792">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2793">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı onay kutusu seçme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2798">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2798">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2800">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2852">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2852">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2853">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2862">Dairesel ölçer çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2862">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2863">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2865">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dairesel ölçer çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2865">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2866">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel ölçer pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2866">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2867">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2868">**ölçer** Dairesel ölçer denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2868">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2869">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2870">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2870">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2871">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2872">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2872">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2873">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2873">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2882">Döngüsel ölçer olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2882">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2883">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2884">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2885">Bu hizmet, belirtilen döngüsel ölçer için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2885">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2886">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2886">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2887">**ölçer** Ölçer denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2887">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2888">**event_ptr** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2888">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2889">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı ölçer olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2893">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2894">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2894">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2895">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2932">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2932">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2933">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2933">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2934">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının fırçalarını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2934">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2935">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2935">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2936">**line_color_id** Satır renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2936">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2937">**Ek B,** kaynak kimlikleri için önceden tanımlanmış renk içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2937">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2938">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2938">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2939">**fill_color_id** Dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2939">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2940">**Ek B,** kaynak kimlikleri için önceden tanımlanmış renk içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2940">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2941">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2941">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2942">**style (stil)** Fırça stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2942">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2943">**Ek D,** desteklenen fırça stillerini açıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2943">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2944">Fırça stilleri bitwise OR işlemi kullanılarak tek bir değişkende bir araya ayarlanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2944">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2945">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2945">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı tanım yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2969">Geçerli çizim bağlamının fırçasını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2969">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2970">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2970">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2971">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2971">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2972">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamındaki etkin fırçaya bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2972">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2973">Etkin çizim bağlamı yoksa, hizmet başarısız olur ve NULL bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2973">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2974">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2975">**return_brush** Fırçanın hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2975">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2976">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2976">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bağlam fırçası başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2980">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2980">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-2998">Geçerli çizim bağlamının fırça desenini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2998">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-2999">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3000">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3001">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının fırça desenini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3001">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3002">Fırça deseninin kesik çizgili yatay ve kesik çizgili dikey çizgiler çizmek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3002">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3003">Gx_canvas_line_draw () çağrıldığında ve çizgi yatay veya dikey olduğunda ve brush.gx_brush_line_pattern alanı sıfır değilse, bir kalıp çizgisi çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3003">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3004">Fırça deseninin maskesi Şu anda yalnızca yatay ve dikey çizgiler için desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3004">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3005">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3006">**örüntü** Fırça için kullanılacak model.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3006">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3007">Bu, kalıp çizgisi çiziminde kullanılacak basit bir onaltılık açık/kapalı örüntü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3007">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3008">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3008">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam fırçası kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) geçersiz çizim bağlamı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3011">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3012">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3013">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3031">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamının fırçalarını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3031">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3032">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3032">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3033">**fırça** Geçerli bağlam için kullanmak üzere fırça işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3033">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3034">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam fırça kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3038">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3039">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3039">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3040">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3040">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3110">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3110">gx_context_color_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3113">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3114">Bu hizmet, belirtilen renk KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili renk değerini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3114">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3115">Renk değeri, etkin bağlam görüntüsüne ait Color biçiminde döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3115">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3116">Bu hizmet yalnızca etkin bir çizim işleminin içinden çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3116">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3117">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3117">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3118">**color_id** İstenen rengin kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3118">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3119">**return_color** Döndürülen renk değerini tutacak değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3119">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3120">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3120">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı renk değeri Al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3125">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3126">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

/* Get the color vaue. */

```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3143">Geçerli çizim bağlamının dolgu rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3143">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3144">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3146">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamında etkin fırçanın dolgu rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3146">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3147">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3148">**fill_color_id** Geçerli bağlamın dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3148">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3149">**Ek B,** kaynak kimlikleri için önceden tanımlanmış renk içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3149">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3150">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3150">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3151">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam dolgusu renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3155">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3156">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3156">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3157">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3157">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3172">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3172">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3173">Geçerli çizim bağlamındaki yazı tipi KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili yazı tipini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3173">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3174">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3175">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3176">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yazı tipi KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili yazı tipi işaretçisini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3176">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3177">Bu hizmet yalnızca etkin bir çizim işleminin içinden çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3177">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3178">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3179">**font_id** İstenen yazı tipinin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3179">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3180">**return_font** Döndürülen yazı tipi işaretçisini tutmak için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3180">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3181">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3181">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla alınan yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3186">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3186">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3187">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3187">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3188">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3188">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3235">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamında etkin fırçanın çizgi rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3235">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3236">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3236">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3240">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3262">Geçerli çizim bağlamındaki pixelmap KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili pixelmap 'i al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3262">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3263">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3264">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3265">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pixelmap KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili pixelmap işaretçisini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3265">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3266">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3266">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3267">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap kaynak KIMLIĞI istendi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3267">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3268">**return_map** Geri döndürülen pixelmap adresini tutacak değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3268">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3269">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00), pixelmap başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pixelmap işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3274">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3274">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3275">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3275">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3276">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3276">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3319">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3319">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3320">Geçerli çizim bağlamının ham fırçasını tanımlayın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3320">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3321">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3322">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3323">Bu hizmet, geçerli ekran bağlamının ham fırçasını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3323">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3324">Ham tanımlar, 32 bitlik ARGB renk değerleri renk kimlikleri yerine fırçaya geçirilene zaman kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3324">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3325">Ham renk tanımları, istenen renk geçerli sistem renk tablosunda yoksa veya RGB renk değeri çalışma zamanında hesaplanmışsa yararlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3325">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3326">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3326">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3327">**line_color** 32 bitlik ham ARGB renk biçimindeki çizginin rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3327">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3328">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3328">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3329">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3329">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3330">**fill_color** 32 bit ham ARGB renk biçiminde dolgu rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3330">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3331">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3331">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3332">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3332">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3333">**style (stil)** Fırça stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3333">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3334">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3335">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham fırça tanımlaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3355">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3355">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3356">Geçerli çizim bağlamının ham dolgusu rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3356">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3357">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3358">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3359">Bu hizmet, geçerli ekran bağlamının ham dolgusu rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3359">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3360">Line_color parametresi, renk KIMLIĞI değeri yerine 32 bitlik bir ARGB formatı ham renk değeridir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3360">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3361">Ham renk tanımları, istenen renk geçerli sistem renk tablosunda yoksa veya RGB renk değeri çalışma zamanında hesaplanmışsa yararlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3361">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3362">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3362">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3363">**line_color** Çizgi rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3363">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3364">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3364">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3365">Uygulamanın de özel renkler ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3365">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3366">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3366">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3367">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam ham dolgusu renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3367">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3368">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3368">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3369">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3369">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3370">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3370">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3371">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3371">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3386">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3386">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3387">Geçerli çizim bağlamının ham çizgi rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3387">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3388">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3389">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3390">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamında etkin fırçanın çizgi rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3390">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3391">Line_color parametresi, renk kimliği değeri yerine 32 bit ARGB biçimli ham renk değeridir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3391">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3392">Ham renk tanımları, istenen renk geçerli sistem renk tablosunda mevcut değilken veya RGB renk değeri çalışma zamanında hesaplandı olduğunda kullanışlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3392">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3393">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3394">**line_color** Satır değerinin rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3394">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3395">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3395">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3396">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3396">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3397">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3400">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3401">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3416">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3416">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3418">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3418">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3419">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3420">Kullanım dışı bırakılan bu API, belirtilen dize KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili dizeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3420">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3421">Yeni uygulamalar gx_context_string_get_ext () kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3421">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3422">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3424">**return_string** Dize işaretçisinin döndürülme değişkeninin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3424">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3425">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlam ham çizgi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3428">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3428">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3429">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3429">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3430">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3430">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3438">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3438">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3439">Bu hizmet, belirli bir dize kimliğiyle ilişkili dizeyi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3439">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3440">Bu hizmet yalnızca bir pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin içinde etkin bir çizim bağlamı olduğunda çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3440">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3441">Bu hizmet etkin tuvali tanımlar ve bulunan görüntüleme örneğinden dizeyi görüntüler ve alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3441">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3442">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3442">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3443">**string_id** Uygulama kaynak üst bilgisi dosyasında GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan dizeyi tanımlamak için kullanılan dize kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3443">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3444">**return_string** Dize GX_STRING dize uzunluğunun döndürülecek olduğu bir değişken adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3444">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3445">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bağlam ham çizgisi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Etkin çizim bağlamı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3450">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3451">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3451">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```
