## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3468">Etkin görüntüleme dilini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3468">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3469">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3469">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3470">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3470">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3471">Bu hizmet, belirtilen görünüm için şu anda etkin olan dili atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3471">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3472">Dil dizini, görüntüleme dili tablosunda tanımlanan dillere karşılık gelir ve ANSI dil tanımlayıcısı değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3472">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3473">Birden çok görüntü sisteminde farklı ekranlar, her biri farklı etkin diller çalıştırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3473">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3474">Bu API kullanılmadan önce görüntüleme dili tablosu atanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3474">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3475">Bir ekran gx_studio_display_configure kullanılarak başlatıldığında, dil tablosu otomatik olarak yüklenir ve uygulama etkin dil dizininde geçirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3475">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3476">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3477">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3477">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3478">**language (dil)** Etkin dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3478">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3479">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3479">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3480">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı dil ataması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3480">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz görüntü işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3483">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3484">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3485">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3486">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3489">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3489">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3490">Bir renk değerini yeniden atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3490">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3491">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3491">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3492">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3492">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3493">Bu hizmet, belirtilen renk kimliğiyle ilişkili renk değerini yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3493">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3494">Bu, tamamen yeni bir renk tablosu sağlamadan bir ekranın renk tablosunda değişiklik yapmak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3494">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3495">Sağlanan renk değeri, ekran tarafından desteklenen yerel biçimde olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3495">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3496">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3497">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3497">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3498">**color_id** Yeniden atama için Renk Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3498">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3499">**new_color** Bu yuvaya atanan renk color_id değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3499">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3500">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı renk yeniden ataması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz renk kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Geçersiz görüntü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3505">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3506">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3508">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3508">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3511">Görüntü renk tablosu ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3511">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3513">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3514">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak renk tablosunu yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3514">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3515">Bu hizmet normalde Gux Studio tarafından üretilen görüntüleme yapılandırma işlevi tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3515">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3516">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3517">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3517">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3518">**Color_Table** Yerel görüntü biçimindeki renk değerleri dizisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3518">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3519">**color_count** Renk tablosundaki giriş sayısını gösterir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3519">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3520">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı renk tablosu kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3523">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3523">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1d) geçersiz görüntüleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3525">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3525">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3526">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3526">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3527">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3527">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3530">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3530">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3531">Görüntü oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3531">Create display</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3533">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3533">Description</span></span>

```C
{
    …
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3559">Bu hizmet bir ekranı kapatır ve ayrılan kaynakları temizler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3559">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3563">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3563">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3581">Görüntüleme yazı tipi tablosu ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3581">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3582">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3582">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3583">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3584">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak yazı tipi tablosunu yeniden atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3584">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3585">Bu hizmet normalde Gux Studio tarafından üretilen görüntüleme yapılandırma işlevi tarafından çağrılır, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3585">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3586">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3586">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3587">**görüntüleme** Görüntüleme denetimi bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3587">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3588">**font_table** Veri GX_FONT dizisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3588">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3589">**table_size** Tablodaki yazı tipi sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3589">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3590">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yazı tipi tablosu kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3594">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3595">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3596">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3596">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3602">Görüntüleme dili tablosu alma (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3602">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3604">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3605">Bu hizmet, belirtilen görüntüden dil tablosu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3605">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3606">Bu hizmet, çalışma zamanında dinamik olarak tanımlanmış dizeleri kullanarak görüntüleme dili tablosunda değişiklik yapmak için bir uygulama tarafından kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3606">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3607">Bu API kullanım dışıdır ve yalnızca eski stil dil tablosu kullanan uygulamalar için de kullanılabilir (studio tarafından oluşturulan kaynak dosyası sürüm 5.6'dan önceki kitaplık sürümü için oluşturulur).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3607">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3608">Yeni uygulamalarda gx_display_language_table_get_ext() gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3608">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3609">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3609">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3610">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3610">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3611">**tablo** Tablo işaretçisini alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3611">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3612">**language_count** Dil sayısını alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3612">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3613">**string_table_size** Dize tablosu boyutunu alacak adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3613">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3614">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3615">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yazı tipi tablo kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3615">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3616">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3616">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3617">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3617">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3618">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3618">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3619">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3619">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3620">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3620">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get(&my_display,
        &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved.
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3651">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3651">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3652">Bu hizmet kullanım dışıdır ve yeni uygulamaların gx_display_language_table_set_ext() kullanmaları gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3652">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3653">Bu hizmet yalnızca sürüm 5.6'dan önceki kitaplık sürümlerini hedef alan Studio tarafından oluşturulan kaynak dosyalarıyla uyumluluk için de kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3653">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3654">Bu hizmet, ekran tarafından kullanılacak dil tablosu atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3654">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3655">Bu hizmet normalde GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan işlev tarafından gx_studio_display_configure, ancak uygulama yazılımı tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3655">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3656">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3657">**display (görüntüleme)** Denetim bloğu görüntüleme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3657">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3658">**tablo** Dil tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3658">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3659">**number_of_languages** Sağlanan tablodaki sütun sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3659">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3660">**number_of_strings** Her tablo sütunundaki dize sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3660">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3661">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3661">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yazı tipi tablosu kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3663">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3663">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3664">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3664">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3824">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3824">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3825">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3825">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3852">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3853">Bu hizmet bir bırakma listesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3853">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3854">Bırakma listesi, bırakma listesi pencere öğesinin bir birleşimidir ve açılan liste açıldığında görüntülenen bir açılan dikey liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3854">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3855">Açılan liste pencere öğesi oluşturulduğunda açılan dikey liste otomatik olarak oluşturulur ve sırasıyla, açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında veya kapandığında görüntülenir veya gizlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3855">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3856">Bırakma listesi pencere öğesi iki ilişkili pixelmaps 'ı destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3856">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3857">İlk olarak, Studio Özellikler görünümünde "duvar kağıdı Listele" olarak açıklanan, açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında görüntülenen dikey listenin arka planı olarak görüntülenen isteğe bağlı duvar kağıdı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3857">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3858">Studio özellikleri görünümünde "arka plan görüntüsü" olarak tanımlanan ikinci pixelmap, açılan listenin arka planı olarak görüntülenecek isteğe bağlı bir görüntüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3858">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3859">Açılan liste pencere öğesi, bırakma listesini açıp kapatmak için kullanılan bir alt pencere öğesine sahip olabilir (ancak olması gerekmez).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3859">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3860">Bu normalde bir simge veya düğme pencere öğesidir, ancak üst açılan liste için açık/kapalı geçiş olarak özel bir pencere öğesi bile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3860">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3861">Bu alt pencere öğesi bırakma listesini çalıştıran anahtar ayar, bu alt pencere öğesi için önceden tanımlanmış pencere öğesi kimliğine sahip olması ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3861">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3862">Açılan listeyi açıp kapatacak bir alt pencere öğesi tanımlamak için, önce ve alt pencere öğelerini bırakma listesine ekleyin ve bu alt pencere öğelerini istediğiniz gibi bırakma listesinde konuma getirin:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3862">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Açılan listenin ekran görüntüsü.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3864">Ardından Studio özellikleri görünümünü kullanarak bu alt pencere öğesine üst açılan liste tarafından tanınan ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON kimlik değeri olan kimlik değerini attayabilirsiniz:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3864">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Studio özellikleri görünümünün ekran görüntüsü.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3866">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3866">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3867">**drop_list** Bırakma listesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3867">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3868">**name** Açılan listenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3868">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3869">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3869">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3870">**total_rows** Açılan listede yer alan toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3870">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3871">**open_height** Açılan liste açıldığında görüntülenen dikey listenin yüksekliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3871">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3872">**geri çağırma** Liste kaydırıldıkları zaman dikey liste tarafından çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3872">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3873">Daha fazla bilgi için GX_VERTICAL_LIST belgelerine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3873">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3874">**style (stil)** Açılan liste kenarlık stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3874">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3875">**drop_list_id** Bırakma listesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3875">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3876">**boyut** Bırakma listesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3876">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3877">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3877">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3878">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı bırakma listesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3878">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3880">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3880">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3881">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3881">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3882">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3882">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3884">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3884">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3895">Bu hizmet bırakma listesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3895">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3896">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3897">**drop_list** Bırakma listesi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3897">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3898">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3898">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3899">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3899">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3900">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bırakma listesi olayını başarıyla işledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3900">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3901">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3901">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3902">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3902">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3903">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3903">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3904">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3904">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3905">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3905">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3932">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3932">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3934">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3934">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3935">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3936">Bırakma listesine bir arka plan görüntüsü attayabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3936">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3937">Bu pixelmap, liste açıldığında görüntülenen açılan dikey liste için değil, bırakma listesi pencere öğesinin kendisi için arka plan olarak kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3937">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3938">Açılan liste açılır listesine bir pixelmap atamak için, önce açılan listeye bir işaretçi almak üzere gx_drop_list_popup_get çağırmanız ve sonra bu açılan listeye bir pixelmap atamak için gx_window_wallpaper_set () kullanmanız gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3938">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3939">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3940">**drop_list** Bırakma listesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3940">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3941">piksellimap 'e ait **kimlik** kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3941">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3942">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3942">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bırakma listesi pixelmap kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3946">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) geçersiz pikseltamap kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3946">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3947">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3948">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3948">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3949">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3949">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST mylist;

/* create the drop list here */

/* Assign a pixelmap id, which will turn on the list button */

    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_DROP_LIST_BACKGROND);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3956">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3956">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3957">Açılan dikey listeye yönelik işaretçiyi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3957">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3958">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3958">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3959">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3959">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3960">Bir bırakma listesi pencere öğesi, açılan liste pencere öğesinin kendisinden oluşur ve açılan liste pencere öğesi açıldığında görüntülenen bir açılan pencere dikey listesidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3960">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3961">Bu hizmet, bırakma listesinin dikey liste bileşenine bir işaretçi alır ve uygulamanın API hizmetlerini doğrudan bu dikey listede çağırmasına izin verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3961">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3962">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3963">**drop_list** Bırakma listesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3963">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3964">**return_list** Açılan listede depolanan dikey listenin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3964">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3965">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Açılan dikey liste başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-3967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3968">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3968">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-3969">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3969">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-3970">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-3970">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

```C
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,

    VOID (*callback)(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4008">Bu hizmet, genel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4008">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4009">Genel bir kaydırma tekerleği, alt pencere öğelerinin bir dizi kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4009">A generic scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is consisted of child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4010">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4010">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4011">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_scroll_wheel_create () API 'sine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4011">For more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation, see the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4012">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilir ve tüm gx_scroll_wheel hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4012">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4013">Tüm kaydırma tekerleği türleri GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT kaydırma tekerleği kaydırıldıklarında üstlerine olay oluşturmalarını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4013">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4014">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4015">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4015">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4016">**name** Genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4016">**name** Logical name of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4017">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4017">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4018">**total_rows** Kaydırma tekerleğinin toplam satırı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4018">**total_rows** Total rows of the scroll wheel.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4019">**geri çağırma** Bir pencere öğesi satırı oluşturmak için geri çağırma işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4019">**callback** Callback function to create a widget row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4020">Toplam satır GX_NULL alt sayıyla eşle eş olursa bu soruna neden olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4020">It can be GX_NULL if the number of total rows matches the child count.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4021">Alt sayı toplam satır sayısından küçük olduğunda veya stili ayarlanmış olduğunda pencere öğesi yeniden kullanımı GX_STYLE_WRAP sağlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4021">It should be provided for widget reuse when the child count is less than the number of total rows or GX_STYLE_WRAP style is set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4022">Bu durumda alt sayısının görünür satır sayısından 1 fazla olduğundan emin olun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4022">And in this case make sure the child count is 1 more than the number of visible rows.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4023">**style (stil)** Genel kaydırma tekerleğinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4023">**style** Style of generic scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4024">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri ve pencere öğelerine özgü stiller için önceden tanımlanmış genel stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4024">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets and widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4025">**id** Genel kaydırma tekerleğinin Uygulama tarafından tanımlanan kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4025">**id** Application-defined ID of generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4026">**boyut** Genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4026">**size** Dimensions of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Genel kaydırma tekerleği başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4031">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4031">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4032">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4032">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4033">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4033">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid number of rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4034">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4034">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4035">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4035">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4036">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4036">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4037">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4037">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Define visible rows.  */
#define VISIBLE_ROWS 5

/* Define row memory.  */
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT row_memory[VISIBLE_ROWS + 1];

/* Define callback function.  */
VOID row_create(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_WIDGET *widget, INT index)
{
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *row = (GX_PROMPT *)widget;
GX_BOOL result;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

    gx_widget_created_test(widget, &result);

    if(!result)
    {
        gx_numeric_prompt_create(row, "", wheel, 0, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);
    }

    gx_numeric_prompt_value_set(row, index);
}

/* Create "generic_wheel” with 20 rows.  */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(&generic_wheel, “generic_wheel”, &parent, 20, row_create,
                                       GX_STYLE_ENABLED, WHEEL_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the generic scroll wheel "generic_wheel”" has been created. */

/* Create children for generic scroll wheel.  */
for(index = 0; index <= VISIBLE_ROWS; index++)
{
    row_create(generic_wheel, (GX_WIDGET *)&row_memory[index], index);
}
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4083">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4083">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4084">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı genel kaydırma tekerleği olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4084">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful generic scroll wheel event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4085">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4085">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4086">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4086">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4087">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4087">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4088">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4089">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4090">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic generic scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                                               GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:

            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

        default:

            /* Pass all other events to the default generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
            status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4184">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4184">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4185">Yatay liste oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4185">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4186">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4186">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4187">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4188">Bu hizmet yatay bir liste oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4188">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4189">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4190">**horizontal_list** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4190">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4191">**name** Yatay listenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4191">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4192">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4192">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4193">**total_columns** Yatay listedeki toplam comumns sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4193">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4194">**geri arama** Bu, uygulama tarafından sağlanmış bir geri çağırma işlevine yönelik bir işaretçidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4194">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4195">Yeni görünür liste öğelerini oluşturmak için yatay liste kaydırıldığında geri çağırma işlevi çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4195">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4196">Bu şekilde yatay liste, Kullanıcı tanımlı pencere öğesi türünü liste öğeleri olarak görüntüleyebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4196">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4197">**Stil** ScrollBar pencere öğesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4197">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4198">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4198">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4199">**horizontal_list_id** Yatay listenin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4199">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4200">**Boyut** Horitzgen listesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4200">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4201">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4202">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yatay liste başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4202">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4203">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4203">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4205">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4205">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4206">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4206">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) sütun sayısı geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4208">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4209">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4210">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal list “my_list” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4219">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4219">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4220">Yatay liste olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4220">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4222">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4223">Bu hizmet, yatay liste için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4223">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4224">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4225">**list (liste)** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4225">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4226">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4226">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4227">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Yatay liste olayı başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4229">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4229">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4230">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4230">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4231">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4231">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4232">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4232">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4233">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4233">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4299">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) dizini geçersiz aralıkta değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4299">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4300">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4300">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4303">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4303">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4316">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4316">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4317">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4317">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4318">Bu hizmet, yatay listenin seçili liste girişini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4318">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4319">Yatay listede alt pencere öğelerinin daha fazla satır varsa ve seçili giriş görünümden kaydırıldığında, bu API GX_NULL döndürür çünkü alt pencere öğeleri liste içeriği kaydırıldığında yeniden kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4319">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4320">Bu öğe görünümden kaydırıldığında bile gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get işlevi, seçili öğenin dizinini güvenilir bir şekilde döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4320">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4321">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4321">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4322">**horizontal_list** Yatay liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4322">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4323">**return_list_entry** Dönüş listesi giriş pencere öğesi hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4323">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4324">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Yatay liste girişi başarıyla elde edildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4326">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Seçili pencere öğesi, istemci alt öğelerinden daha fazla satır içeren bir listede görünümden kaydırıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4326">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4327">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4327">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4328">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4328">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4329">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4330">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4330">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4331">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4367">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4367">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4368">Bu hizmet yatay bir kaydırma çubuğu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4368">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4369">Yatay kaydırma çubuğunun KIMLIĞI önceden tanımlanmıştır (bir pencere bundan sonra olayları nasıl yakalayacağından emin olmak için) ve boyut otomatik (üst pencerenin istemci genişliğini doldurmaları gerektiğinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4369">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4370">İstemci alanı kaydırma çubuklarında izin vermeye karar verirse, kimlik ve boyut parametreleriyle başka bir oluşturma işlevi eklememiz gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4370">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4371">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4372">**kaydırma çubuğu** ScrollBar pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4372">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4373">**ad** Kaydırma çubuğunun adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4373">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4374">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4374">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4375">**görünüm** Görünüm yapısı, kaydırma çubuğunun görünümünü tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4375">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4376">Bu değer GX_NULL, kaydırma çubuğu tarafından tanımlanan varsayılan kaydırma çubuğu görünümünü gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4376">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4377">İlke **yapısının tanımı** için Ek I GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4377">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4378">**Stil** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4378">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4379">**Ek D,** pencere öğelerine özgü stillerin yanı sıra tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4379">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4380">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı yatay kaydırma çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4386">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4388">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4395">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4395">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4396">Oluştur simgesi düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4396">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4397">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4397">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4400">GX_ICON_BUTTON GX_BUTTON türetilir ve tüm gx_button API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4400">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4403">**ad** Simge düğmesi pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4403">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4404">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4404">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4405">**icon_id** Simgenin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4405">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4406">**Stil** Simgenin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4406">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4407">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4407">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4409">**Boyut** Simge düğmesi boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4409">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4410">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4410">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4412">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4412">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4413">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4413">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4414">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4414">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
