## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4435">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4435">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4436">Simge düğmesi çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4436">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4437">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4437">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4438">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4438">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4439">Bu hizmet simge düğmesini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4439">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4440">Bu işlev normalde tuval yenileme işlemi kapsamında GUIX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan simge düğme çizimini özel çizim tabanı olarak çağırmak isteyen uygulamaya da gösterilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4440">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4441">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4442">**düğme** Simge işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4442">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4443">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4444">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4445">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4446">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4447">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4464">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4464">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4465">Pixelmap 'i simge düğmesi pencere öğesine ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4465">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4498">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4498">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4499">Bu hizmet, belirtilen simge pencere öğesi arka planını çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4499">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4500">Bu hizmet, genellikle gx_icon_button_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazma konusunda yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4500">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4503">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4503">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4504">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4504">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4506">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4543">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4544">Bu hizmet belirtilen simge pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4544">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4545">Bu hizmet normalde tuval yenileme işlemi kapsamında GUIX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan simge çizimini özel çizim tabanı olarak çağırmak isteyen uygulamaya da gösterilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4545">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4546">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4546">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4547">**simgesi** Simge pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4547">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4548">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4549">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4549">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4550">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4551">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4551">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4552">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4552">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4597">Görüntü okuyucu modülü örneği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4597">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4598">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4599">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4600">Bu işlev bir çalışma zamanı ham görüntü okuyucusu /kod çözücü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4600">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4601">Şu anda yalnızca jpeg ve png ham görüntü türleri de destektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4601">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4602">Bu hizmetin GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4602">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4603">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4603">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4604">**image_reader** Görüntü okuyucusu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4604">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4605">**veriler** Ham giriş verilerine işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4605">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4606">**data_size** Ham giriş verileri boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4606">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4607">**color_format** İstenen çıkış rengi biçimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4607">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4608">**modu** Sıkıştırma, dither ve alfa modları bayrakları.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4608">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4609">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı görüntü okuyucu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçersiz veri boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4613">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4614">Başlatma ve İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4614">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4615">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4640">Sıkıştırılmış ve dönüştürme işlemini Başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4640">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4641">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4642">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4643">Bu hizmet, bir ham görüntünün belirtilen renk biçimiyle kodunu çözer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4643">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4644">Şu anda yalnızca JPEG ve PNG RAW görüntü türleri desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4644">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4645">Bunun tanımlanması GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4645">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4646">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4646">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4647">**image_reader** Görüntü okuyucu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4647">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4648">**piksel haritası** Çıkış piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4648">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4649">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı görüntü kodu çözme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlanmadı veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Giriş görüntüsü türü veya çıkış rengi biçimi desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4655">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4656">Başlatma ve İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4656">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4657">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4657">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4663">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4665">Bu hizmet, çizgi grafiğin x,y eksenini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4665">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4666">Eksen renkleri ve çizgi genişliği parametreleri, çizgi grafik bilgi yapısından alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4666">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4667">Bu hizmet normalde gx_line_chart_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri yazmaya yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4667">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4669">**chart (grafik)** Çizgi grafik denetim bloğu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4669">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4670">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4670">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4671">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4671">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4674">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4674">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4703">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4703">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4704">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4704">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4705">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4705">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4771">Sabit nokta y ekseni ölçeklendirme değerini hesaplama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4771">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4772">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4772">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4773">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4773">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4774">Bu hizmet, Y grafiği ekseninde veri değerlerinin çizimi için kullanılan sabit nokta ölçeklendirme değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4774">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4775">Bu chart_info hesaplamak için temel parametreler ve grafik sınırlayıcı dikdörtgen kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4775">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4776">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4777">**chart (grafik)** Çizgi grafik denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4777">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4778">**return_val** Sabit nokta dönüş değerini tutmak için değerin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4778">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4779">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı y ölçek değeri hesaplama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4782">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4782">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4783">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4783">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4784">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4784">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4790">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4790">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4791">Menü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4791">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4793">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4794">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde bir menü oluşturur ve menüyü sağlanan üst pencere öğesiyle ilişkilendirır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4794">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4795">Alt menü öğesi olarak tüm pencere öğesi türlerini kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4795">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4796">Bir pencere öğesini bir alt menü öğesi olarak eklemek için **gx_menu_insert** çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4796">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4797">GX_MENU GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT türetilir ve tüm gx_pixelmap_prompt API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4797">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4798">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4799">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4799">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4800">**ad** Menünün adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4800">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4801">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4801">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4802">**text_id** Metnin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4802">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4803">**fill_id** Dolgunun kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4803">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4804">**Stil** Pencere öğesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4804">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4805">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4805">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4806">**menu_id** Menünün uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4806">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4807">**Boyut** Menünün boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4807">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4808">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4808">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı menü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4814">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4815">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4816">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4828">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4828">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4829">Çiz menüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4829">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4832">Bu hizmet belirtilen menüyü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4832">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4833">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel menü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerinin uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4833">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4834">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4835">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4835">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4836">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4837">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4837">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4838">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4838">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4839">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4839">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4840">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4840">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4867">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4867">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4868">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4868">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4928">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4928">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4929">Menü metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4929">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4930">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4930">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4931">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4932">Bu hizmet, bir menenin metnini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4932">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4933">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel menü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevlerinin uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4933">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4934">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4935">**menü** Menü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4935">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4936">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4937">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4938">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4939">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4940">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4980">Çok satırlı metin oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4980">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4981">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4982">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4983">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4983">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4984">Çok satırlı metin düğmesi, düğme metnini 1-n satır üzerinde görüntüler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4984">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4985">En fazla satır sayısı, varsayılan olarak 4 olan GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES sabit değer tarafından tanımlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4985">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4986">Satır sonları, çok satırlı metin düğmesine atanan metin dizesinde satır başı ve/veya satır başı + satır besleme çiftleri ile ayarlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4986">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON, api hizmetlerinden GX_TEXT_BUTTON ve tüm api gx_text_button destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4988">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4989">**text_button** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4989">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4990">**name** Metin düğmesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4990">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4991">**parent** Düğmenin üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4991">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4992">**text_id** Metnin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4992">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4993">**style (stil)** Metin düğmesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4993">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4994">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4995">**text_button_id** Metin düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4995">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4996">**boyut** Düğmenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4996">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-4997">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çok satırlı metin düğmesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5003">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5004">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5005">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5014">Çok satırlı metin düğmesi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5014">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5015">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5016">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5017">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin düğmesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5017">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5018">Bu işlev normalde bir tuval yenileme işleminin parçası olarak Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve özel çizim temeli olarak varsayılan çok satırlı metin düğmesi çizimini çağırmak isteyebileceğiniz uygulamaya de sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5018">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5019">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5020">**düğme** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5020">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5021">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5022">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5022">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5023">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5024">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5024">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5025">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5034">Çok satırlı metin düğmesi için varsayılan olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5034">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5035">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5035">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5036">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5036">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5037">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin düğmesi pencere öğesi için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5037">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5038">Bu işlev, bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi için özel olay işleme sağlamak isteyen uygulamalar tarafından erişilebilir hale gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5038">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5039">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5040">**düğme** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5040">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5041">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olay</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5041">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5042">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Olay başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5046">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5047">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5048">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5048">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5057">Çizim destek işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5057">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5058">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5059">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5060">Bu destek işlevi, çok satırlı bir metin düğmesinin metin bölümünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5060">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5061">Bu işlev, gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir çok satırlı metin düğmesi çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalara kolaylık sağlamak için ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5061">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5062">Düğme arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevlerini sağlayabilir ve multi_line_text_button_text_draw hizmetini özel çiziminin bir parçası olarak çağırarak arka plan üzerinde düğme metnini çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5062">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5063">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5063">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5064">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5064">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5065">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5065">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5066">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5066">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5067">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5068">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5069">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5080">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5080">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5081">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dize kaynak KIMLIĞINI metin düğmesine ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5081">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5082">Dize, metni düğme alanında birden çok satırda görüntülemeyi gören yeni satır karakterleri içerebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5082">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5083">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5084">**text_button** Metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5084">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5085">**string_id** Dizenin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5085">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5086">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) DIZE kaynak kimliği 'ni metin düğmesine başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5090">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5091">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5091">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5092">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5092">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5101">Metin düğmesine metin atama (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5101">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5102">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5103">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5104">Bu hizmet, gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext() için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5104">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5105">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5105">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5106">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY oluşturulursa, pencere öğesi atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur ve bu nedenle gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API'si bu hizmet istenmeden önce bir kez çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5106">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5107">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5107">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5108">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5109">**text_button** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5109">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5110">**NULL** ile sonlandırılan dizenin metin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5110">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5111">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metni düğmeye başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek yalıtıcı tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5117">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5117">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5118">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5118">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5119">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5119">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5130">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5130">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5131">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5131">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5132">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur ve bu nedenle gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API 'SI bu hizmetin istenmediği bir kez çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5132">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5133">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz, bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5133">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5136">GX_STRING değişkene yönelik **dize** işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5136">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
UINT context_size;

    &buffer_size);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5293">Geçerli çok satırlı metin girişi imleç konumunda bir karakter dizesi ekleme (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5293">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5294">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5295">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5296">Bu API kullanım dışıdır ve gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext() ile değiştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5296">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5297">Bu hizmet, geçerli imleç konumundaki çok satırlı metin giriş dizesi arabelleğine bir karakter dizesi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5297">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5298">Bu hizmet, belirli bir anahtar aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5298">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5299">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5299">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5300">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5300">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5301">**insert_str** Eklenecek UTF-8 biçim karakter dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5301">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5302">**insert_size** Eklenecek byte sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5302">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5303">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5303">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5304">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Karakter dizesi başarıyla eklendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5304">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz dize boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5309">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) geçersiz Yazı tipi veya arabellek boyutu dışında</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5309">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5310">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5310">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5311">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5311">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5312">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5312">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5334">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5334">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5367">Çok satırlı metin girişi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5367">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5368">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5369">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5370">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5370">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW türetilir ve tüm gx_multi_line_text_view hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5372">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5372">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5373">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5373">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5374">**ad** Metin girişi pencere öğesinin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5374">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5375">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5375">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5376">**input_buffer** Metin girişi arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5376">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5377">**Buffer_size** Metin girişi arabelleğinin bayt cinsinden boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5377">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5378">**style (stil)** Metin girişi pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5378">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5379">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5379">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5380">**text_input_id** Metin girişinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5380">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5381">**boyut** Metin girişi pencere öğesi boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5381">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5382">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çok satırlı metin girişi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5389">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5389">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5390">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5390">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5391">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5391">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5521">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5522">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi imlecini sonraki satıra konumlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5522">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5523">Bu hizmet, bir aşağı ok tuşu aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5523">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5567">Çok satırlı metin girişi imlecini geçerli satırın sonuna taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5567">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5568">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5568">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5569">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5570">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi imlecini geçerli dize çizgisinin sonuna konumlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5570">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5571">Bu hizmet, bir son anahtar aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5571">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5575">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metin girişi imleci geçerli satırın sonuna başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5575">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5615">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5616">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5617">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5617">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5618">Bu işlev, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için özel olay işleme sağlamak isteyen uygulamalar tarafından erişilebilir hale gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5618">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5619">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5620">**düğme** Çok satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5620">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```
