## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5662">Çok satırlı metin girişi arka plan rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5662">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5665">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için dolgu renkleri atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5665">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5666">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5667">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5667">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında kullanılan seçili dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** Etkin değilken devre dışı bırakılmış dolgu renginin GX_STYLE_ENABLED kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** Hem kaynak hem de kaynak etkin olduğunda kullanılan salt okunur GX_STYLE_ENABLED GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5672">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5672">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin girişi için renkleri başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5674">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5674">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5675">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5675">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5676">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5676">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5677">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5677">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5678">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5711">Metin girişi imlecini geçerli satırın başlangıcına taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5711">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5712">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5712">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5713">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5713">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5714">Bu hizmet, metin girişi imleci konumunu geçerli satırın başlangıcına taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5714">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5715">Bu hizmet, bir giriş anahtarı aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5715">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5854">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5856">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesine stiller ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5856">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5859">**Stil** Eklenecek stiller.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5859">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5860">**Ek D** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5860">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5994">Çok satırlı metin girişi metin rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5994">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5996">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-5997">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi için metin renkleri atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5997">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-5998">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5998">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-5999">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-5999">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6001">**selected_text_color_id** Pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında kullanılan seçili metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6001">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED etkin olmadığında kullanılan devre dışı metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** Hem GX_STYLE_ENABLED hem de GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY etkin olduğunda kullanılan salt okuma metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6043">Metin Seç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6043">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6044">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6044">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6045">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6045">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6046">Bu hizmet, belirtilen başlangıç işaretine ve bitiş işareti dizinine sahip çok satırlı metin girişi metnini seçer ve seçilen metni seçilen Fill ve Text renkleriyle vurgular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6046">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6047">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6047">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6048">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6048">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6049">**start_index** Seçilen ilk karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6049">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6050">**end_index** Son seçili karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6050">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6051">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6052">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok satırlı metin girişi metin seçimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6052">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) dizin değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6057">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6057">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6058">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6058">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6059">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6059">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6092">Metin girişine metin atama (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6092">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6093">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6093">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6094">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6094">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6095">Bu API kullanım dışıdır ve gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext () ile değiştirin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6095">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6096">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi çok satırlı metin girişine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6096">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6097">Multi_line_text_input pencere öğesinin giriş arabelleği boyutu dize uzunluğundan küçükse, dize kesilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6097">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6098">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6098">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6099">**text_input** Çok satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6099">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6160">Çok satırlı metin girişi imlecini önceki satıra taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6160">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6161">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6161">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6162">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6162">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6163">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin girişi imlecini önceki metin satırına taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6163">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6164">Bu hizmet, yukarı ok tuşu aşağı olayı alınca dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6164">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6168">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) İmleci önceki satıra başarıyla taşıdı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6168">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6169">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6169">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6170">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6170">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6171">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6171">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6172">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6172">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6207">Çok satırlı metin görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6207">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6208">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6208">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6209">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6210">Bu hizmet bir GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6210">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6211">Bu pencere öğesi türü GX_WINDOW türetilen ve bu nedenle gx_window API hizmetleri de bu pencere öğesi türüyle birlikte kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6211">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6212">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6212">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6213">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6213">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6214">**name** Metin görünümü pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6214">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6215">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6215">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6216">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6216">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6217">**style (stil)** Metin görünümü pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6217">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6218">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6218">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6219">**text_view_id** Metin görünümünün uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6219">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6220">**boyut** Metin görünümü pencere öğesi boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6220">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6221">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6224">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6224">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6225">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6225">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6226">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6226">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6227">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6227">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6228">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6228">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6229">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6229">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6261">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6261">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6262">Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6262">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6263">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6264">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6265">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı bir metin görünümü pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6265">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6266">Bu hizmet normalde tuval yenilemesi sırasında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çok satırlı metin görünümü çizim işlevlerinden de çağrılabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6266">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6267">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6268">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6268">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6269">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6270">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6270">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6271">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6272">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6273">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6273">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6305">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6305">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6306">Çok satırlı metin görünümü olaylarını işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6306">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6307">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6307">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6308">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6309">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6309">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6310">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6311">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6311">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6312">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6312">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6313">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı çok satırlı metin görünümü olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6318">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6318">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6319">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6319">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6320">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6320">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```


## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6398">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6398">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6399">Çok satırlı metin görünümü satır alanı ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6399">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6400">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6402">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi için metin satırları arasındaki aralığı ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6402">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6403">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6403">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6404">**görünüm** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6404">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6405">**line_space** Ayar için değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6405">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6406">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6407">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin görünümü için satır alanı değerini başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6407">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6409">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6409">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6410">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6411">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6444">Çok satırlı metin görünümü kaydırma bilgilerini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6444">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6446">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6447">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü kaydırma bilgilerini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6447">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6448">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6448">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6449">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6449">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6450">**Stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL veya GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6450">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6451">**Bilgi** Kaydırma bilgileri için hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6451">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6452">**Ek I,** bu yapıya GX_SCROLL_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6452">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6453">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metin görünümü kaydırma bilgileri başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6455">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Pencere öğesi görünmüyor veya metin görünümü yazı tipi kimliği geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6455">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6457">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6458">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6458">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6459">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6459">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6491">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6491">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6492">Çok satırlı metin görünümü için metin rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6492">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6495">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesine metin rengi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6495">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6496">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6497">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6497">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6498">**normal_text_color_id** Normal durumda kullanılan normal metin renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6498">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6499">**selected_text_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında kullanılan seçili metin renginin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6499">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6500">**disabled_text_color_id** Devre dışı bırakılmış metin renginin kaynak kimliği GX_STYLE_ENABLED etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6500">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6501">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6501">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6502">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin görünümü için renkleri başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6502">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6504">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6504">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6505">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6506">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6539">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6539">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6541">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6541">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6542">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6542">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6543">Bu hizmet, bir dizenin kaynak kimliğini çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi olarak ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6543">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6544">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6545">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6545">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6546">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6546">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6547">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6547">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6548">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Çok satırlı metin görünümü için dize kimliği başarıyla ayarlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6548">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6550">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6550">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6552">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6552">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6554">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6586">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6586">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6587">Çok satırlı metin görünümünde kullanıcı tanımlı dize ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6587">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6588">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6589">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6590">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesine bir metin dizesi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6590">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6591">Text_view pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY oluşturulursa, pencere öğesi atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur ve bu nedenle gx_system_memory_allocate_set API'si bu hizmet istenmeden önce bir kez çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6591">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6592">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle atanan dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6592">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6593">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6594">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6594">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6595">**metin** NULL ile sonlandırılmış metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6595">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6596">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü Için dize başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6598">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6598">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6601">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6602">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6603">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6603">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6635">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6635">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6636">Çok satırlı metin görünümü boşluk ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6636">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6637">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6638">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6639">Bu hizmet, çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi için pencere öğesi ana hatları ile istemci alanı arasındaki aralığı ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6639">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6640">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6641">**text_view** Çok satırlı metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6641">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6642">**boşluk** Text_view pencere öğesi ile görüntülenmiş metin arasındaki kenar boşluğu genişliği (piksel cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6642">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6643">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) çok satırlı metin görünümü Için boşluk başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6647">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6648">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6648">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6649">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6649">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6709">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6709">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6710">Sayısal piksel haritası isteminin format işlevini geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6710">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6711">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6713">Bu hizmet, sayısal pixlemap istemi pencere öğesi varsayılan biçim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6713">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6714">Varsayılan biçim işlevi, sayısal piksel haritası istemi değerini bir dizeye dönüştürür ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6714">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6715">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın sayısal piksel haritası istemi değerini biçimlendirmek ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolamak için kendi biçim işlevini tanımlamasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6715">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6716">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6716">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6717">**istemi** Sayısal piksel haritası denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6717">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6718">**format_func** Ayar yapmak için Format işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6718">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6719">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6719">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6720">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sayısal pixlemap istemi biçim işlevini başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6720">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6722">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6722">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6723">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6723">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6724">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6724">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6773">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6773">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6774">Sayısal istemin format işlevini geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6774">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6776">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6776">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6777">Bu hizmet, sayısal bir istem pencere öğesinde varsayılan biçim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6777">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6778">Varsayılan biçim işlevi, sayısal istem değerini bir dizeye dönüştürür ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6778">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6779">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın sayısal istemi biçimlendirmek ve pencere öğesi özel arabelleğinde depolamak için kendi biçim işlevini tanımlamasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6779">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6780">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6780">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6781">**istemi** Sayısal istem denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6781">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6782">**format_func** Ayar yapmak için Format işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6782">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6783">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6783">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6784">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sayısal istem biçimi işlevini başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6784">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6786">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6786">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6787">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6787">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6788">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6788">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6814">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6814">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6815">Bu hizmet sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6815">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6816">Sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği, bir dizi sayıyı görüntülemek için özel olarak kullanılan bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6816">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6817">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6817">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6818">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_scroll_wheel_create () API 'sine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6818">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6819">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilir ve tüm gx_text_scroll_wheel ve gx_scroll_wheel hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6819">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6820">Kaydırma tekerleği kaydırıldığında, tüm kaydırma tekerleği türleri üst öğesine GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT olaylar oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6820">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6821">Sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği varsayılan olarak ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1 satıra sahip olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6821">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6822">Başka bir deyişle kaydırma tekerleği, her satırda start_val end_val 1 artırarak veya azaltarak arasındaki her değeri görüntüler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6822">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6823">Uygulamanın start_val görünmesini istediği end_val büyük veya küçük bir değer olduğunu unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6823">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6824">Uygulama satır artışını değiştirmek istiyorsa bunu sayısal kaydırma tekerleğini oluşturduk gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() çağrısıyla yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6824">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6825">Örneğin, 1980 ile 2020 yıllarını 5 artırarak gösteren bir kaydırma tekerleği oluşturmak isteyen bir uygulama bunu yapar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6825">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6862">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6862">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6863">Sayısal kaydırma tekerleğinin değer aralığını ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6863">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6865">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6866">Bu hizmet, izin verilen ve sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi tarafından görünen değer aralığını değiştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6866">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6867">Sayısal bir kaydırma tekerleği, bir dizi sayıyı görüntülemek için özel olarak kullanılan bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6867">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6868">Diğer kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri de mevcuttur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6868">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6869">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi hiyerarşisi, pencere öğesi türleri ve pencere öğesi türetme hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_scroll_wheel_create() API'sini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6869">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6870">Bu API'nin çağrısı, kaydırma tekerleğinin toplam satırlarını abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 olarak sıfırlar. Başka bir ifadeyle kaydırma tekerleği her satır için 1 artacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6870">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6871">Bunu değiştirmek için uygulama gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() çağrısıyla toplam satır sayısını değiştirebilir ve satırlar arasındaki değer artışını etkili bir şekilde değiştirebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6871">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6872">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6873">**wheel (tekerlek)** Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6873">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6874">**start_val** Sayısal değeri başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6874">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6875">**end_val** Bitiş sayısal değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6875">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6876">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6876">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6877">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sayısal kaydırma tekerleği aralığını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6877">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6880">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6881">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6881">Initialization and threads</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6882">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6882">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6901">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6901">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6902">Pixelmap oluştur düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6902">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6903">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6903">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6904">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6904">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6905">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap düğme pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6905">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6906">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON GX_BUTTON türetilir ve tüm gx_button hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6906">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6907">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6908">**düğme** Pixelmap Button denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6908">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6909">**ad** Pixelmap düğme pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6909">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6910">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6910">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6911">**normal_id** Normal durum kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6911">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6912">**selected_id** Seçili durum kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6912">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6913">**disabled_id** Devre dışı durum kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6913">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6914">**Stil** Onay kutusunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6914">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6915">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6915">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6916">**pixelmap_button_id** Piksel haritası düğmesinin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6916">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6917">**boyut** Piksel haritası düğmesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6917">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6918">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6918">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6919">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Piksel haritası başarıyla oluşturuldu düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6919">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6920">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6920">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6921">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6921">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6922">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6922">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6923">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6923">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6924">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6924">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6925">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6925">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6926">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6926">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```
