## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6948">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6948">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6949">Pixelmap çiz düğmesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6949">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6950">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6951">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6952">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap düğme pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6952">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6953">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel pixelmap düğme pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6953">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6954">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6954">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6955">**düğme** Pixelmap Button denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6955">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6956">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6956">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-6957">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6957">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6958">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6958">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-6959">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6959">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-6960">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-6960">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */

        /* add my own handling here */

}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7018">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7018">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7019">Düğmeye piksel haritaları atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7019">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7020">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7021">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7022">Bu hizmet piksel haritalarını piksel haritası düğmesine ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7022">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7023">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7024">**düğme** Piksel haritası düğme denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7024">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7025">**normal_id** Normal durum olarak kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7025">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7026">**selected_id** Düğme seçildiğinde kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7026">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7027">**disabled_id** Düğme devre dışı bırakıldığında kullanılacak piksel haritasının kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7027">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7028">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7028">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7029">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı, piksel haritasını düğme olarak ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7029">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7031">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7031">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7032">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7033">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7033">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7034">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7056">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7056">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7057">Pixelmap istemi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7057">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7058">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7059">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7060">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası istemi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7060">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7061">Piksel haritası istemi, piksel haritalarını GX_PROMPT istemin arka planını boyaması için standart bir komut isteminden farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7061">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7062">Create işlevi bir piksel haritası kimliği, normal durum dolgusu piksel haritasını kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7062">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7063">Piksel haritası istemine en fazla altı piksel haritası atanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7063">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7064">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7064">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7065">**istemi** Piksel haritası komut istemi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7065">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7066">**name** Piksel haritası istemi pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7066">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7067">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7067">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7068">**text_id** Metnin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7068">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7069">**fill_id** Dolgu kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7069">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7070">**style (stil)** Onay kutusunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7070">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7071">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7071">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7072">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Piksel haritası isteminin uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7072">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7073">**boyut** Piksel haritası isteminin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7073">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7074">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası istemi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7078">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7078">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7079">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7079">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7080">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7080">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7081">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7081">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7082">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7082">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7098">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7098">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7099">Pixelmap istemi çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7099">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7100">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7100">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7101">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7101">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7102">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap istem pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7102">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7103">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel pixelmap istem pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7103">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7104">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7105">**komut istemi** Pixelmap istem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7105">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7106">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7106">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7107">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7107">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7108">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7109">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7110">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7126">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7126">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7127">sorulacak piksel haritalarını atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7127">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7128">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7128">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7129">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7129">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7130">Bu hizmet piksel haritası kimliklerini piksel haritası istemine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7130">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7131">Sol, dolgu ve sağ piksel haritası kimlikleri, uygulamanın çeşitli genişliklerden istemler için bir piksel haritası kümesi kullanmasına, ancak depolama gereksinimlerine göre tasarruf etmek için ortak bir yüksekliğe sahip olmasına olanak vermek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7131">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7132">Sol ve sağ kimlikler kullanılmazsa 0 olarak ayarlanmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7132">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7133">İstem, giriş odağını kazandığında kendisini farklı çizirse, bu amaçla seçili pixelmap kimlikleri kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7133">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7134">Seçilen kimlikler kullanılmıyorsa veya normal kimlikler ile aynıysa, bunları 0 olarak ayarlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7134">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7135">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7136">**komut istemi** Pixelmap istem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7136">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7137">**normal_left_id** Normal durumun sol tarafında kullanılacak olan pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7137">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7138">**normal_fill_id** Normal durumda döşeli bir dolgusu olarak kullanılacak pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7138">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7139">**normal_right_id** Sağ tarafta normal durumda kullanılacak olan pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7139">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7140">**selected_left_id** Seçili durumda sol tarafta kullanılacak olan pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7140">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7141">**selected_fill_id** Seçili durumda döşeli bir dolgusu olarak kullanılacak pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7141">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7142">**selected_right_id** Seçili durumda sağ tarafta kullanılacak olan pixelmap 'in kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7142">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7143">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7143">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı, komut istemine pixelmap 'i ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7172">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7172">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7173">Piksel haritası kaydırıcısı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7173">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7174">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7175">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7176">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası kaydırıcı pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7176">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7177">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7177">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7178">**kaydırıcı** Piksel haritası kaydırıcısı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7178">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7179">**name** Piksel haritası kaydırıcı pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7179">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7180">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7180">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7181">**bilgi** Kaydırıcı minimum değeri, en büyük değer, geçerli değer ve iğne limitlerini tanımlayan değerleri içeren GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7181">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7182">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7182">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7183">**pixelmap_info** Kaydırıcı arka planını ve iğne çizmek için kullanılan pixelmaps 'i tanımlayan GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7183">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7184">**Ek ı** GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7184">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7185">Kaydırıcı arka planı bir veya iki pixelmaps kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7185">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7186">Bir tane varsa, iğne taşırken arka plan değişmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7186">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7187">İki arka plan tanımlanmışsa, iğne ilk arka plan pixelmap 'i kullanmadan önce arka plan ve iğne ikinci arka plan pixelmap 'i kullandıktan sonra arka plan kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7187">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7188">**Stil** Kaydırıcı stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7188">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7189">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7189">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7190">**pixelmap_slider_id** Pixelmap kaydırıcısının uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7190">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7191">**Boyut** Pixelmap isteminin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7191">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7192">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7192">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7193">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00), pixelmap kaydırıcısını başarıyla oluşturdu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7193">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7194">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7194">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7195">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7195">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7196">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7196">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7197">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7197">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7198">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7198">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7199">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7199">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7200">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7200">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7220">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7220">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7221">Piksel haritası kaydırıcısını çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7221">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7222">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7222">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7224">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritası kaydırıcı pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7224">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7225">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel pixelmap kaydırıcı pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7225">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7226">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7227">**kaydırıcı** Pixelmap kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7227">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7228">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7228">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7229">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7229">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7230">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7231">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7231">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7232">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7232">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7253">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7253">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7254">Piksel haritası kaydırıcı olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7254">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7255">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7255">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7256">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7256">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7257">Bu hizmet, belirtilen piksel haritası kaydırıcı pencere öğesi için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7257">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7258">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7258">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7259">**kaydırıcı** Piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7259">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7260">**kaydırıcı** denetim bloğu olay İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7260">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7261">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7261">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7262">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası kaydırıcısı olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7262">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7263">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7263">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7264">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7264">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7265">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7265">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7266">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7266">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7267">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7267">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7268">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7268">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7289">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7289">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7290">Kaydırıcıya pixelmaps ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7290">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7291">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7292">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7293">Bu hizmet, pixelmaps 'i pixelmap kaydırıcıyla ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7293">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7294">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7295">**kaydırıcı** Pixelmap kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7295">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7296">**pikselınfo** Kaydırıcı arka planını ve iğne çizmek için kullanılan pixelmaps 'i tanımlayan GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7296">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7297">**Ek ı** GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO yapısı için tanım içeriyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7297">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7298">Kaydırıcı arka planı bir veya iki pixelmaps kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7298">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7299">Bir tane varsa, iğne taşırken arka plan değişmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7299">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7300">İki arka plan tanımlanmışsa, iğneden önceki arka plan ilk arka plan piksel haritasını, iğneden sonra gelen arka plan ikinci arka plan piksel haritasını kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7300">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7301">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7301">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7302">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı, piksel haritasını kaydırıcıya ayarlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7302">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7303">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7303">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7304">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7304">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7305">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7306">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7307">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7307">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7329">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7329">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7330">Çizim ilerleme çubuğu arka planı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7330">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7331">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7331">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7332">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7332">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7333">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ilerleme çubuğunun arka planını çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7333">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7334">Bu işlev, gx_progress_bar_draw () bir parçası olarak dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevini tanımladığı bu durumları desteklemek için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7334">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7335">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7336">**ilerleme çubuğu** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7336">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7352">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7352">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7353">İlerleme çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7353">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7354">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7355">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7361">**progress_bar_info** Bir GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7361">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7362">**Ek I,** veri yapısı için GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7362">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7363">**style (stil)** İlerleme çubuğu stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7363">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7364">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7364">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7367">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7367">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7374">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7375">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7376">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7376">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7390">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7391">Bu hizmet bir ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7391">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7392">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7392">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7413">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7414">Bu hizmet bir ilerleme çubuğu olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7414">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7415">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7415">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7416">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7416">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7417">**event_ptr** Veri yapısına GX_EVENT işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7417">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7418">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7418">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7419">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı istem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7419">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7421">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7421">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7422">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7422">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7423">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7423">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7424">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7424">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7425">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7425">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7461">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7461">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7462">İlerleme çubuğu bilgi yapısını ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7462">Set progress bar information structure</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7463">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7465">Bu hizmet, ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesi bilgi yapısını sıfırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7465">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7466">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7467">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7467">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7468">**info (bilgi)** Bir GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7468">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7469">**Ek I,** veri yapısı için GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7469">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7470">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) İlerleme çubuğu bilgilerini başarıyla sıfırlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7474">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7474">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7475">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7475">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7476">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7476">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7538">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7538">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7539">İlerleme çubuğunun metin rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7539">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7540">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7541">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7542">Bu hizmet, bir ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesinin metin rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7542">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7543">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7543">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7544">**progress_bar** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7544">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7545">**normal_text_color** Normal durumda kullanılan normal metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7545">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7546">**selected_text_color** Pencere öğesi odaklanıldığında kullanılan seçili metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7546">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7547">**disabled_text_color** GX_STYLE_ENABLED etkin olmadığında kullanılan devre dışı metin renginin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7547">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7548">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ilerleme çubuğu metin rengi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7552">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7553">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7554">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7565">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7565">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7566">İlerleme çubuğu metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7566">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7567">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7567">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7568">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7568">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7569">Bu hizmet belirtilen ilerleme çubuğunun metnini çiziyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7569">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7570">Bu işlev, gx_progress_bar_draw() işlevinin bir parçası olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevi tanımladığı bu örnekleri desteklemek için uygulamaya açık olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7570">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7571">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7572">**ilerleme çubuğu** İlerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7572">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7573">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7573">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7574">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7574">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7575">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7575">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7576">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7576">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7577">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7577">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7592">Bu hizmet, ilerleme çubuğu geçerli değerini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7592">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7593">İlerleme çubuğu değeri değiştirildiğinde ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesi otomatik olarak geçersiz kılacak ve yeniden çizilecektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7593">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7601">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7601">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7614">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7614">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7615">İstem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7615">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7616">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7616">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7617">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7618">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7618">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7619">GX_PROMPT, GX_WIDGET türetilen ve tüm gx_widget destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7619">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7620">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7620">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7621">**Üst** pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7621">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7622">**text_id** İstem metninin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7622">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7623">**style (stil)** İstem stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7623">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7624">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7624">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7625">**prompt_id** İstem uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7625">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7626">**boyut** İstem boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7626">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7627">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7628">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı istem oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7628">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7629">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7629">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7650">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7650">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7651">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7651">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7652">Bu hizmet, tuval yenilemesi sırasında Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7652">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7671">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7671">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7672">İşlem istemi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7672">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7673">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7673">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7674">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7675">Bu hizmet, belirtilen istem için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7675">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7676">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel istem olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7676">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7677">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7678">**istemi** İstem denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7678">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7679">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7679">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7680">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7681">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı istem olayı işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7681">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7685">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7685">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7686">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7686">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7687">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7761">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7761">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7762">Çizim desteği işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7762">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7763">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7764">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7765">Bu destek işlevi bir istemin metin bölümünü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7765">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7766">Bu işlev, gx_prompt_draw () tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir istem çizimi işlevini tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7766">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7767">İstem arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar özel çizim işlevlerini sağlayabilir ve istem metnini arka planda çizmek için özel çiziminin bir parçası olarak gx_prompt_text_draw hizmetini çağırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7767">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7768">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7769">**komut istemi** İstem denetim bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7769">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7770">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7771">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7771">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7772">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7773">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7774">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7788">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7789">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7790">Bu hizmet, gx_prompt_text_get_ext() için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7790">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7791">Bu hizmet, bir istem pencere öğesi metnini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7791">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7792">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7793">**istemi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu istemi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7793">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7794">**return_text** Metin için hedefe işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7794">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7795">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7796">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı istem metni get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7796">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7799">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7800">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7801">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7801">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7816">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7817">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesinin dizesini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7817">This service gets the string of a prompt widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7820">**return_string** Dize için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7820">**return_string** Pointer to destination for string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7821">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7823">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7823">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7825">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7825">Allowed From</span></span>

