## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7866">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7866">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7867">İstem metnini ayarla (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7867">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7868">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7868">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7869">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7870">Bu hizmet gx_prompt_text_set_ext () kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7870">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7871">Bu hizmet bir istem pencere öğesinin metnini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7871">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7872">İstem pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7872">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7873">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz, bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani bu bir otomatik veya geçici değişken olmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7873">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7874">GX_PROMPT GX_WIDGET türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_widget API hizmetleri GX_PROMPT ile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7874">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7875">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7875">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7876">**komut istemi** İstem öğesi denetim bloğunun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7876">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7877">**metin** Metin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7877">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7878">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7878">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7879">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı istem metin kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7879">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7880">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7880">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7881">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7881">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7882">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek ayırma işlevi tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7882">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7883">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7883">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7884">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7884">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7885">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7885">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7886">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7886">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7958">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7959">Bu hizmet bir radyal ilerleme çubuğu arka planı çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7959">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7960">Bu hizmete gx_radial_progress_bar_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvuruluyor, ancak uygulamanın özel bir radyal ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevini tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanıma sunuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7960">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7964">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7964">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7967">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-7981">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7981">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7982">Bu hizmet radyal ilerleme çubuğu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7982">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7983">Pencere öğesi stili GX_STYLE_ENABLED ilerleme çubuğuna uygulanırsa, ilerleme çubuğu geçerli değerini değiştirmek için pen_down, pen_drag ve pen_up girişi kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7983">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-7984">Pencere öğesi GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW, ilerleme çubuğu değerini ilerleme çubuğu alanında metin olarak çizmeyi etkinleştirmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7984">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7985">Bu stil, stil çubuğu GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT birlikte kullanılırsa, ilerleme çubuğu değeri yüzde olarak görüntülenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7985">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7986">Aksi takdirde ilerleme çubuğu değeri geçerli angular değer olarak görüntülenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7986">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7994">**style (stil)** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu stili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7994">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7995">**id** İlerleme çubuğunun Uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7995">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-7999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-7999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8000">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8000">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8001">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8001">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8002">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8003">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8003">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8004">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8004">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8042">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8043">Bu hizmet radyal bir ilerleme çubuğu olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8043">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8044">Bu işlev, gx_radial_progress_bar_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvurulsa da, uygulamanın özel radyal ilerleme durumu olay işleme işlevini tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanım için açığa çıkar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8044">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8045">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8047">**event_ptr** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8047">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8048">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8048">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8050">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8050">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8051">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8051">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8052">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8052">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8053">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8054">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8054">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8055">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8155">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8155">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8156">Radyal ilerleme çubuğu metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8156">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8157">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8157">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8158">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8158">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8159">Bu hizmet, belirtilen radyal ilerleme çubuğunun metnini çiziyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8159">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8160">Bu işlev, gx_radial_progress_bar_draw () bir parçası olarak dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulamanın özel bir ilerleme çubuğu çizim işlevini tanımladığı bu durumları desteklemek için uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8160">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8161">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8161">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8162">**ilerleme çubuğu** Radyal ilerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8162">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8163">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8163">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8164">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8164">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8165">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8165">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8166">Başlatma ve Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8166">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8167">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8167">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8178">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8178">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8179">Radyal ilerleme çubuğu değerini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8179">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8180">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8181">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8182">Bu hizmet, radyal ilerleme çubuğu değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8182">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8183">Atanan değer [-360, 360] aralığı ile sınırlıdır ve ilerleme çubuğu geçerli konumu için olası Ansal değer aralığını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8183">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8184">Uygulama, ilerleme çubuğu pencere öğesine angular değeri atamak için belirtilen gerçek uluslararası değeri ölçeklendirmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8184">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8185">İlerleme çubuğu, geçerli değerin, üst yayı yer işareti konumu ve bitiş noktası arasındaki açısal değişikliği gösterdiği şekilde çizilir. Negatif değerler, Arc konumundan başlayarak saat yönünde bir yönde çizilmesine neden olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8185">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8186">Pozitif geçerli değer, bağlayıcının bağlantı konumundan başlayan saat yönünde bir yönde çizilmesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8186">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8187">Örneğin, yay üst kısmından başlayarak (saat 12 o'clock konumu) ve sağdan (üç o'saat konumu) biten bir yay çizmek için, 90 derece sabit noktası değeri ve geçerli bir -90 derece değeri atatın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8187">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8188">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8189">**ilerleme** çubuğu Radyal ilerleme çubuğu denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8189">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8190">**value (değer)** Yeni ilerleme çubuğu değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8190">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8191">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal ilerleme çubuğu değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçiler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8196">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8197">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8198">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8198">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8209">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8209">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8210">Radyo düğmesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8210">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8211">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8211">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8212">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8212">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8213">Bu hizmet bir radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8213">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8214">GX_RADIO_BUTTON GX_TEXT_BUTTON türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_text_button hizmetleri de bu pencere öğesi türü tarafından desteklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8214">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8215">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8215">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8216">**düğme** Radyo düğmesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8216">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8217">**ad** Radyo düğmesi pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8217">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8218">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8218">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8219">**text_id** Radyo düğmesinin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8219">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8220">**Stil** Radyo düğmesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8220">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8221">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8221">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8222">**radio_button_id** Uygulama tanımlı radyo düğmesi KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8222">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8223">**Boyut** Radyo düğmesinin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8223">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8224">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8224">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8225">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı radyo düğmesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8225">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8227">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8227">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8228">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8228">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8229">**GX_INVALID_** Boyut (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8229">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8230">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8230">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8231">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8231">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8249">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8249">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8250">Radyo düğmesi çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8250">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8251">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8252">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8253">Bu hizmet bir radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8253">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8254">Bu hizmet GUIX tuval yenilemesi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak geçersiz kılma çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8254">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8255">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8255">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8256">**düğme** Radyo düğmesi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8256">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8257">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8258">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8258">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8259">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8260">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8260">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8261">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8261">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8276">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8276">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8277">Radyo düğmesi için pixelmaps ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8277">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8278">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8278">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8279">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8279">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8280">Bu hizmet, her düğme durumu için belirtilen radyo düğmesi tarafından görüntülenecek pixelmaps 'ı atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8280">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8281">Kaynak kimlikleri yinelenebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8281">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8282">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8283">**off_id** Radyo düğmesi kapalı durumu için kullanılan pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8283">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8284">**on_id** Durum üzerinde radyo düğmesi için pixelmap kullanıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8284">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8285">**off_disabled_id** Radyo düğmesi devre dışı ve kapalı durumu için kullanılan pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8285">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8286">**on_disabled_id** Radyomap radyo düğmesi devre dışı ve durum durumunda kullanıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8286">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8287">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8287">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı radyo düğmesi pixelmaps kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8291">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8291">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8292">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8292">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8293">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8293">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8294">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8294">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8309">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8309">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8310">Radyal kaydırıcı yer çubuğu listesini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8310">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8311">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8312">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8313">Bu hizmet, radyal kaydırıcı için bağlantı açılarını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8313">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8314">Çapa açısı listesi ayarlandıysa, radyal kaydırıcı açısı tanımlı çapa açılarının biri olacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8314">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8315">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8316">**kaydırıcı** Radyal kaydırıcı denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8316">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8317">**anchor_angles** Ayarlanacak açı listesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8317">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8318">**anchor_count** Çapa açılarının sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8318">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8319">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8319">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8320">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bağlayıcı açısı kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8320">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8323">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz bağlantı listesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8323">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8324">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8325">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8325">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8326">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8326">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8337">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8337">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8339">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8341">Bu hizmet radyal kaydırıcı için yeni açı değeri ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8341">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8343">**kaydırıcı** Radyal kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8343">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8345">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8345">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8346">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı radyal kaydırıcı açı kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8346">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8348">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8348">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8349">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8349">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8350">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8350">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8351">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8351">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8352">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8352">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8363">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8363">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8364">Radyal kaydırıcı animasyon bilgisi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8364">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8365">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8367">Bu hizmet, radyal kaydırıcı iğne animasyonu için animasyon adımlarını, gecikme süresini ve animasyon stillerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8367">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8370">**adımlar** Tek animasyon için toplam adım</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8370">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8371">**gecikme** Her animasyon adımı için gecikme süresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8371">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8372">**animation_style** Kolaylaştırıcı işlev türü şunları içerir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8372">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8373">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8373">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8374">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8374">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8375">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8375">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8377">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8377">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8379">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8379">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8411">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8411">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

```C
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
```

```C
    GX_WIDGET *parent,

    ULONG style,

    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8451">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8451">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8456">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8456">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8457">**info (bilgi)** Radyal kaydırıcı görünüm tanımı, **Ek I,** veri GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8457">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8458">**Stil** Radyo düğmesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8458">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8459">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8459">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8460">**radio_button_id** Radyal kaydırıcının uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8460">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8461">**Boyut** Radyal kaydırıcı boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8461">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8462">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8462">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8465">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8465">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8466">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8466">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8467">**GX_INVALID_** Boyut (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8467">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8468">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8468">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8469">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8470">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8470">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8471">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8471">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8485">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8486">Bu hizmet radyal kaydırıcıyı çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8486">This service draws a radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8487">Bu hizmet GUIX tuval yenilemesi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak geçersiz kılma çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8487">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8506">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8506">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8507">Radyal kaydırıcı olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8507">Process radial slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8508">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8508">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8509">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8509">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8510">Bu hizmet bir radyal kaydırıcı olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8510">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8511">Bu hizmet özel bir radyal kaydırıcı olay işleme işlevleri tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8511">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8512">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8512">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8513">**kaydırıcı** Radyal kaydırıcı denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8513">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8514">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8514">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8515">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı radyal kaydırıcı olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8520">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8521">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8522">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8569">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8569">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8571">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8572">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8573">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8573">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8611">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8611">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8613">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8613">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8614">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8614">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8615">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde zengin metin görünümü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8615">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8616">**Biçimlendirme etiketleri metin için özel türleri göstermek için kullanılır:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8616">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8617">**\<b>\</b>** Metin yazı tipini Kullanıcı tarafından belirtilen kalın yazı tipi kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8617">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8618">**\<i>\</i>** Metin yazı tipini Kullanıcı tarafından belirtilen italik yazı tipi kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8618">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8619">**\<u>\</u>** Metnin altını çizmeyi etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8619">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8620">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Metin yazı tipini belirtilen yazı tipi kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8620">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8621">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Metin yazı tipini belirtilen renk kimliğiyle ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8621">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8622">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Metin vurgulama rengini belirtilen renk kimliğini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8622">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8623">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Metin hizalamasını ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8623">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8624">**Biçimlendirme etiketi kullanımı örnekleri:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8624">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8625">\<b>Bu,< \b metin></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8625">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8626">\<i>Bu,< \i> italik metindir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8626">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8627">\<u>Bu metin< \u> altı çizili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8627">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8628">\<f 0>Bu metin yazı tipi kimliği 0< \f olarak ayarlanmıştır></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8628">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8629">\<c 1>Bu metin rengi kimliği 1< \C olarak ayarlanmıştır></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8629">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8630">\<hc 2>Bu metin vurgu rengi kimliği 2< \hc olarak ayarlanmıştır></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8630">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8631">\<align left> Bu metin, \ align< sola hizalı></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8631">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8632">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8632">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8633">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8633">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8634">**ad** Zengin metin görünümünün adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8634">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8635">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8635">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8636">**text_id** Metin dizesinin kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8636">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8637">**yazı tipleri** Zengin metin görünümü yazı tipi bilgileri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8637">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8638">**Apendix I,** bir GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8638">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8639">**style (stil)** Pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8639">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8640">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8640">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8641">**kimlik** Zengin metin görünümünün Uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8641">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8642">**boyut** Zengin metin görünümünün boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8642">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8643">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı zengin metin görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8647">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8647">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8648">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8648">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8649">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8650">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8650">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8651">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8651">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8657">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8657">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8658">Zengin metin görünümü çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8658">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8660">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8661">Bu hizmet, belirtilen zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8661">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8662">Bu hizmet, genellikle bir tuval yenileme işleminin parçası olarak Gux tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir çizim işlevi sağlamak ve varsayılan zengin metin görünümü çizimini özel çizim temeli olarak çağırmak isteyebileceğiniz uygulamaya de sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8662">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8663">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8664">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8664">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8665">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8666">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8666">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8667">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8667">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8668">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8668">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8669">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8669">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8695">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8695">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8696">Zengin metin görünümü metni çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8696">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8697">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8697">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8698">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8698">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8699">Bu destek işlevi, zengin metin görünümünün metin bölümünü çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8699">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8700">Bu işlev, gx_rich_text_view_draw() tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel zengin metin görünümü çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık sağlamak amacıyla ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8700">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8701">Zengin metin görünümü arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevini sağlar ve arka planda zengin metin görünümü metnini çizmek için gx_rich_text_view_text_draw hizmetini özel çizimlerinin bir parçası olarak çağırabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8701">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8702">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8702">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8703">**text_view** Zengin metin görünümü pencere öğesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8703">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8704">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8704">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8705">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8705">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8706">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8706">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8707">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8707">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8708">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8708">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8713">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8713">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8714">Ekran yığını başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8714">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8715">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8715">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8716">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8716">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8717">Bu hizmet bir ekran yığınını başlatıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8717">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8718">Uygulama, ekran yığını özelliğini uygulamak için kullanılan bellek bloğu ve arabellek boyutunu tanımlamalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8718">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8719">*Bu API artık kullanılmıyor ve gx_system_screen_stack_create() ile değiştirildi. Bu sürüm yalnızca önceki kitaplık sürümleriyle geriye dönük uyumluluk için sağlanır.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8719">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8720">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8720">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8721">**denetim** Ekran yığını denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8721">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8722">**memory_buffer** Ekran yığını olarak kullanılan bellek arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8722">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8723">**buffer_size** Bayt cinsinden bellek boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8723">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8724">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8724">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8725">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ekran yığını oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8725">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8727">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) geçersiz arabellek boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8727">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8728">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8728">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8729">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8729">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8730">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8730">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```
