## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8735">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8735">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8736">Ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8736">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8737">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8737">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8738">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8738">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8739">Bu hizmet, ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi kaldırır ve önceki üst öğesine açılan ekranı ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8739">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8740">Bu API aynı zamanda var olan alt öğeleri üst öğeden ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8740">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8741">*Bu API kullanım dışı bırakılmış ve gx_system_screen_stack_pop () ile değiştirilmiştir. Bu sürüm yalnızca önceki kitaplık sürümleriyle geriye dönük uyumluluk için sağlanır.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8741">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8742">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8743">**Denetim** Ekran yığını denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8743">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8744">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8744">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ekran yığını açılan kutusu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8746">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8746">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8747">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8747">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8748">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8748">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8749">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8749">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8750">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8750">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8755">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8755">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8756">Anında görüntü ekranı ve üstleri yığına</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8756">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8757">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8758">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8759">Bu hizmet ekranı üst öğesinden ayırır ve ekran işaretçisini ve üst işaretçiyi ekran yığınına iletir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8759">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8760">Yeni ekran işaretçisi daha sonra üst öğeye iliştirilmiş olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8760">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8838">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8838">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8839">Bu hizmet, kaydırma çubuğu parmak tekerleğine gönderilen olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8839">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8840">Bu hizmet normalde GUIX tarafından dahili olarak kullanılır, ancak özel kaydırma çubuğu davranışlarının uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak için genel olarak kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8840">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8841">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8841">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8842">**scroll_thumb** Kaydırma pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8842">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8843">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8843">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8844">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8844">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı kaydırma parmak olayı işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8849">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8849">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8850">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8850">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8851">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8851">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8855">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8855">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8856">Temel kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8856">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8858">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8859">Bu hizmet bir temel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8859">This service creates a base scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8860">Taban kaydırma tekerleği, **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** ve **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** pencere öğeleri için temel olan **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** ve **gx_text_scroll_wheel** dahil olmak üzere tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türlerinin temel pencere öğesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8860">A base scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** and **gx_text_scroll_wheel** which is the base for **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** and **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8861">Taban kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi, tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri için olay işleme, kayan animasyon ve seçilen satır hesaplamasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8861">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8862">Bu pencere öğesi türü çizim işlevi sunmadığından, uygulamalar Normalde genel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin bir örneğini oluşturmamalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8862">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8863">Ancak, özel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türü oluşturması gereken uygulamalara yardımcı olmak için bu API 'ye erişim sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8863">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8864">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_WINDOW tabanlıdır ve bu nedenle tüm GX_WINDOW API 'Leri GX_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilen GX_SCROLL_WHEEL ve pencere öğeleri ile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8864">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8865">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8865">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8866">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8866">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8867">**ad** Uygulama tarafından atanan pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8867">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8868">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8868">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8869">**total_rows** Toplam kullanılabilir satır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8869">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8870">**Stil** Pencere öğesi stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8870">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8871">**Id** Uygulama tarafından atanan pencere öğesi kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8871">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8872">**boyut** İlk pencere öğesi boyutunu tanımlayan dikdörtgen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8872">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8873">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8873">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8874">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kaydırma tekerleği başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8874">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8875">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8875">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8876">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8876">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8877">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8877">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8878">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8878">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8880">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8881">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8882">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8882">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8902">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8902">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8903">Genel kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi için olay işleme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8903">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8904">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8904">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8905">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8906">Bu hizmet, tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türleri için temel giriş olay işlemesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8906">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8907">Bu işlev, özel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi türü oluşturması gereken uygulamalarla yardım etmek için uygulama yazılımına sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8907">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8908">Uygulamalar genellikle kendi olay işleme işlevini sağlar, ancak özelleştirme gerektirmeyen olaylar için, tekerlek pencere öğeleri için genel olay işlemeyi çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8908">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8909">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8909">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8910">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8910">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8911">**olay** GX_EVENT işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8911">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8912">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8912">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tekerlek olay işlemini başarıyla kaydır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8916">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8916">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8917">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8917">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8918">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8918">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8919">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8919">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8939">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8939">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8940">İsteğe bağlı kaplama gradyanı için gradyan alfa değerleri atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8940">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8941">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8942">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8943">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin isteğe bağlı gradyan kaplaması için başlangıç ve bitiş Alfa değerlerini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8943">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8944">Tüm kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğeleri, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin üst ve alt kenarının yakınında bulunan satırlar olarak kaydırma tekerleği satırlarının "belirme" efektini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8944">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8945">Bu geçişli efekt, kaydırma tekerleği satırları üzerinde bir gradyan pixelmap çizerek, satırlar, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin üst ve alt kısmına yakın bir şekilde çizilerek satırları soluklaştırmak üzere çizerek gerçekleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8945">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8946">Bu API hizmeti, uygulamanın Soldurma efektinin yoğunluğunu değiştirmesine izin verir veya başlangıç ve bitiş Alfa değerlerini 0 olarak ayarlayarak bu etkiyi tamamen devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8946">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8947">Gradyan pixelmap, kaydırma tekerleği başlangıçta görünür hale geldiğinde çalışma zamanında oluşturulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8947">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8948">Bunun için _gx_system_memory_allocator_set () kullanılarak bir çalışma zamanı bellek ayırma hizmeti tanımlanmış olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8948">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8949">Hiç bellek ayırıcı işlevi tanımlanmamışsa, gradyan görüntü oluşturulmaz ve bir azalma efekti kullanılabilir olmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8949">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8950">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8951">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8951">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8952">**start_alpha** Kaplama gradyanı başlayan alfa değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8952">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8953">**end_alpha** Kaplama gradyanı bitiş alfa değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8953">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8954">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8954">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği gradyan Alpha 'ı başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8958">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8959">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8959">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8960">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8960">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8961">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8961">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8981">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8981">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8982">Her tekerlek satırı için satır yüksekliğini atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8982">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8983">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8983">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8984">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8984">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8985">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her satırı için satır yüksekliğini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8985">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8986">Kaydırma tekerleğinde stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, satır yüksekliğinin bir dönüştürmeden geçerek satır, tekerleğin üst veya alt kenarına yaklaşarak satır yüksekliğini etkili bir şekilde azaltıyor olduğunu unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8986">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8987">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8988">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8988">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8989">**row_height** Piksel cinsinden satır yüksekliği değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8989">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8990">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8990">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8991">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kaydırma tekerleği yüksekliğini başarıyla ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8991">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-8994">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8994">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8995">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-8996">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-8997">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-8997">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9017">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9017">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9018">Tekerlek seçili satırı için arka plan görüntüsü atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9018">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9019">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9020">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9021">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin seçili satırı arkasında çizilen isteğe bağlı bir piksel haritası kimliği atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9021">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9022">Bu, kullanıcının kaydırma tekerleğinin hangi satırın seçili olduğunu kolayca ayırt etmek için seçilen satırı vurgulamak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9022">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9023">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9024">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9024">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9025">**image_id** Seçilen satır arka plan görüntüsü olarak kullanmak üzere Piksel Haritası kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9025">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9026">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kaydırma tekerleği arka planını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9028">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9028">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9031">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9032">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9033">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9033">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9053">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9053">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9054">Şu anda seçili olan tekerlek satırını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9054">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9055">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9056">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9057">Bu hizmet, şu anda seçili olan satırı almak için kaydırma tekerleğini sorgular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9057">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9058">Çağıran, seçilen satır dizinini bu işleve ikinci parametre olarak döndürmek için konumu geçmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9058">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9059">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9059">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9060">**tekerlek** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9060">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9061">**satır** Seçilen satır değerinin döndürülecek konumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9061">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9062">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9062">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9063">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Seçilen tekerlek satırı başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9063">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9064">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9064">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9067">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9068">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9069">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9069">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9124">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9124">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9125">Kaydırma hızı atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9125">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9126">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9126">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9127">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9127">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9128">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi için kaydırma hızını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9128">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9129">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9130">**wheel (tekerlek)** Genel kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9130">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9131">**start_speed_rate** Kaydırma başlangıç hızını titreşim hızına oranı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9131">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9132">**end_speed_rate** Kaydırma bitiş hızını titreşim hızına oranı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9132">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9133">**max_steps** Kaydırma için en fazla adım.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9133">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9134">**gecikme** Her adımın gecikme süresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9134">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9135">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9135">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9136">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tekerlek hızını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9136">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9166">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9166">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9167">Bu hizmet, belirtilen kaydırma tekerleğinde kullanılabilen satır sayısını atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9167">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9168">Kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi genellikle bir dize dizisi veya kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan dize verileri şeklinde uygulamadaki satır içeriğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9168">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9169">Bu API, kullanıcıya sun olması gereken toplam satır sayısının kaydırma tekerleğini bilgi sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9169">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9172">**total_rows** Kullanıcıya sun biriken toplam tekerlek satırı sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9172">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9173">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9173">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9174">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kaydırma tekerleği toplam satırı başarıyla ayarlanır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9174">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9175">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9175">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9176">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9176">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9177">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9177">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9203">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9203">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9204">Bu hizmet bir kaydırma çubuğu çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9204">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9205">Hem dikey hem de yatay kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğeleri için ortak bir çizim işlevi kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9205">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9206">Bu hizmet GUIX tuval yenilemesi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak geçersiz kılma çizim işlevleri tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9206">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9221">Kaydırma çubuğu olayı işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9221">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

```C
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9224">Bu hizmet bir kaydırma çubuğu olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9224">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9225">Hem dikey hem de yatay kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğeleri için kullanılan yaygın bir olay işleme işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9225">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9226">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9228">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9228">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9229">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9229">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9230">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı kaydırma çubuğu olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9230">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9231">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9231">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9232">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9232">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9233">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9233">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9234">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9234">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9235">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9235">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9236">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9236">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9243">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9243">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9245">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_limit_check(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9246">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9247">Bu hizmet, kaydırma çubuğunun sınırını denetler ve ScrollBar parmak tekerinin önceden tanımlanmış sınırların ötesinde hareket etmesini engeller.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9247">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9248">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9248">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9250">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9251">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı kaydırma çubuğu sınırı denetimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9251">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar limit check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9253">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9253">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9254">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9254">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9264">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9264">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9265">Kaydırma çubuğunu sıfırlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9265">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9267">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9268">Bu hizmet kaydırma çubuğunu sıfırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9268">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9269">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9270">**kaydırma çubuğu** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9270">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9271">**info (bilgi)** Kaydırma çubuğu GX_SCROLL_INFO, geçerli değer ve adım veya artış tanımlayan bir yapının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9271">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9272">**Ek I,** bu yapıya GX_SCROLL_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9272">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9273">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı kaydırma çubuğu sıfırlaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Kaydırma bilgileri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9279">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9279">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9280">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9280">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9281">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9281">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9302">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) kaydırma değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9302">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>


- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9324">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9324">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9325">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9325">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9349">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9349">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9352">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9353">Bu hizmet, metin girişi arabelleğindeki tüm karakterleri siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9353">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9461">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9461">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9462">Geçerli imleç konumunda bir karakter dizesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9462">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9463">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9465">Bu hizmet, geçerli imleç konumundaki metin girişi dizesi arabelleğine bir karakter dizesi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9465">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9466">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9467">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9467">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9468">**insert_str** Eklenecek karakter dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9468">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9469">**insert_size** Eklenecek byte sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9469">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9470">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Karakteri başarıyla ekledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9475">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9476">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9477">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9499">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9499">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9500">Metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9500">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9501">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9502">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9503">Bu hizmet bir metin girişi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9503">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9504">Çağıran, giriş dizesi için depolama alanı sağlamalıdır ve en fazla dize uzunluğunu belirtmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9504">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9505">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT GX_PROMPT türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_prompt Hizmetleri GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT pencere öğeleri ile kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9505">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9506">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9506">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9507">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9507">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9508">**ad** İsteğe bağlı pencere öğesi mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9508">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9509">**parent** İsteğe bağlı üst pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9509">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9510">**input_buffer** Giriş dizesi için depolama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9510">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9511">**buffer_size** Giriş dizesi depolama alanı boyutu (bayt cinsinden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9511">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9512">**style (stil)** Metin girişi stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9512">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9513">**text_input_id** Giriş pencere öğesi isteğe bağlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9513">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9514">**boyut** İlk pencere öğesi boyutunu tanımlayan dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9514">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9515">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tek satırlı metin girişi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9519">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9519">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9520">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9520">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9522">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9523">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9523">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9524">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9524">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9548">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9550">Bu hizmet bir metin girişi pencere öğesi çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9550">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9551">Bu hizmet, genellikle tuval yenilemesi sırasında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel metin girişi çizim işlevlerinden de çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9551">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9554">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9554">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9556">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9557">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9557">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9558">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9558">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9580">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9580">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9581">Metin çizme başlangıç konumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9581">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9582">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9582">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9583">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9584">Bu hizmet, metin giriş metninin çizim başlangıç konumunu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9584">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9585">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9585">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9586">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9586">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9587">**XPos** X koordinatı içinde çizim başlangıç konumu alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9587">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9588">**yılkonumu** Y koordinatı içinde çizim başlangıç konumu alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9588">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9589">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9590">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) metin girişi imlecini başarıyla sona taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9590">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9591">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9591">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9592">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9592">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9593">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9593">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9594">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9594">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9595">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9595">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9653">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9653">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9654">Metin girişi pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9654">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9655">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9655">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9656">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9656">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9657">Bu hizmet tek satırlı metin girişi olayı işlemektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9657">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9658">Bu işlev, gx_single_line_text_input_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvurulsa da, uygulamanın özel bir tek satırlı metin girişi olay işleme işlevi tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanım için açığa çıkar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9658">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9659">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9659">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9660">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9660">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9661">**event_ptr** Veri yapısına GX_EVENT işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9661">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9662">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9662">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9663">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Metin girişi olayı başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9663">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9667">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9667">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9668">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9668">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9669">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9669">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
```
