```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9694">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9694">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9695">Bu hizmet, tek satırlık metin girişinin Fill rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9695">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9696">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9696">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9697">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9697">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9698">**normal_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi dolgusunun normal durumundaki kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9698">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9699">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9699">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9700">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9700">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9701">**selected_fill_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında pencere öğesi dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9701">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9702">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9702">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9703">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9703">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9704">**disabled_fill_color_id** Stil stili ayarlanmazken pencere öğesi dolgu GX_STYLE_ENABLED kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9704">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9705">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9705">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9706">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9706">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9707">**readonly_fill_color_id** Hem stil hem de kaynak kümesi ayar GX_STYLE_ENABLED pencere öğesi dolgu GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9707">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9708">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9708">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9709">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9709">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

```C
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9739">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9739">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9741">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9741">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9743">Bu hizmet metin girişi imleç konumunu giriş dizesinin başlangıcına taşımaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9743">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9744">Bu hizmet, ana anahtar aşağı olayı alındığında dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9744">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9748">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) İmleç giriş konuma başarıyla taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9748">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9749">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9749">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9750">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9750">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9751">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9751">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
    ULONG style);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9899">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9899">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9925">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9925">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9926">Stilleri kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9926">Remove styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9927">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9927">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9928">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9928">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9929">Bu hizmet, belirtilen stili (öğeleri) tek satırlık metin girişi pencere öğesinden kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9929">This service removes the specified style(s) from the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9930">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9931">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9931">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9932">**Stil** Kaldırılacak stil (ler).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9932">**style** Style(s) to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9933">**Ek D** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9933">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9934">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pencere öğesi içindeki stil (ler) başarıyla kaldırıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed style(s) from widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9936">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9936">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-9938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9938">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9939">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9939">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9940">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9940">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9941">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9941">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(&my_text_input,
GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK style has been successfully removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9996">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9996">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-9997">Tek satırlı metin girişi metin rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9997">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9998">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-9999">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-9999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10000">Bu hizmet, tek satırlı metin girişinin metin rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10000">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10001">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10001">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10002">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10002">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10003">**normal_text_color_id** Normal durumda metin renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10003">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10004">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10004">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10005">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10005">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,

                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10045">Metin seçme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10045">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10046">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10046">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10047">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10047">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10048">Bu hizmet, belirtilen başlangıç işareti ve bitiş işareti dizini olan metni seçer ve seçilen metni seçili dolgu ve metin renkleriyle vurgular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10048">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10049">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10050">**text_input** Tek satırlı metin girişi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10050">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10051">**start_index** Seçilen ilk karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10051">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10052">**end_index** Seçilen son karakterin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10052">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10053">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10053">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10054">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tek satırlı metin girişi metin seçimi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10054">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10056">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10056">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10058">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) dizin değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10058">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10059">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10059">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10082">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10082">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10085">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10085">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10088">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10088">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10091">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10091">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10092">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı tek satırlı metin girişi metin rengi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10092">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10093">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10093">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10096">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10096">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10097">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10097">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10099">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR new_text = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
                                        new_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10139">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10139">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10140">Kaydırıcı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10140">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10141">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10142">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10143">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcı pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10143">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10144">GX_SLIDER, GX_WIDGET türetilen ve bu nedenle tüm gx_widget API hizmetleri GX_SLIDER pencere öğeleriyle kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10144">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10145">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10146">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10146">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10147">**name**: Kaydırıcının adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10147">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10148">**parent:** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10148">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10149">**tick_count:** Kaydırıcı tık sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10149">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10150">**slider_info:** Kaydırıcı değer sınırlarını, kaydırıcı iğne boyutunu ve konumunu ve diğer kaydırıcı parametrelerini geçmek için kullanılan bir yapı olan kaydırıcı bilgisi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10150">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10151">**Ek I,** bu yapının GX_SLIDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10151">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10152">**style:** Kaydırıcı stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10152">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10153">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri ve pencere öğesine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10153">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10154">**slider_id**: uygulama TANıMLı kaydırıcının kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10154">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10155">**Boyut**: kaydırıcının boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10155">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10156">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10156">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10157">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10157">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10158">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10158">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10159">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10159">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10160">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10160">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10162">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10162">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10163">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10163">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10164">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10164">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10165">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10165">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10180">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10180">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10181">Kaydırıcıyı çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10181">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10182">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10182">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10183">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10183">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10184">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcıyı çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10184">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10185">Bu hizmet, gx_slider_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak kullanılır, ancak özel bir kaydırıcı çizim işlevi tanımlandığı zaman bu örneklerde uygulama tarafından da kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10185">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10186">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10186">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10187">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10187">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10188">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10188">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10189">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10189">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10190">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10190">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10191">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10191">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10192">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10192">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10207">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10207">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10208">İşlem kaydırıcı olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10208">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10209">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10209">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10210">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10210">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10211">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcı olayını işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10211">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10212">Bu işleve gx_slider_create işlevi tarafından dahili olarak başvurulur, ancak uygulamanın özel bir kaydırıcı olay işleme işlevini tanımladığı durumlarda uygulama tarafından kullanıma sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10212">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10213">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10213">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10214">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10214">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10215">**olay**: işlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10215">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10216">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10217">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10217">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10218">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10218">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10219">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10219">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10220">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10220">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10221">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10221">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10222">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10222">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10223">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10223">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10238">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10238">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10239">Kaydırıcı bilgi bloğu ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10239">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10240">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10240">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10241">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10241">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10242">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı minimum, kaydırıcı maksimum ve kaydırıcı geçerli değeri gibi belirtilen kaydırıcı bilgilerini belirtilen kaydırıcıya atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10242">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10243">Kaydırıcı, iğne konumunu güncelleştirecek ve yeni kaydırıcı bilgilerine göre yeniden çizecek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10243">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10244">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10244">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10245">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10245">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10246">**info:** Kaydırıcı bilgi yapısının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10246">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10247">**Ek I,** bu yapının GX_SLIDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10247">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10248">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10248">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10249">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırıcı bilgilerini başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10249">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10250">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10250">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10251">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10251">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10252">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10252">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10253">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10253">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10254">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10254">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10255">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10255">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10270">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10270">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10271">Çiz kaydırıcı iğne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10271">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10272">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10272">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10273">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10274">Bu hizmet bir kaydırıcı iğne çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10274">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10275">Bu hizmet gx_slider_draw işlevi tarafından otomatik olarak çağrılır, ancak özelleştirilmiş kaydırıcı çizim işlevinin bir parçası olarak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10275">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10276">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10276">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10277">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10277">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10278">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10279">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10279">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10280">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10280">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10281">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10281">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10282">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10282">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10297">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10297">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10298">Kaydırıcı iğne konumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10298">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10299">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10299">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10300">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10301">Bu hizmet, geçerli kaydırıcı değerine göre kaydırıcı iğne konumunu hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10301">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10302">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10302">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10303">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10303">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10304">**slider_info:** Kaydırıcı sınırlarını, iğne boyutunu ve uzaklığı ve diğer kaydırıcı parametrelerini tanımlayan kaydırıcı bilgi yapısı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10304">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10305">**Ek I,** bu yapının GX_SLIDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10305">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10306">**return_position:** Iğne konumu için hedefe işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10306">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10307">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10308">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı iğne konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10308">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10309">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10309">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10310">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10310">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10312">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) kaydırıcı bilgisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10312">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10313">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10314">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10315">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10315">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10330">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10330">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10331">Kaydırıcı onay işaretlerini çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10331">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10332">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10333">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10334">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı onay işaretlerini çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10334">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10335">Bu işlev, gx_slider_draw işlevi tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel kaydırıcı çizim işlevi uygulayan uygulamalar tarafından kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10335">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10336">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10337">**kaydırıcı:** Kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10337">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10338">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10339">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10339">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10340">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10341">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10341">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10342">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10342">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10359">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10359">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10360">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10361">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı gezmasını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10361">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10362">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10362">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10363">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10363">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10364">**bilgi**: kaydırıcı bilgi yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10364">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10365">**Ek ı** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10365">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10366">**return_min_travel**: en düşük seyahat değeri için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10366">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10367">**return_max_travell**: en yüksek seyahat değeri için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10367">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10368">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10368">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10369">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı kaydırıcı seyahat al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10369">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10370">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10370">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10371">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10371">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10372">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10372">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10373">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) kaydırıcı bilgisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10373">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10374">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10374">Allowed From</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10394">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10394">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10395">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı değerini kaydırıcı iğne konumunu temel alarak hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10395">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10396">Bu işlev, kullanıcı kaydırıcı iğnesini hareket ettir ettiğinde GUIX tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel bir kaydırıcı pencere öğesi uygulanırken uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10396">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10397">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10397">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10399">**info:** Kaydırıcı bilgisi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10399">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10400">**Ek I,** bu yapıya GX_LISDER_INFO içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10400">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10401">**new_position:** Yeni kaydırıcı konumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10401">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10402">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10403">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı değeri hesaplama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10403">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10405">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10407">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Kaydırıcı bilgileri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10407">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10408">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10408">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10425">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10425">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10426">Kaydırıcı değerini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10426">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10427">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10428">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10429">Bu hizmet kaydırıcı değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10429">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10430">Bu API, uygulama tarafından, kaydırıcı iğne 'yi sürüklemek için Kullanıcı girişi gereksinimini atlayarak program denetimi altına bir kaydırıcı iğne taşımak için çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10430">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10431">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10431">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10432">**kaydırıcı**: kaydırıcı pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10432">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10433">**bilgi**: kaydırıcı bilgi yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10433">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10434">**Ek I,** GX_SLIDER_INFO yapısının tanımını içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10434">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10435">**new_value:** Yeni kaydırıcı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10435">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10436">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10436">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10437">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kaydırıcı değer kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10439">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10440">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10440">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10441">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10442">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10443">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10458">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10458">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10459">Bir sprite pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10459">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10462">Bu hizmet bir GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10462">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10463">Bir sprite, bir animasyon içinde olan bir veya birden çok durumlu pixelmap görüntüleme pencere öğesi olarak kullanılabilecek bir dizi pixelharita göstermek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10463">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10464">GX_SPRITE GX_WIDGET türetilir ve tüm gx_widget API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10464">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10465">GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi, SPRITE animasyonunu tanımlamak için GX_SPRITE_FRAME yapılarından oluşan bir dizi gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10465">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10466">**Ek ı** GX_PRITE_FRAME yapısına yönelik tanımı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10467">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10468">**Sprite**: sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10468">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10469">**ad**: isteğe bağlı Sprite adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10469">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10470">**Parent**: üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10470">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10471">**frame_list**: GX_SPRITE_FRAME yapılarının dizisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10471">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10472">**frame_count**: Çerçeve listesi dizisindeki giriş sayısını belirtir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10472">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10473">**Stil**: sprite stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10473">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10474">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stilleri ve pencere öğesine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10474">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10475">**sprite_id**: uygulama TANıMLı Sprite kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10475">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10476">**Boyut**: Hareketli grafiğin boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10476">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10477">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarıyla Sprite oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10483">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10484">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10485">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10485">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10491">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10491">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10492">Sprite çerçevesi atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10492">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10495">Bu hizmet geçerli sprite çerçevesini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10495">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10496">Bir GX_SPRITE pencere öğesi otomatik olarak çalışmıyorsa, program tarafından denetlenen durum ışığı olarak kullanılabilir ve komut satırı piksel haritası görüntülenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10496">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10497">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10497">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10498">**sprite:** Sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10498">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10499">**frame:** Görüntü için Sprite çerçevesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10499">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10500">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10501">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10501">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10503">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10503">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10505">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10506">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10513">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10513">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10514">Bir sprite çerçeve listesi atama veya değiştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10514">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10515">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10516">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10517">Bu hizmet, Sprite pencere öğesi oluşturulduktan sonra bir sprite pencere öğesi tarafından kullanılan çerçeve listesini atamak veya yeniden atamak için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10517">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10518">Bir sprite çerçeve listesinin içeriği hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gx_sprite_create API belgelerine bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10518">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10519">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10520">**Sprite**: sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10520">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10521">**frame_list**: GX_SPRITE_FRAME yapılarının dizisi veya çerçeve listesi yoksa GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10521">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10522">**frame_count**: Çerçeve listesi dizisindeki çerçeve sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10522">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10523">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10523">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10524">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı Sprite çerçeve listesi kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10524">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10526">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10526">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10528">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10529">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10529">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10530">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10530">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10531">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10531">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10532">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10532">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10533">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10533">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10535">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10535">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10536">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10536">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10537">Sprite çalıştırma sırası başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10537">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10538">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10538">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10539">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10539">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10540">Bu hizmet bir sprite otomatik çalıştırma sırası başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10540">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10541">Sprite pencere öğesi, son kareye ulaşıncaya kadar sprite çerçevelerinde döngüye devam eder veya son kare stili GX_SPRITE_LOOP sürekli olarak çalıştıracak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10541">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10542">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10542">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10543">**sprite:** Sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10543">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10544">**frame:** Görüntü için ilk sprite çerçevesi, genellikle 0 karesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10544">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10545">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10546">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Sprite çalıştırması başarıyla başlatıldı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10546">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10548">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10548">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10549">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10549">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10550">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10551">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10551">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10552">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10552">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10553">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10553">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10558">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10558">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10559">Sprite çalıştırma dizisini durdurma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10559">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10560">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10561">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10562">Bu hizmet, sprite otomatik çalıştırma sırasını durdurur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10562">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10563">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10564">**sprite:** Sprite pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10564">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10565">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10565">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10566">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Sprite çalıştırmasını başarıyla durdurdu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10566">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10568">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10568">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10569">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10569">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10570">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10571">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10572">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */
status = gx_sprite_stop(&my_sprite);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```
