## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10578">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10578">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10579">Dize türü kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10579">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10580">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10580">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10581">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10582">Bu hizmet bir dize türü kaydırma tekerleği oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10582">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10583">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL türetilir ve bu nedenle tüm gx_text_scroll_wheel API işlevleri GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL pencere öğeleri ile birlikte kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10583">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10584">Uygulama, kaydırma tekerleği tarafından görüntülenecek dizeleri tanımlayan oluşturma işlevine basit bir dize dizisi geçirebilir veya uygulama, string_list parametresi olarak GX_NULL geçirebilir ve `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` dize kimlikleri dizisi sağlamak üzere API 'yi çağırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10584">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10585">İkinci yöntem kullanılırsa, dize kaydırma tekerleği, etkin uygulama dili değiştirilirse, görüntülenecek dizeleri otomatik olarak geçer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10585">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10586">Alternatif olarak, görüntülenecek dizeler, kaydırma tekerleği oluşturulduğu sırada statik olarak tanımlanmazsa veya bilmiyor ise, uygulama GX_NULL dize listesi parametresi olarak geçirebilir ve bir geri çağırma işlevi tanımlamak için gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set () API işlevini çağırıp, dizelerin gerçek zamanlı olarak görüntülenmesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10586">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10587">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10588">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10588">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10589">**ad**: uygulama tanımlı pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10589">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10590">**üst öğe**: tekerlek üstü veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10590">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10591">**total_rows**: kullanıcıya sunulacak toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10591">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10592">**string_list:** Statik olarak tanımlanmış dize dizisi veya GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10592">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10593">**style:** İstenen stil bayrakları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10593">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10594">**Kimlik:** Uygulama tanımlı tekerlek stili bayraklar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10594">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10595">**boyut:** İlk kaydırma tekerleği boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10595">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10596">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10597">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Dize kaydırma tekerleği başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10597">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10599">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10599">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10600">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10600">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10601">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10601">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10604">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10604">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10626">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10626">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10629">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10630">**tekerlek** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10630">**wheel** Pointer to string scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10631">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10631">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10632">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10632">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı dize kaydırma tekerleği olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10637">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10638">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10638">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10639">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10696">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10696">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10697">Dize dizisi atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10697">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10698">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10698">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10699">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10700">Bu, bir dize kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesine dize dizisi atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10700">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10701">Bu, pencere öğesi oluşturulduktan sonra görüntülenen dizeleri değiştirmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10701">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10702">Bu string_scroll_wheel işlevinin GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY desteklemez ve bu nedenle bu işleve geçirilen dize dizisi uygulama tarafından statik olarak tanımlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10702">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10703">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10703">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10704">**wheel:** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10704">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10705">**string_list:** Dize işaretçileri dizisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10705">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10706">**string_count:** Dize dizisinin boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10706">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10707">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10708">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırma tekerleği için dizeler başarıyla değiştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10708">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10710">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10710">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10712">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) geçersiz dize listesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10712">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10713">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10713">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10714">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10714">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10715">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10715">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10734">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10734">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10735">Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasında tanımlanan pencere öğesi oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10735">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10736">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10736">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10737">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10737">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10738">Bu hizmet, GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasında tanımlanan bir pencere öğesi belirtimi kullanarak bir pencere öğesi ve pencere öğesi öğelerini oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10738">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10739">Bu işlev, benzer işlevin "adına göre" aramadan `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` kaçınıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10739">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10740">Bu GX_STUDIO_WIDGET, GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan uygulama belirtimleri üst bilgi dosyasında tanımlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10740">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10741">Statik olarak ayrılan pencere öğeleri için pencere öğesi denetim bloğu, oluşturulan specifications.c dosyasında tanımlanır ve GUIX Studio'da tanımlanan pencere öğesi adı verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10741">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10742">Dinamik olarak ayrılan pencere öğeleri için, uygulamanın GX_NULL denetim bloğu adresi olarak GX_NULL geçmesi gerekir ve işlev, tarafından da tanımlanan ve uygulama tarafından sağlanan işlevini kullanarak pencere öğesi denetim bloğunun dinamik olarak `gx_system_memory_allocate()` ayırmayı denemesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10742">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10743">Bir uygulamanın oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasındaki GUIX Studio pencere öğesi tanımına doğrudan başvurarak GUI Studio kod oluşturucu tarafından kullanılan adlandırma kuralını izlemesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10743">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10744">specifications.c dosyasında oluşturulan GX_STUDIO_WIDGET yapısı her zaman şu kurala göre adlandırılmıştır: <widget_name>_define, burada <widget_name> alanı, pencere öğesi bir alt pencere öğesi alt öğesi ise birden çok kez yinelenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10744">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10745">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10746">**denetim** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi veya GX_NULL olarak ayrılmışsa bu işaretçiyi seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10746">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10747">**tanım** Studio tarafından oluşturulan pencere öğesi tanımı yapısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10747">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10748">**varsa,** pencere öğesi üst işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10748">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10749">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10749">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10750">Oluşturulan pencere öğesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi veya GX_NULL başarılı olmadıktan sonra bu işaretçiyi seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10750">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10751">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10751">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10752">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10752">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10753">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10753">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10755">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10755">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10759">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10759">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10760">Bu hizmet, GUIX Studio tarafından oluşturulan belirtimler dosyasında tanımlanan bir pencere öğesi belirtimi kullanarak bir pencere öğesi ve pencere öğesi öğelerini oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10760">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10761">Bu API işlevi, pencere öğesi tanım tanımlayıcısı olarak Gux Studio uygulamasında belirtilen ekran adını kullanarak en üst düzey ekranları oluşturmak için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10761">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10762">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10762">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10763">**ad**: ekran adı Gux Studio uygulaması içinde tanımlandığı şekilde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10763">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10764">**Parent**: varsa pencere öğesi üst öğesine işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10764">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10765">**new_widget**: oluşturulan pencere öğesi işaretçisini döndürecek konum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10765">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10766">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10767">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10767">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10768">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) adlandırılmış pencere öğesi bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10768">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10769">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10769">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10770">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10770">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10771">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10771">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10774">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10774">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10775">GUX Studio projesinde tanımlanan ekranı Yapılandır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10775">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10776">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10776">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10777">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10777">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10778">Bu hizmet, kullanıma hazırlanabilmesi için bir GX_DISPLAY başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10778">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10779">Bu işlev, GX_DISPLAY bir denetim bloğu başlatmak, ekrana sığacak bir tuval oluşturmak ve tuval için bir kök pencere oluşturmak üzere işlevleri birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10779">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10780">Bu işlev Ayrıca, görüntüleme başlatıldıktan sonra istenen dili ve kaynak temasını da yükleyecek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10780">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10781">Bu işlev, bir ekranı kullanıma hazırlamak için en yaygın olarak gereken programlama çabayı birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10781">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10782">İşlev, gx_display_create (), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create ve gx_window_root_create işlevlerini, diğer bir deyişle uygulama programı için gerekli olacak şekilde çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10782">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10783">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10783">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10784">**görüntüle**: Studio proje dosyasındaki görüntüleme tanımlarına karşılık gelen görüntüleme tablosuna dizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10784">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10785">**sürücü**: görüntü sürücüsü başlatma işlevine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10785">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10786">Bu işlev, GX_DISPLAY denetim bloğunun dolaylı işlev işaretçilerini başlatmak için çağrılır ve gerekli tüm donanım ayarlarını gerçekleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10786">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10787">**dil**: ilk dil tablosu dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10787">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10788">**language**: ilk tema dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10788">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10789">**root:** kök pencere adresinin veya bir değişkenin hangi değişkende GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10789">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10790">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10790">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10791">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10791">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10792">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Görüntü başlatılamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10792">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10793">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10794">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10795">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10804">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10804">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10806">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10806">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10807">Etkin dil ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10807">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10808">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10809">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10810">Bu hizmet geçerli dili ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10810">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10811">Dil dizini, uygulama dizesi tablosunda sütun sayısından az olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10811">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10812">Bu işlev, kullanımdan gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10812">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10813">Tüm yeni uygulamalar gx_display_active_langauge_set kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10813">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10814">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10814">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10815">**dil**: dil dizini, kaynak üst bilgi dosyasında tanımlı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10815">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10816">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10816">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10817">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) etkin Dili başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10817">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10818">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \* \* (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10818">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10819">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \* \* (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10819">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10820">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \* \* (0x22) geçersiz dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10820">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10821">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10821">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10822">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10822">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10823">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10823">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10828">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10828">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10829">Sistem havuzundan animasyon denetim bloğu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10829">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10832">Bu hizmet, gx_system bileşeni tarafından tutulan böyle bir denetim bloğu havuzundan bir animasyon denetim bloğu elde etmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10832">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10833">Animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu ve ilgili API hizmetleri yalnızca sabit GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 0 değeri ile tanımlandığında sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10833">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10834">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 6 ' dır, yani sistem animasyon denetim blok havuzu boyut GX_ANIMATION denetim bloğu içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10834">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10835">Bu API kullanılarak ayrılan bir animasyon denetim bloğu, animasyon tamamlanmaya çalışırsa otomatik olarak boş havuza döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10835">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10836">Animasyon gx_animation_stop kullanılarak durdurulmuşsa veya bazı döndürülen bir hata nedeniyle başlatılamazsa, Animasyon denetim bloğunun, uygulama tarafından gx_system_animation_free kullanılarak boş havuza döndürülmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10836">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10837">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10838">**animasyon**: GX_ANIMATION işaretçiyi alacak işaretçinin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10838">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10839">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10839">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10840">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) animasyon denetim bloğu başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10840">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10841">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10841">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10842">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz animasyon işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10842">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10843">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS:**(0x31) Sistem animasyon havuzu tükendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10843">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10844">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10844">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10845">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10845">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10846">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10846">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10852">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10852">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10853">Sistem havuzuna animasyon denetim bloğu geri dönme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10853">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10854">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10856">Bu hizmet, sistem havuzuna bir animasyon denetim bloğu dönmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10856">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10857">Animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu ve ilgili API hizmetleri yalnızca sabit GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 0 değeriyle tanımlandığı zaman sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10857">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10858">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 6'dır, yani sistem animasyon denetim bloğu havuzu, denetim bloğuna GX_ANIMATION içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10858">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10859">Animasyon tamamlanacak şekilde çalıştırılırsa gx_system_animation_get() kullanılarak ayrılan bir animasyon denetim bloğu otomatik olarak ücretsiz havuza döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10859">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10860">Ücretsiz havuza zaten döndürülen ücretsiz havuza bir animasyon denetim bloğu döndürülerek herhangi bir etkisi olmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10860">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10861">Animasyon gx_animation_stop kullanılarak durdurulursa veya döndürülen bir hata nedeniyle başlatılamezse, gx_system_animation_get() kullanılarak elde edilen animasyon denetim bloğu gx_system_animation_free() kullanılarak uygulama tarafından ücretsiz havuza döndürülebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10861">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10862">Animasyonun boş havuza döndürülmeden önce BOŞTA durumda olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10862">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10863">Animasyon, başlatılmasa, durdurulurken veya tamamlandıktan sonra boşta durumdadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10863">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10864">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10865">**animation:** Denetim bloğuna GX_ANIMATION işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10865">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10866">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10866">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10867">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully çıkarılan animasyon bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10867">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10868">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10868">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10869">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz animasyon işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10869">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10870">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) animasyon boşta değil veya sistem havuzundan ayrılmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10870">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10871">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10872">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10872">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10873">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10873">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10879">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10879">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10880">Dinamik iki yönlü metin desteğini devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10880">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10881">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10882">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10883">Bu hizmet, dinamik iki yönlü metin desteğini devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10883">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10884">Bu hizmet, Gux kitaplığı oluşturulurken GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT tanımlanması gerekir ve yalnızca BiDi dize verilerinin çalışma zamanı yeniden sıralanması gerekliyse gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10884">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10885">Çoğu uygulama, doğru reorderd BiDi metin dizelerini oluşturmak için Gux Studio 'Yu kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10885">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10886">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10886">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10887">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10887">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10888">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10888">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10889">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bidi metin desteğini başarıyla devre dışı bıraktı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10889">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10890">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10891">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10892">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_disable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10899">Bu hizmet dinamik çift yönlü metin desteği sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10899">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10900">Bu hizmet GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT GUIX kitaplığını derleme sırasında tanımlanmalıdır ve yalnızca BiDi dize verilerini yeniden sıralamak için çalışma zamanı gerektiğinde gereklidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10900">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10901">Çoğu uygulama, doğru şekilde yeniden sıralandırilmiş BiDi metin dizeleri üretmek için GUIX Studio kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10901">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10906">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10906">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10911">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10911">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10912">Tüm kirli tuvalleri yenileme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10912">Refresh all dirty canvases</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10913">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10913">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_canvas_refresh(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10914">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10914">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10915">Bu hizmet, tüm kirli pencere öğelerinin ve tuvallerin hemen yeniden çizilmelerini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10915">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10916">Bu hizmet normalde GUIX sistem bileşeni tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak uygulama tarafından sistemi hemen yeniden çizen bir işlemi zorlamak için çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10916">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10917">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10917">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10918">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10918">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10919">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10920">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Animasyon bloğu başarıyla yayınlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10921">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS:**(0x20) Tuval oluşturulmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10921">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10922">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10922">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10923">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10924">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10924">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10925">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10925">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Force immediate redraw operation. */
status = gx_system_canvas_refresh();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10950">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10950">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10951">İşaret alanı kirli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10951">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10952">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10954">Bu hizmet bu pencere öğesi için alanı kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10954">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10955">Bu, sistem olayı işleme tamamlandığında pencere öğesi yeniden çizi için etkili bir şekilde kuyruğa eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10955">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10956">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10956">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10957">**pencere öğesi:** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10957">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10958">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10958">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10959">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pencere öğesi kirli olarak başarıyla işaretlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10959">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10960">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10960">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10961">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10961">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10962">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10962">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10963">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10964">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10964">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10965">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10990">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10990">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10991">Kısmi alanı kirli olarak işaretle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10991">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10992">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10992">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10993">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10993">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-10994">Bu hizmet, bu pencere öğesinin kısmi alanını kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10994">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10995">Bu işlem, sistem olay işleme tamamlandığında Gux tuval yenileme işlemi tarafından yeniden çizim için pencere öğesini kuyruğa alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10995">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10996">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10996">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10997">**pencere öğesi**: pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10997">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-10998">**dirty_area**: kirli olarak işaretlemek için pencere öğesinin kirli alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10998">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-10999">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-10999">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11000">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı kısmi kirli alan işareti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11000">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11001">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11001">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11002">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11002">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11003">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11003">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11004">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz kirli alan boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11004">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11005">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11006">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11007">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11007">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11032">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11032">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11033">Çizim bağlamını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11033">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11034">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11034">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11035">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11036">Bu hizmet, geçerli çizim bağlamına bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11036">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11037">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11037">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11038">**current_context**: geçerli çizim bağlamı işaretçisi için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11038">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11039">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11039">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11040">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı geçerli bağlamı al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11040">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11041">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: 0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11041">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11042">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11042">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11043">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11043">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11044">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11044">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11069">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11069">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11070">Olayı gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11070">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11071">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11071">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11072">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11072">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11073">Bu hizmet, aynı türdeki bir olay için Gux olay kuyruğu arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11073">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11074">Aynı türde bir olay varsa, olay yükü yeni olayla eşleşecek şekilde güncelleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11074">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11075">Eşleşen bir olay bulunmazsa, yeni olayı olay sırasının sonuna eklemek için gx_system_event_send işlevi çağırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11075">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11076">Bu işlev, birden çok PEN_DRAG olayına olay sırasının doldurulmasını engellemek için hızlı dokunmatik giriş sürücüleri tarafından yaygın olarak kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11076">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11077">Bu işlev, aynı türde birden fazla olayın Gux olay kuyruğuna eklenmesini engellemek için uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11077">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11078">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11079">**olay**: olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11079">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11080">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11084">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11085">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11085">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11086">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11086">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11111">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11111">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11112">Olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11112">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11113">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11113">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11114">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11114">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11115">Bu hizmet belirtilen olayı GUIX sistem olay kuyruğuna gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11115">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11116">Yeni olay sıranın sonuna yerleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11116">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11117">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11118">**olay**: olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11118">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11119">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11121">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11121">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11122">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11122">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11123">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11124">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11125">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11150">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11150">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11151">Talep odağı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11151">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11152">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11152">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11153">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11153">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11154">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesi için odağı talep ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11154">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11155">Pencere öğesi daha önce odak noktası yoksa, bir GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11155">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11156">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11156">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11191">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11191">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11194">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11194">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11195">Bu hizmet GUIX'i başlatıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11195">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11196">Bu hizmet başka bir GUIX API'si hizmetten önce çağrılı ve sistem başlangıcında yalnızca bir kez çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11196">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11201">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR:**(0xFE) Geçersiz GX_EVENT denetim bloğu boyutu veya olay kuyruğu/mutex/iş parçacığı oluşturma işlemi başarısız oldu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11201">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11202">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11202">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11203">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11203">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11230">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11230">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11231">Etkin dil tablosunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11231">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11232">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11232">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11233">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11234">Bu hizmet, etkin dil tablosunu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11234">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11235">Bu işlev, kullanımdan gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11235">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11236">Tüm yeni uygulamalar, gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11236">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11237">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11238">**language_table:** Dönüş dili tablosuna işaretçinin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11238">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11239">**languages_count:** Tablo sütunlarını iade etmek için değişkenin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11239">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11240">**string_count:** Tablo satırlarının dönüş işaretçisinin adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11240">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11241">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11241">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11242">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Etkin dil tablosu başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11242">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11243">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11243">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11244">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11244">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11245">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11245">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11246">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11246">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11247">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11247">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```
