## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11251">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11251">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11252">Etkin dil tablosu atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11252">Assign active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11253">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11253">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11254">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11254">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11255">Bu hizmet etkin dil tablosu yüklü olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11255">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11256">Bu işlev, kullanımdan gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11256">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11257">Tüm yeni uygulamalar bir gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11257">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11258">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11258">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11259">**language_table:** Dil tablosu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11259">**language_table**: Pointer to language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11260">**languages_count:** Tablodaki dil sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11260">**languages_count**: Number of languages in table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11261">**string_count:** Dize tablosu satırlarının sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11261">**string_count**: Number of string table rows.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11273">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11273">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11274">Bellek ayırma, serbest ayırma için işlevler atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11274">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11275">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11276">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11277">Bu hizmet, dinamik bellek ayırma ve ayırmayı ayırma için uygulama tarafından sağlanan geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11277">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11278">Uygulama için dinamik bellek ayırma kullanan bir Gux hizmeti gerekmiyorsa, bu hizmetin çağrılması gerekmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11278">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11279">Kullanılıyorsa, bu hizmetin, Gux hizmet işaretçilerini ve dinamik bellek ayırmayı kullanması gereken Gux hizmetinden önce, gx_system_initialize () sonra çağrılması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11279">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11280">Çalışma zamanı belleği ayırmayı ve ayırmayı kaldırma hizmetini gerektiren GUıDX Hizmetleri şunları içerir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11280">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11281">Dış depolamadan Gux çalışma zamanı ortamına ikili kaynakları yükleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11281">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11282">Yazılım çalışma zamanı JPEG görüntü kod çözücüsü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11282">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11283">Yazılım çalışma zamanı PNG resmi kod çözücüsü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11283">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11284">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile metin pencere öğeleri kullanma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11284">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11285">Çalışma zamanı Pikselleştirme yeniden boyutlandırma ve döndürme yardımcı programı işlevleri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11285">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11286">Çalışma zamanı ekranı ve pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ayırması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11286">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11287">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11287">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11288">**allocator:** Bellekocator işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11288">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11289">**sürüm:** Bellek boş işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11289">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11290">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11290">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11291">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarıyla atanan bellek ayırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11291">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11292">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11292">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11293">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11293">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11294">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11295">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11296">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11296">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11297">Aşağıdaki örnek, threadsafe dinamik bellek ayırma ve bellek ayırmayı geri ayırma hizmeti uygulamak için bir ThreadX byte havuzu kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11297">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11322">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11322">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11323">Kalem yapılandırmasını ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11323">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11324">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11326">Bu hizmet, GX_EVENT_FLICK olay türlerinin oluşturulmasını tetiklemek için kullanılan kalem hızını ve uzaklık parametrelerini denetlemek için kalem yapılandırmasını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11326">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11327">GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist üyesi sabit bir nokta veri türüdür ve INT 'den GX_FIXED_VAL 'e dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (değer) kullanmanız gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11327">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11328">Örneğin, değer başına en az 0,5 piksel bir sürükleme değeri ayarlamak istiyorsanız gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist olarak ayarlamanız gerekir `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11328">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11329">GUX yayınları 5.4.0 ve daha eski sürümlerde, GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist üyesi, GX_FIXED_VAL türü yerine (INT << 8) türüdür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11329">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11330">5.4.0 Version Gux kitaplığı olan projeniz bu API kullanıyorsa, Gux kitaplığı oluştururken min_drag_dist parametresini veya GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY #define değiştirmeniz gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11330">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11331">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11332">**pen_configuration** Kalem yapılandırma yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11332">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11333">**Ek ı** GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION yapısına tanım içeriyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11333">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11334">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11334">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11335">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kalem yapılandırmasını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11335">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11336">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11336">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11337">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11337">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11338">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11338">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11339">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11339">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11340">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11340">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11341">Sistem ekran yığınını oluşturma ve başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11341">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11342">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11343">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11344">Bu hizmet, sistem ekran yığını için kullanılacak bir bellek havuzu tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11344">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11345">Sistem ekran yığını, uygulama tarafından uygulama ekran akışı görünümünü yönetmek için kullanılan isteğe bağlı bir özelliktir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11345">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11346">Uygulama, ekran yığını hizmetlerini kullanmak için gx_system_screen_stack_create bellek bölgesi kurulumu için önce çağrılmak gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11346">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11347">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11348">**memory:** Ayrılmış bellek bloğuna işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11348">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11349">**size:** Ayrılmış bellek bloğuna ait bayt cinsinden boyut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11349">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11351">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarıyla oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11354">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11354">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11356">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11356">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11362">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11362">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11363">En üstteki ekran yığını işaretçilerini aç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11363">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11364">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11365">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11366">Bu işlev en üstteki ekran yığını işaretçilerini ve bu işaretçileri çağırıcı için döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11366">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11367">Bu işlev, pomış ekranın önceki üst öğeye otomatik olarak yeniden iliştirilmesi için gx_system_screen_stack_pop () öğesinden farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11367">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11368">Bunun yerine, işaretçiler yığından alınır ve çağrıyı yapana döndürülür. Bu, çağıranın döndürülen ekranı eklemek veya atmak için istendiği gibi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11368">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11369">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11370">**popped_parent**: üst pencere öğesi işaretçisinin depolandığı konum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11370">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11371">**popped_screen**: pomış ekran işaretçisinin depolandığı konum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11371">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11372">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ekran yığını işaretçilerinin başarıyla alımı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11376">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) geçersiz veya boş ekran yığını</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11376">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11377">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11378">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11378">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11379">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11379">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11385">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11385">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11386">Sistem ekran yığınından en üstteki girişi aç</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11386">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11387">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11387">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11388">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11388">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11389">Bu işlev, ekran yığınında en üstteki girdiyi otomatik olarak ekler ve basamaklı ekranı otomatik olarak posolanan üst pencere öğesine ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11389">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11390">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11390">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11391">**yok**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11391">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11392">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11392">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11393">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Ekran yığını işaretçilerinin başarıyla alınması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11393">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11394">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11394">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11395">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11395">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11396">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Geçersiz veya boş ekran yığını</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11396">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11397">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11397">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11398">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11398">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11399">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11399">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11405">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11405">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11406">Ekran yığınına pencere öğesi ve üst işaretçi itme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11406">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11407">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11409">Bu hizmet, genellikle üst düzey bir ekran olan belirtilen pencere öğesine bir işaretçiyi ekran yığınına sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11409">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11410">Pencere öğesi bir üst öğeye sahipse üst öğeden ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11410">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11411">Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi de ekran yığınına itilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11411">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11412">Üst pencere öğesi NULL olabilir, yani görünür olmayan veya üst öğeye bağlı olmayan bir ekran ekran yığınına itilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11412">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11413">Üst öğesi olan bir pencere öğesi ekran yığınına iletilirse, screen_stack_get() API'si, önceki üst öğeye pencere öğesi yeniden ekleyerek yeniden ekleyerek screen_stack_pop() API'sini kullanmak yerine, ertelenen ekran işaretçisini almak için kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11413">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11414">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11414">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11415">**screen:** Ekran yığınına itilen pencere öğesi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11415">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11416">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11417">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırma çubuğu görünümünü başarıyla alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11417">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11420">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11421">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11422">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11423">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11423">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11424">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11424">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11427">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11427">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11428">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11428">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11429">Sistem ekran yığınını sıfırlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11429">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11430">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11432">Bu işlev, sistem ekran yığınından tüm girdileri kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11432">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11433">Yığından oluşan ekranlarda, GUıDX Studio tarafından ayrılan dinamik olarak ayrılmış denetim blokları varsa, bu denetim blokları için bellek serbest bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11433">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11434">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11434">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11435">**yok**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11435">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11436">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11436">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) kaydırma çubuğu görünümü başarıyla al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11440">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11441">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11442">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11488">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11488">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11489">Kaydırma görünümünü ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11489">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11490">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11491">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11492">Bu hizmet varsayılan kaydırma görünümünü ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11492">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11493">Bir kaydırma oluşturulduğunda, uygulama özel bir sürüm sunmadığı takdirde bu görünüm yapısı kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11493">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11494">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11495">**Stil**: kaydırma stili `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` veya `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11495">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11496">**Görünüm**: farklı ScrollBar görünümü öznitelikleriyle başlatılan görünüm yapısına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11496">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11497">İlke **yapısının tanımı** için Ek I GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11497">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11498">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11499">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Kaydırma görünümü kümesi başarıyla ayarlanmış</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11499">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11500">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11500">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11501">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11501">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11502">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11503">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11503">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11504">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11504">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11528">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11528">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11529">GUX 'i Başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11529">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11532">Bu hizmet, GUıDX işlemesini başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11532">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11533">Normal koşullarda, bu işlev hiçbir şekilde döndürmez, bunun yerine Gux olay kuyruğunu işlemeye başlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11533">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11534">GUX olay kuyruğu boş olduğunda, bu hizmet, yeni olaylar Gux olay kuyruğuna gelene kadar çağıran iş parçacığını askıya alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11534">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11535">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11536">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11536">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11537">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11537">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı sistem başlatması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11540">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11541">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11541">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11542">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11542">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11567">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11567">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11568">Dizeyi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11568">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11569">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11569">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11570">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11570">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11571">Bu hizmet, belirtilen kaynak KIMLIĞI için dizeyi, ilk tanımlanan görüntüyü ve şu anda etkin dili kullanarak alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11571">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11572">Bu işlev, gx_display_string_get kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11572">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11573">Tüm yeni uygulamalar gx_display_string_get kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11573">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11574">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11575">**string_id**: DIZE kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11575">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11576">**return_string**: dize hedefi işaretçisine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11576">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11577">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11577">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11578">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı dize al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11578">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11579">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11579">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11580">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11580">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11581">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11581">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11582">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11582">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11583">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11583">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11584">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11584">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11589">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11589">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11590">Dize tablosunu alır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11590">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11591">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11591">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11592">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11592">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11593">Bu hizmet, istenen dilin dize tablosunu ilk ekranda alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11593">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11594">Bu işlev, gx_display_string_table_get kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11594">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11595">Tüm yeni uygulamalar, gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11595">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11596">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11596">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11597">**language**: Dil dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11597">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11598">**string_table:** Dize tablosu işaretçisinin depolama alanı işaretçisi veya çağıranın dize tablosu işaretçisini almak zorunda yoksa NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11598">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11599">**get_size:** Dize tablosunda dize sayısı için depolama işaretçisi veya çağıranın dize tablosunda dize sayısını almak zorunda olmayan NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11599">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11600">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11601">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı dize tablosu get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11601">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11602">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11602">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11603">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11604">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11604">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11605">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11605">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11611">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11611">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11612">Dize genişliğini al (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11612">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11613">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11613">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11614">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11614">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11615">Bu hizmet, gx_system_string_width_get_ext() için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11615">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11616">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yazı tipini kullanarak sağlanan dizenin görüntüleme genişliğini piksel cinsinden hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11616">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11617">String_length parametresi 0 >0 ise hesaplamaya yalnızca istek sayısı dahil edilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11617">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11618">Bu string_length -1 ise hesaplamada NULL sonlandırıcıya kadar olan dizenin tamamı kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11618">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11619">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11620">**font:** Dizenin yazı tipi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11620">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11621">**string:** Dize işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11621">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11622">**string_length**: dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11622">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11623">**return_width**: dizenin genişliği için hedef</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11623">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11624">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11624">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11625">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı dize genişliği al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11625">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11626">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11626">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11627">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11627">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11628">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) geçersiz Yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11628">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11629">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11629">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11630">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11630">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11631">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11631">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11632">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11632">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */

status = gx_system_string_width_get(&my_font, &my_string,
    strlen(my_string), &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

```C
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11670">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11670">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11671">Zamanlayıcıyı Başlat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11671">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11672">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11672">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11673">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11673">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11674">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesi için bir süreölçer başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11674">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11675">Sabit GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS desteklenen en fazla etkin Zamanlayıcı sayısını tanımladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11675">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11676">Bu değer için varsayılan ayar 32 ' dir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11676">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11677">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11678">**sahip**: pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11678">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11679">**timer_id**: zamanlayıcının kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11679">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11680">**initial_ticks**: ilk süre sonu işaretleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11680">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11681">**reschedule_ticks**: düzenli süre sonu işaretleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11681">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11682">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11683">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı süreölçer başlangıcı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11683">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11684">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) daha fazla Zamanlayıcı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11684">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11685">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11685">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11686">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11686">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11688">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) Zamanlayıcı değerleri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11688">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11689">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11689">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11690">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11690">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11691">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11691">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11709">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11709">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11710">Zamanlayıcıyı durdurma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11710">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11711">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11713">Bu hizmet, çağıran pencere öğesiyle timer_id belirtilen süreölçeri durdurur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11713">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11714">Uygulama, belirli bir pencere öğesiyle bağlantılı tüm süreerleri durdurmak için timer_id değerini 0 olarak iletir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11714">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11715">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11716">**sahip:** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11716">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11717">**timer_id:** Zamanlayıcı kimliği veya tüm zamanlayıcılar için 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11717">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11718">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11718">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11719">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı zamanlayıcı durdurma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11719">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11720">**GX_NOT_FOUND:**(0x09) Zamanlayıcı Kimliği bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11720">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11721">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11721">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11722">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11722">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11723">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11723">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11724">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11724">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11725">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11725">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11726">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11726">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11798">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11798">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11799">Pencere öğesi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11799">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11802">Bu hizmet belirtilen pencere öğesi kimliğini arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11802">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11803">Bu işlev, gx_widget_find() işlevinin aksine, sistemde tanımlanan tüm kök pencerelerin öğelerini arar, yani tüm görünür pencere öğelerinin kapsamlı bir aramasıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11803">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11804">Aramakta olduğunu pencere öğesi üst öğesi biliyorsanız, bunun yerine gx_widget_find() kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11804">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11805">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11805">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11806">**widget_id:** Aranan Pencere Öğesi Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11806">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11807">**search_level:** Alt pencere öğelerinin arandığı, recursive iç içe yerleştirme düzeyini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11807">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11808">Bu değer 0 ise, her kök penceresinin yalnızca anlık children aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11808">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11809">Bu değer GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE işlev, istenen pencere öğesi kimliğini arayan tüm alt öğeleri içine iç içe yer almaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11809">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11810">0 olan diğer > için arama düzeyi, bu işlevin istenen pencere öğesi kimliğini aramaya ne kadar derinden iç içe geçmiş olduğunu tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11810">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11811">**return_search_result:** Pencere öğesi bulundu için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11811">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11812">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11813">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi araması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11814">**GX_NOT_FOUND:**(0x09) Pencere Öğesi Kimliği bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11814">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11815">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11815">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11816">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11817">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11817">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11818">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11818">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11843">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11843">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11845">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11845">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11846">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11846">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11847">Bu hizmet bir metin düğmesi pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11847">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON, api hizmetlerinden GX_BUTTON ve tüm api gx_button destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11849">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11849">Parameters</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11918">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11918">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11923">**event_ptr** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11923">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11924">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11929">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11930">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11930">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11931">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11931">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11983">Metin düğmesi rengini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11983">Set text button color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11984">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11985">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-11986">Bu hizmet, metin düğmesinin rengini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11986">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11987">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11988">**text_button**: metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11988">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11989">**normal_text_color_id**: normal METNIN kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11989">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11990">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11990">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11991">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11991">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11992">**selected_text_color_id:** Seçilen metnin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11992">**selected_text_color_id**: Resource ID of selected text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11993">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11993">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11994">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11994">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11995">**disabled_text_color_id:** Devre dışı bırakılmış metin için rengin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11995">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11996">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11996">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11997">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11997">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-11998">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11998">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-11999">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı metin düğmesi renk kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-11999">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12001">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12001">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12002">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12002">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12003">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12004">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12005">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the color of the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_color_set(&my_text_button,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color of “my_text_button” was
set. */
```
