## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12023">Düğme metni çizmek için destek işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12023">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12024">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12025">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12026">Bu destek işlevi bir metin düğmesinin metin bölümünü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12026">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12027">Bu işlev, gx_text_button_draw tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir düğme çizim işlevi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12027">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12028">Düğme arka plan çizimini özelleştirmek isteyen uygulamalar kendi özel çizim işlevlerini sağlayabilir ve gx_text_button_text_draw hizmetini özel çiziminin bir parçası olarak çağırarak arka plan üzerinde düğme metnini çizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12028">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12029">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12029">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12030">**text_button**: metin düğmesi denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12030">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12031">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12032">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12032">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12033">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12033">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12034">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12034">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12035">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12035">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12138">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12139">Bu hizmet gx_text_button_text_set_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12139">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12140">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12140">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12141">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY ile oluşturulduysa pencere öğesi, atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12141">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12142">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12142">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12143">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12143">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12144">**text_button:** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12144">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12145">**text:** NULL ile sonlandırılan dizenin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12145">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12146">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12147">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Metni düğme olarak başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12147">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlanmadı veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12160">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12160">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12161">Metin düğmesine metin atama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12161">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12162">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12163">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12164">Bu hizmet, belirtilen dizeyi metin düğmesine atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12164">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12165">Text_button pencere öğesi stil GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY oluşturulursa, pencere öğesi atanan metin dizesinin özel bir kopyasını oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12165">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12166">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY etkin değilse, pencere öğesi gelen dizenin özel bir kopyasını oluşturmaz ve bu nedenle dize statik veya genel olarak ayrılmış olmalıdır, yani otomatik veya geçici bir değişken olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12166">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12167">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12168">**text_button:** Metin işaretçisi düğme denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12168">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12169">**String**: GX_STRING değişkenine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12169">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12170">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12170">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12171">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) metin düğmeye başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12171">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12174">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12174">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12175">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12175">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12176">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12176">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12177">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12177">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

“my_text_button”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

```C
UINT gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12199">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12200">Bu hizmet, imlecin yanıp sönme aralığı değerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12200">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12205">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) İmleç yanıp sönme aralığını başarıyla ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12205">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12251">Metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin geri çağırma işlevini atama (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12251">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12252">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12252">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12253">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12253">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12254">Bu hizmet, gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext() tercihi ile kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12254">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12255">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her bir satırına görüntülenecek metin dizesini belirlemek için bir metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin çağıracak olduğu geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12255">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12256">Bu GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL için varsayılan geri çağırma işlevleri sağlanır ve uygulamanın bu varsayılan uygulamaları kullanmak için herhangi bir değişiklik yapmaları gerekmemektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12256">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12257">Bu API, uygulamanın kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinde görüntülenen dizenin biçimlendirmesini veya diğer parametrelerini özelleştirmesine izin vermek için sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12257">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12258">Geri çağırma işlevi, kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna bir işaretçi ve görüntülenen satır numarasını girdi olarak alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12258">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12259">İşlev, metin dizesine bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12259">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12260">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12260">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12261">**wheel (tekerlek)** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12261">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12262">**geri çağırma** Geri çağırma işlevinin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12262">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12263">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12264">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Geri çağırma başarıyla ayarlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12264">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12267">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12268">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12269">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12286">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12286">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12287">Metin türü kaydırma tekerleğinin geri çağırma işlevini ata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12287">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12289">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12290">Bu hizmet, kaydırma tekerleğinin her satırında görüntülenecek metin dizesini belirleyebilmek için bir metin türü kaydırma tekerinin çağıracağı geri çağırma işlevini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12290">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12291">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL ve GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL için, varsayılan geri çağırma işlevleri sağlanır ve uygulamanın bu varsayılan uygulamaları kullanmak için herhangi bir değişiklik yapması gerekmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12291">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12292">Bu API, uygulamanın, kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesinin her satırında görüntülenen biçimlendirme veya dizenin diğer parametrelerini özelleştirmesini sağlamak için sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12292">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12293">Geri çağırma işlevi, kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğuna ve görüntülenen satır numarasına bir işaretçi girişi olarak gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12293">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12294">İşlev, bir metin dizesine bir işaretçi döndürmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12294">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12295">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12295">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12296">**tekerlek** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12296">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12297">**geri arama** Geri çağırma işlevine işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12297">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12298">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) geri çağırma başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12302">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12303">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12304">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12304">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12322">Metin kaydırma tekerleği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12322">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12323">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12324">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12325">Bu hizmet bir metin kaydırma tekerleği oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12325">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12326">Metin kaydırma tekerleği, GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL ve GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL türü pencere öğeleri için temel pencere öğesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12326">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12327">Bu işlev, gx_string_scroll_wheel_create ve gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır ve özel bir kaydırma tekerleği pencere öğesi tanımlayan uygulamalar için kolaylık olarak ayrı bir API olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12327">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12328">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12328">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12329">**tekerlek**: metin kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12329">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12330">**ad**: uygulama tanımlı pencere öğesi adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12330">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12343">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12343">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12344">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12365">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12367">Bu, temel alınan tüm tekerlek türleri için varsayılan çizim GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12367">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12368">Bu işlev, metin kaydırma tekerleği çizimi görünümünü özelleştirmeyi gerektiren uygulamalar tarafından geçersiz kılınabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12368">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12369">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL ve GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL, veri kaynaklarından türetilen veya GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12369">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12370">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12370">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12371">**tekerlek**: dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12371">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12372">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12373">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12373">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12374">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12375">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom wheel draw function. */

{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(wheel);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12394">Metin kaydırma tekerleği olayını işle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12394">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12395">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12396">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12397">Bu hizmet, belirtilen metin kaydırma tekerleği için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12397">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12398">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel metin kaydırma tekerleği olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12398">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12399">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12400">**wheel (tekerlek)** Metin işaretçisi kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12400">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12401">**event_ptr** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12401">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12402">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı metin kaydırma tekerleği olay işlemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12407">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12408">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12408">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12409">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12409">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12461">Bu işlev, metin tabanlı kaydırma tekerleği satırları çizmek için kullanılan metin renklerini atar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12461">This function assigns the text colors used to draw a text based scroll wheel rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12462">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12463">**wheel:** Dize kaydırma tekerleği denetim bloğu adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12463">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12464">**normal_text_color:** Seçili olmayan satırları çizmek için kullanılan renk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12464">**normal_text_color**: Color used to draw non-selected rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12465">**selected_text_color:** Seçili satırı çizmek için kullanılan renk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12465">**selected_text_color**: Color used to draw selected row.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12466">**disabled_text_color:** Devre dışı bırakılmış pencere öğesi için metin çizmek için kullanılan renk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12466">**disabled_text_color**: Color used to draw text for disabled widget.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12467">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12467">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12468">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarıyla atanan kaydırma tekerleği metin rengi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12468">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned scroll wheel text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12469">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12469">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12470">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12470">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12471">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12471">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12472">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12472">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12473">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12473">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12474">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12474">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

UINT status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(&wheel,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the colors used to draw the wheel text have been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12492">Ağaç görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12492">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12495">Bu hizmet belirtildiği şekilde bir ağaç görünümü oluşturur ve ağaç görünümünü sağlanan üst pencere öğesiyle ilişkilendirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12495">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12496">Tüm pencere öğesi türlerini alt menü öğesi olarak kabul eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12496">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12497">Alt menü öğesi olarak GX_MENU pencere öğesinin kullanılması önerilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12497">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW, api GX_WINDOW türetilen ve tüm gx_window API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12499">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12499">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12500">**tree**: Ağaç görünümü denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12500">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12501">**name:** Ağaç görünümünün adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12501">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12502">**parent:** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12502">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12503">**style:** Pencere öğesi stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12503">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12504">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stiller içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12504">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12505">**menu_id:** Ağaç görünümünün uygulama tanımlı kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12505">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12506">**boyut:** Ağaç görünümünün boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12506">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12507">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12507">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12508">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı ağaç görünümü oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12514">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12515">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12515">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12516">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12516">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12533">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12533">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12534">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12534">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12535">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağaç görünümünü çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12535">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12536">Bu işlev normalde Gux tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel ağaç görünümü pencere öğeleri için özel çizim işlevleri uygulamaya yardımcı olmak üzere uygulamaya sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12536">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12537">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12537">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12539">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12540">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12540">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12541">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12542">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12542">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12543">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12543">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12559">İşlem ağacı görünümü olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12559">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12560">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12561">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12562">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağaç görünümü için bir olayı işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12562">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12563">Bu hizmet, herhangi bir özel ağaç görünümü olay işleme işlevi tarafından varsayılan olay işleyicisi olarak çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12563">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12564">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12564">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12565">**tree**: Ağaç görünümü denetim bloğuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12565">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12566">**event_ptr:** İşlemeye devam etmek için olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12566">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12567">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12568">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı işlem ağacı görünümü olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12568">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12572">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12573">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12573">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12574">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12574">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12737">gx_tree_view_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12737">gx_tree_view_selected_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12738">Seçili öğeyi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12738">Set selected item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12739">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12739">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_selected_set(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_WIDGET *selected);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12740">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12740">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12741">Bu hizmet, ağaç görünümü için seçili öğeyi ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12741">This service sets selected item for the tree view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12742">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12743">**ağaç**: ağaç görünümü denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12743">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12744">**Seçili**: seçilen yeni öğeye yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12744">**selected**: Pointer to the new selected item</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12745">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12745">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12746">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı Çiz Menüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12746">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful draw menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12747">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12747">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12748">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12749">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12749">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12750">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12750">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12751">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12751">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12752">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12752">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set selected item of tree view “my_tree” to “tree_view_item’. */
status = gx_tree_view_selected_set(&my_tree, &tree_view_item);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS selected item of tree view “my_menu” has
been set to “tree_view_item”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12768">Tuval faturalarını bit eşlem olarak dönüştürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12768">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12769">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12770">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12771">Bu hizmet tuval belleğini bit eşlem dosyasına dönüştürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12771">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12772">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12772">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12773">**tuval:** Tuval denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12773">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12774">**Rect**: dönüştürülecek dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12774">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12775">**write_data**: verileri yazmak için geri çağırma işlev işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12775">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12776">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12777">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) tam sayı değeri dizeye başarıyla dönüştürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12777">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz dönüş arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) geçersiz dönüş arabelleği boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12780">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12781">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12781">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12782">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12782">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12799">Dairenin üzerinde nokta hesaplama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12799">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12802">Bu hizmet daire merkezine, yarıçapa ve açıya göre bir dairenin noktasını hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12802">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12803">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12804">**xCenter:** daire merkezinin x koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12804">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12805">**yCenter:** daire merkezinin y koordinatı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12805">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12806">**radius:** Daire yarıçapı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12806">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12807">**angle:** Daire çevre noktasının derece olarak hesaplanacağı açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12807">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12808">**point:** Hesaplanmış x GX_POINT koordinatı depolanacak değişken değişkeninin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12808">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12809">**end_alpha:** Bitiş alfa değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12809">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12810">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12811">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradyan oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12811">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz dönüş noktası adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Geçersiz radius parametresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12814">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12815">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12816">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12835">Bir gradyan pixelmap oluşturun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12835">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12836">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12836">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12837">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12837">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12838">Bu hizmet, çalışma zamanında bir gradyan pixelmap oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12838">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12839">Bir gradyan görüntüsü, belirme efektlerini ve diğer ilgi çekici görsel değişiklikleri gerçekleştirmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12839">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12840">İstenen degradenin genişliği ve yüksekliği, 2x2 pikselden az olamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12840">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12841">GUX, oluşturulan degradeler listesinin bir listesini tutar ve bu işlev ilk olarak, yeni bir pixelmap oluşturmadan önce eşleşen bir gradyan pixelmap bulmak için gradyan listesinde arama yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12841">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12842">Diğer bir deyişle, aynı gradyan pixelmap 'i birden çok kez gerekir, yalnızca bir pixelmap oluşturulmuştur ve bu pixelmap 'i gerektiren her degrade oluşturulan pixelmap 'i paylaşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12842">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12843">Bu API, çalışma zamanı bellek ayırmaya izin vermek için gx_system_memory_allocator işlevinin tanımlanmasını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12843">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12844">Gradyan türü bayrakları GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA ve GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12844">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12845">Yalnızca GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA türü gradyanları de desteklemiştir (bu tür bayrağının ayarlanmış olması gerekir).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12845">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12846">GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR bayrağı isteğe bağlıdır ve ayar olduğunda, gradyan oluşturma mantığına, start_alpha'den end_alpha'ye ve sonra yeniden start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12846">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12847">Aksi takdirde doğrusal bir gradyan oluşturulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12847">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12848">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12848">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12849">**gradyan:** Gradyan denetim bloğu yapısına işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12849">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12850">**width:** İstenen piksel haritası genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12850">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12851">**height:** İstenen piksel haritası yüksekliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12851">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12852">**tür:** İstenen gradyan türü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12852">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12853">**start_alpha:** Alfa değerini başlatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12853">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12854">**end_alpha:** Bitiş alfa değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12854">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12855">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12855">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12856">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradyan oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12856">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Gradyan en az 2x2 piksel değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Gradyan tür türü GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12859">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Bellek ayırma tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12859">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Gradyan işaretçisi geçerli<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Genişlik ve yükseklik değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE:**(0x1B) Gradyan türü geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12864">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12864">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12865">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12865">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12866">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12866">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12885">Önceden oluşturulmuş bir degradeyi silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12885">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12886">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12887">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12888">Bu hizmet daha önce oluşturulmuş bir degradeyi siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12888">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12889">Bu degradeyle ilişkilendirilen pixelmap başka degradeler tarafından kullanımda değilse, pixelmap verileri de silinir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12889">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12890">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12891">**gradyan**: gradyan denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12891">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12892">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12893">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradyan silindi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Gradyan işaretçisi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12896">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12897">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12898">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12898">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12917">Uzun tamsayıyı ASCII 'ye Dönüştür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12917">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12918">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12918">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12919">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12919">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12920">Bu hizmet uzun bir tamsayı değerini bir ASCII dizesine dönüştürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12920">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12921">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12922">**değer**: dönüştürülecek Long Integer değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12922">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12923">**return_buffer**: ASCII dizesi için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12923">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12924">**return_buffer_size**: hedef arabelleğin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12924">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12925">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12925">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12926">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) tam sayı değeri dizeye başarıyla dönüştürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12926">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz dönüş arabelleği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12931">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12931">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```
