## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12948">İşlem ark kosinüs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12948">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12949">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12949">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12950">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12950">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12951">Bu hizmet, ark kosinüs x'in açı değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12951">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12952">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri t GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE inT'den GX_FIXED_VAL çağrısıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12952">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12953">Örneğin, 0,5'in ark kosinüs değerini hesaplamak için girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2 olarak ifade edin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12953">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12954">5.4.0 veya daha küçük bir GUIX sürümünde, bu işlevin giriş değeri türü INT'tir ve değer [-256, 256] aralığıyla sınırlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12954">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12955">Uygulama bu hizmeti çağırmadan önce değeri [-1, 1] aralığından [-256, 256] aralığına ölçeklendirmeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12955">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12956">GUIX sürümü 5.4.0 veya daha küçük olan projenizin bu API'ye başvurusu varsa ve projenizi en son Guix kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12956">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12957">İki seçenek sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12957">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12958">Veri türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının GX_FIXED_VAL düzeltin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12958">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12959">Veri GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12959">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12960">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12960">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12961">**x:** Ark kosinüs değeri hesaplandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12961">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12962">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12962">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12963">**açı:** Ark kosinüs x'in açı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12963">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12964">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12964">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12965">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12965">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12966">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12966">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12987">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12987">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12988">Bu hizmet, ark sinüs x 'in açı değerini hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12988">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12989">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, INT 'ten GX_FIXED_VAL türüne dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12989">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12990">Örneğin, 0,5 yay değerini hesaplamak istiyorsanız, girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2 olarak yapın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12990">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-12991">5.4.0 veya daha düşük sürümde, bu işlevin giriş değeri türü INT 'tir ve değer [-256, 256] aralığıyla sınırlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12991">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12992">Uygulama bu hizmeti çağırmadan önce değeri [-1, 1] aralığından [-256, 256] aralığına ölçeklendirmeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12992">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12993">GUIX sürümüne sahip projeniz 5.4.0'a eşit veya daha küçükse ve projenizi en son guix kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12993">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12994">İki seçenek sunulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12994">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12995">Veri türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının GX_FIXED_VAL düzeltin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12995">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12996">Veri GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12996">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12997">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-12998">**x:** Ark sinüsü hesaplanan değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12998">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-12999">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-12999">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13000">**açı:** Ark sinüsü x'in açı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13000">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13001">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13002">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13002">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13003">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13003">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13022">İşlem kosinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13022">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13023">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13023">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13024">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13024">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13025">Bu hizmet, sağlanan açının kosinüsünü hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13025">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13026">Giriş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, INT 'ten GX_FIXED_VAL dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13026">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13027">Örneğin, 90 derece kosinüsünü hesaplamak istiyorsanız, girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90) olarak yapın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13027">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13028">Dönüş değeri sabit bir nokta veri türüdür, GX_FIXED_VAL ' dan INT 'e dönüştürmek için GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT çağırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13028">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13029">5.4.0 veya daha düşük sürüm Gux sürümünde, bu hizmetin giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri INT 'tir, giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri 256 ile genişletilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13029">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13030">Bu nedenle, uygulamanın bu hizmeti çağırabilmesi için açı değerini 256 ile Ölçeklendirmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13030">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13031">GUX sürümüne eşit veya daha küçük bir sürüme sahip projeniz 5.4.0 ve projenizi en son Gux kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız iki seçeneğiniz vardır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13031">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13032">GX_FIXED_VAL tarih türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının dönüş değerine giriş değerini ve işlemeyi düzeltemedi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13032">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13033">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY tanımlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13033">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13034">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13035">**açı**: öğesinin işlem kosinüsü için açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13035">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13036">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13037">**kosinüs**: sağlanan açının kosinüs değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13037">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13038">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13039">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13039">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13040">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13040">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13058">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13058">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13059">İşlem sinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13059">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13060">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13060">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13061">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13061">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13062">Bu hizmet, sağlanan açının sinüsü hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13062">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13063">Giriş değeri, INT'den veri kaynağına GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE bir sabit nokta veri GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13063">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13064">Örneğin, 90 derecelik sinüsü hesaplamak için girişi GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90) olarak kullanabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13064">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13065">Dönüş değeri sabit bir nokta veri t değeridir ve GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT'den INT'ye GX_FIXED_VAL çağrısıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13065">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13066">5.4.0 veya daha küçük bir GUIX sürümünde giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri türü INT'tir, giriş değeri ve dönüş değeri 256 büyütülmüştür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13066">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13067">Bu nedenle, uygulamanın bu hizmeti çağırabilmesi için açı değerini 256 ile Ölçeklendirmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13067">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13068">GUX sürümüne eşit veya daha küçük bir sürüme sahip projeniz 5.4.0 ve projenizi en son Gux kitaplığıyla yükseltmek istiyorsanız iki seçeneğiniz vardır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13068">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13069">GX_FIXED_VAL veri türü değerini kullanmak için bu API çağrısının giriş değerini ve dönüş değerine teslim etme değerini onarın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13069">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13070">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY tanımlayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13070">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13071">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13071">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13072">**açı**: işlem sinüsü için açı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13072">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13073">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13073">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13074">**sinüs**: sağlanan açının sinüsü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13074">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13075">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13076">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13076">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13077">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13077">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sqrt"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13095">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13095">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span></span>


## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13123">BiDi metnini görüntüleme sırasına göre yeniden sırala</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13123">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13124">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13124">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13125">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13125">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13126">Bu hizmet, BiDi metnini görüntüleme sırasına yeniden sıralar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13126">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13127">Metin çizim yazı tipi ve görüntüleme genişliği sağlanmışsa, ilk olarak satır bölünmesi uygulanır, her satıra göre işlem yeniden sıralama işlemi uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13127">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13128">Girilen metin birden fazla paragraf içeriyorsa, hizmet metni paragraflarına keser, her bir paragrafın satır sonu ve yeniden sipariş sonucu bir liste olarak bağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13128">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13129">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13130">**input_info**: satır sonu ve metin yeniden sıralama için bilgi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13130">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13131">**resolved_info_head**: satır sonu ve belirtilen metnin her paragrafında oluşan sonuçları içeren bağlantılı listeye yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13131">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13132">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13132">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13133">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) başarılı bidi metin yeniden sıralama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13133">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş işaretçileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13136">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13137">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13137">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13138">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13138">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13139">Tuvale tek hatlı bidi metni çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13139">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13140">Tuvale çoklu satır bidi metni çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13140">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13141">Tuvale çoklu paragraf bidi metni çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13141">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13160">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13160">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13161">Piksel haritasını yeniden boyutlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13161">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13162">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13163">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13164">Bu hizmet bir piksel haritasını yeniden boyutlandırarak piksel haritasının yeniden boyutlandırılma sonucu olarak yeni bir piksel haritasına işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13164">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13165">Bu hizmet, yeniden boyutlandırilen piksel gx_system_memory_allocator_set bellek ayırmaya izin vermek için önceden gx_system_memory_allocator_set'nin kullanımını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13165">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13166">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13167">**src:** Yeniden boyutlandırmak için piksel haritasının işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13167">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13168">**destination:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritası için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13168">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13169">**width:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritasının piksel cinsinden genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13169">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13170">**height:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritasının piksel cinsinden hiyerarşisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13170">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13171">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13171">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13172">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası yeniden boyutlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13172">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz kaynak veya hedef piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Genişlik veya yükseklik değeri geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13175">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Kaynak piksel haritası sıkıştırılmış biçimdir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13175">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13176">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13176">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13177">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13177">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13178">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13178">All</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13196">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13196">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13197">Pixelmap 'i döndür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13197">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13198">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13199">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13200">Bu hizmet bir pixelmap döndürür ve pixelmap dönüşünün sonucu olan yeni bir pixelmap için bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13200">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13201">Bir pixelmap 'i doğrudan tuvale döndürmek için gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate () kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13201">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13202">Bu hizmet, bellek ayırmanın gx_system_memory_allocator_set piksel haritası verilerini tutmasına izin vermek için önceden gx_system_memory_allocator_set'nin kullanımını gerektirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13202">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13203">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13203">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13204">**src:** Döndürülacak piksel haritası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13204">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13205">**açı:** Derece olarak döndürme açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13205">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13206">**destination:** Sonuçta elde edilen piksel haritası için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13206">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13207">**rot_cx:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13207">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13208">Kaynak piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı ile başlatılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13208">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13209">Bu rot_cx GX_NULL değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13209">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13210">**rot_cy:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13210">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13211">Kaynak piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı ile başlatılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13211">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13212">Bu rot_cy GX_NULL değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13212">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13213">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13213">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13214">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13214">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz kaynak veya hedef piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Açı değeri 0'dır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Kaynak piksel haritası sıkıştırılmış biçimdir ve desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13219">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13219">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13220">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13220">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13221">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13221">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13238">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13238">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13239">Pixelmap 'i döndür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13239">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13240">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13240">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13241">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13241">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13242">Bu hizmet, bir pixelmap 'i 90 derece, 180 derece veya 270 derecesi ile döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13242">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13243">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13243">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13244">**src**: döndürülecek pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13244">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13245">**açı**: dönüşünün derece cinsinden açısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13245">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13246">**hedef**: elde edilen pixelmap için hedef arabellek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13246">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13247">**rot_cx**: hedef pixelmap 'e göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı alındı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13247">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13248">Kaynak pixelmap 'e göre döndürme merkezinin x koordinatı ile başlatılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13248">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13249">Rot_cx GX_NULL, değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13249">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13250">**rot_cy:** Hedef piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13250">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13251">Kaynak piksel haritasına göre döndürme merkezinin y koordinatı ile başlatılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13251">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13252">Bu rot_cy GX_NULL değer alınmayacak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13252">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13253">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13253">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13254">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası döndürme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13254">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz kaynak veya hedef piksel haritası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Açılı değer 0'dır veya 90, 180, 270 gibi basit bir açı değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Kaynak piksel haritası sıkıştırılmış biçimdir ve desteklenmiyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13259">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13260">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13260">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13261">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13261">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

```C
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13281">Bu hizmet dikdörtgeni başka bir dikdörtgen içinde ortalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13281">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13308">Dikdörtgenin merkezini bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13308">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13309">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13310">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13311">Bu hizmet dikdörtgenin merkezini bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13311">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13312">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13312">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13313">**dikdörtgen:** Dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13313">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13314">**return_center:** Orta noktaya işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13314">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13315">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13315">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13316">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Dikdörtgenin merkezini başarıyla buldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13316">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Geçersiz dikdörtgen boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13319">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13320">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13321">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13338">İlk olarak iki dikdörtgeni birleştirin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13338">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13339">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13341">Bu hizmet birinci ve İkinci dikdörtgeni ilk dikdörtgende birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13341">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13342">İlk dikdörtgen, ikincisini içerecek şekilde genişletilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13342">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13343">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13344">**first_rectangle**: ilk dikdörtgen ve Birleşik dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13345">**second_rectangle**: ikinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13346">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13347">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Iki dikdörtgeni başarıyla birleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13347">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13349">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13349">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13350">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13350">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13351">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13351">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13368">İki dikdörtgeni karşılaştırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13368">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13369">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13369">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13370">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13370">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13371">Bu hizmet birinci ve ikinci dikdörtgeni karşılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13371">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13372">Bunlar eşitse, GX_TRUE döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13372">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13373">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13374">**first_rectangle:** İlk dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13374">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13375">**second_rectangle:** İkinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13375">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13376">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13377">**sonuç**: dikdörtgenler eşitse GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde GX_FALSE döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13377">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13378">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13378">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13379">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13379">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13380">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13380">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13397">Dikdörtgen tanımlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13397">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13398">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13398">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13399">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13400">Bu hizmet, belirtilen şekilde bir dikdörtgen tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13400">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13401">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13402">**rectangle:** Dikdörtgen denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13402">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13403">**left:** En fazla koordinatı sol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13403">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13404">**top:** En üst koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13404">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13405">**right:** En koordinatı sağa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13405">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13406">**bottom:** En alt koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13406">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13407">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13407">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13408">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Dikdörtgen başarıyla tanımlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13408">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz dikdörtgen işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13410">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13411">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13411">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13412">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13412">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13429">Dikdörtgenlerin çakışmasını Algıla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13429">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13430">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13432">Bu hizmet, sağlanan dikdörtgenlerin çakışmasını algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13432">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13433">Çakışma bulunursa, hizmet GX_TRUE ve çakışan dikdörtgeni döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13433">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13434">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13435">**first_rectangle**: ilk dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13435">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13436">**second_rectangle**: ikinci dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13436">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13437">**return_overlap_area**: örtüşen dikdörtgen alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13437">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13438">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13439">**sonuç**: dikdörtgenler çakıştığında GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13439">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13440">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13441">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13441">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13442">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13459">Noktanın dikdörtgende olup olduğunu algılama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13459">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13462">Bu hizmet, belirtilen noktanın dikdörtgende olup oImayrı olduğunu algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13462">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13463">Nokta dikdörtgende yer alırsa, hizmet GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13463">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13464">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13465">**dikdörtgen:** Dikdörtgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13465">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13466">**point**: Point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13466">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13467">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13467">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13468">**sonuç:** GX_TRUE dikdörtgende yer alırsa, aksi takdirde GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13468">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13469">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13470">Tümü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13470">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13471">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13471">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13547">Dizeyi 8bpp bir String eşleme türü pixelmap (kullanım dışı) olarak işle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13547">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13548">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13550">Bu hizmet gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext () kullanım dışı bırakılmıştır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13550">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13551">Bu hizmet, yalnızca alfa değerlerini içeren bir 8bpp pixelmap özel biçimi olan bir alfamap 'e bir metin dizesi işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13551">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13552">Bu hizmet genellikle gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw ile birlikte kullanılarak döndürülen metni tuvale çizmektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13552">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13553">Bu hizmet, sonuçta elde edilen harflerden eşleşme için gereken bellek boyutunu hesaplar ve dinamik olarak bellek ayırmak için uygulama tarafından tanımlanan gx_system_memory_allocator () işlevini çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13553">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13554">Uygulamanın bu hizmeti kullanmadan önce, genellikle program başlangıcında, bir noktada gx_system_memory_allocator_set () çağrısı gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13554">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13555">Bir metin dizesi döndürülecektir ve tek bir kez tuvale çizildiyse, hizmet gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () alternatif olarak sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13555">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() işlevi, döndürülmüş metni tek bir işlemde işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() işlevini çağıracak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13557">Ancak aynı metin çeşitli açılarda birden çok kez döndürülecekse, gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API'sini kullanarak alfa haritasını oluşturmak ve ardından elde edilen alfa haritayı gerektiğinde birden çok kez döndürmek daha verimlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13557">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13558">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13558">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13559">**text:** Alfa haritaya işılacak metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13559">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13560">**font:** Metni işlemek için yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13560">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13561">**return_map:** Çağıranın GX_PIXELMAP için işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13561">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13562">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13563">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Bir metin dizesini alfa haritaya başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13563">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Bellek ayırma/serbest işlev tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13567">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13567">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13568">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13568">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13569">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13569">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13573">Dizeyi 8bpp alfa harita türü piksel haritasına işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13573">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13574">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13574">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13575">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13576">Bu hizmet bir metin dizesini alfa haritaya işler. Bu, yalnızca alfa değerleri içeren 8bpp piksel haritasının özel bir biçimidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13576">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13577">Bu hizmet genellikle gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw tuvale döndürülmüş metin çizmek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13577">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13578">Bu hizmet, elde edilen alfa harita için gereken bellek boyutunu hesaplar ve uygulama tarafından dinamik olarak bellek ayırmak için tanımlanan gx_system_memory_allocator() işlevini çağırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13578">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13579">Uygulamanın bu hizmeti gx_system_memory_allocator_set() çağrısından önce genellikle program başlatma sırasında bir noktada çağrısında olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13579">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13580">Metin dizesi yalnızca bir kez döndürülerek tuvale çizilecekse alternatif olarak gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() hizmeti sağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13580">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13581">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() işlevi, döndürülmüş metni tek bir işlemde işlemek için gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() ve gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() işlevini çağıracak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13581">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13582">Ancak, aynı metin çeşitli açılarda birden çok kez döndürülürse, gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API 'sini kullanarak bir kez daha verimli bir şekilde çizilecektir ve sonra sonuçta elde edilen harflerden oluşan Haritayı gerektiği gibi döndürün.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13582">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13583">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13584">**dize**: harflerden haritaya işlenecek metin dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13584">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13585">**yazı tipi**: metni işlemek için kullanılacak yazı tipi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13585">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13586">**return_map**: çağırana döndürülecek GX_PIXELMAP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13586">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13587">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13587">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13588">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bir metin dizesini bir alfamap 'e başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13588">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13589">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) geçersiz giriş işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13589">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13590">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) bellek ayırma/serbest bırakma işlevi tanımlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13590">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13591">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) geçersiz dize uzunluğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13591">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13592">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13592">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13593">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13593">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13594">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13594">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```
