## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13635">Dikey liste oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13635">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13636">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13636">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13637">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13637">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13638">Bu hizmet dikey bir liste oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13638">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST GX_WINDOW türetilir ve tüm gx_window API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13640">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13641">**vertical_list** Dikey liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13641">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13642">**ad** Dikey listenin adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13642">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13643">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13643">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13644">**total_rows** Dikey listedeki toplam satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13644">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13645">**geri arama** Liste kaydırıldığında dikey liste tarafından çağrılacak bir işlev.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13645">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13646">Çağıran, başlangıçta görünür liste satırlarını dolduracak yeterli GX_WIDGET tabanlı alt öğe oluşturmamalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13646">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13647">Liste kaydırıldığında, bu işlev, sağlanan liste dizinine karşılık gelen liste alt öğelerini yeniden oluşturmak için çağrılır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13647">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13648">**Stil** ScrollBar pencere öğesinin stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13648">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13649">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13649">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13650">**vertical_list_id** Uygulama tanımlı dikey listenin KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13650">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13651">**Boyut** Dikey liste boyutları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13651">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13652">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dikey liste başarıyla oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Geçerli değil satır sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13660">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13660">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13661">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13661">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13662">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13662">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13769">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13769">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13770">Dikey listeden seçili pencere öğesi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13770">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13771">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13772">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13773">Bu hizmet dikey listenin seçili pencere öğelerini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13773">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13774">Listede alt pencere öğelerinden daha fazla satır varsa ve seçili alt pencere öğesi görünümden kaydırıldısa, pencere öğesi yeni bir liste girdisi görüntülemek için yeniden kullanılmasından bu işlev GX_NULL GX_WIDGET işaretçisi olarak GX_WIDGET'i geri dönecektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13774">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13775">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13775">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13776">**vertical_list** Dikey liste pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13776">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13777">**return_list_entry** Dönüş listesi giriş pencere öğesi hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13777">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13778">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13778">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dikey liste girişini başarıyla alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13780">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Seçili pencere öğesi görünümden kaydırıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13780">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13783">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13784">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13784">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13785">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13785">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

```C
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT count);
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13798">Bu hizmet Toplam liste satırı sayısını atar veya değiştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13798">This service assigns or changes the total number of list rows.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13803">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) dikey liste satır sayısını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13803">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list row count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13804">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13804">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13805">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13805">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13808">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13808">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13822">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13823">Bu hizmet dikey kaydırma çubuğu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13823">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13824">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13824">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13825">**kaydırma çubuğu** Kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13825">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13826">**name** Kaydırma çubuğunun adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13826">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13827">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13827">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13828">**görünüm** Dikey kaydırma çubuğu pencere öğesi görünümü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13828">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13829">**style (stil)** Kaydırma çubuğunun stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13829">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13830">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13830">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13831">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı dikey kaydırma çubuğu oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13831">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful vertical scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13833">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13833">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13834">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13834">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13835">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13835">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13836">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13836">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13837">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13838">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13838">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13839">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13839">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,

                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

```

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13846">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13846">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13847">Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13847">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13848">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13848">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13849">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13849">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13850">Bu hizmet, uygulama tanımlı bellek ayırma işlevini çağırarak bir pencere öğesi denetim bloğunu dinamik olarak ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13850">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13851">Bu hizmet, Gux Studio özellikleri görünümünde "dinamik ayırma" özelliği seçildiğinde, denetim bloğunu dinamik olarak ayırmak için Gux Studio tarafından oluşturulan işlevler tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13851">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13852">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13852">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13853">**control_block** Döndürülen denetim bloğu işaretçisine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13853">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13854">**memsize** Denetim blok boyutu, bayt cinsinden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13854">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13855">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13855">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13856">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi ayırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13856">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13857">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) bellek ayırıcısı tanımlı değil veya bellek ayırma başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13857">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13900">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13900">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13901">Pencere öğesini üst öğesine Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13901">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13902">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13903">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13904">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesini belirtilen üst öğeye iliştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13904">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13905">Pencere öğesi zaten başka bir üst öğeye eklenmişse, ilk olarak ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13905">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13906">Pencere öğesi zaten aynı üst öğeye eklenmişse, işlev hiçbir şey yapmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13906">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13907">Pencere öğesi, üstünün z sıralaması bakımından en üst alt öğesi olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13907">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13908">Eşdüzey pencere öğeleri çakışırsa, bu pencere öğesi eşdüzey öğelerinin üzerine çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13908">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13909">Yeni pencere öğelerini z sırasına geri koymak için gx_widget_back_attach veya gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13909">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13910">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13910">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13911">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13911">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13912">**pencere öğesi** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13912">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13913">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13917">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Üst öğe veya pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13917">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13918">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13918">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13919">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13919">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13920">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13920">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13958">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13958">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13959">Pencere öğesi arka planı çizme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13959">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13960">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13960">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13961">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13961">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13962">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi arka planında düz renk dolgusu gerçekleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13962">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13963">Bu hizmet, gx_widget_draw işlevi tarafından otomatik olarak çağrılır, ancak özelleştirilmiş pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin bir parçası olarak uygulama tarafından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13963">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13964">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13964">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13965">**pencere öğesi** Çizilecek pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13965">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13966">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-13967">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13967">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13968">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13968">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-13969">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13969">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-13970">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-13970">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14008">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14008">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14009">Üst öğeye pencere öğesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14009">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14010">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14010">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14011">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14011">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14012">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi belirtilen üst öğeye iliştiriliyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14012">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14013">Pencere öğesi zaten başka bir üst öğeye eklenmişse, önce ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14013">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14014">Pencere öğesi aynı üst öğeye zaten eklenmişse işlev hiçbir şey yapmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14014">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14015">Pencere öğesi, z sıralama açısından üst öğenin en alt öğesi haline gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14015">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14016">Küçük pencere öğeleri çakışıyorsa, bu pencere öğesi bu altlıkların arkasına çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14016">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14017">Yeni pencere öğelerini z-düzenin önüne koymak için gx_widget_attach veya gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14017">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14018">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14018">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14019">**parent** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14019">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14020">**pencere öğesi** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14020">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14021">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst öğe veya pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14026">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14027">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14028">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14028">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14066">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14066">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14067">Pencere öğesini arkaya taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14067">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14068">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14068">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14069">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14069">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14070">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesini üst öğe pencere öğelerinin Z düzeninde arka arkaya hareket ettirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14070">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14071">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14071">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14072">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14072">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14073">**return_widget_moved** Pencere öğesinin taşındığını belirten bayrak hedefi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14073">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14074">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi geri git</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14076">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14076">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14078">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) hiçbir değişiklik uygulanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14078">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14119">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14119">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14120">Dikdörtgen bir piksel bloğunu taşıyın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14120">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14121">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14121">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14122">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14123">Bu hizmet dikdörtgen bir piksel bloğunu taşıdıkça.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14123">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14124">Bu hizmet genellikle hızlı kaydırma uygulamak için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14124">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14125">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14125">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14126">**pencere öğesi** Blok taşıma isteyen pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14126">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14127">**blok** Taşınacak dikdörtgen sınırlayıcı bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14127">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14128">**xshift** X kaydırma miktarı piksel cinsinden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14128">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14129">**yılötele** Piksel cinsinden y kaydırma miktarı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14129">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14130">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14130">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14131">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi geri git</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14131">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14132">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) pencere öğesi tuvali bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14132">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14133">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14133">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14134">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14134">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14136">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14137">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14137">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14138">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14138">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14175">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14175">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14176">Pencere öğesi kenarlığını çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14176">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14177">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14178">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14179">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlığını çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14179">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14180">Bu hizmet normalde pencere öğesi çizim işlevinin bir parçası olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14180">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14181">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlık stili bayraklarını kenarlık, ince kenarlık, yükseltilmiş kenarlık, kenarlık veya kalın kenarlık çizmek için yorumlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14181">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14182">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14183">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14183">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14184">**border_color** Kenarlık rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14184">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14185">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14185">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14186">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14186">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14187">**upper_fill** Üst dolgu rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14187">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14188">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14188">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14189">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14189">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14190">**lower_fill** Alt dolgu rengi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14190">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14191">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14191">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14192">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14192">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14193">**fill** Bu boole bayrağı, pencere öğesi alanına sağlanan dolgu renkleriyle doldurulması gerekip gerek olmadığını gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14193">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14194">Bu değer GX_FALSE, yalnızca pencere öğesi kenarlığı çizilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14194">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14199">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14199">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14236">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14236">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14237">Pencere öğesi kenarlık stilini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14237">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14238">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14238">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14239">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14239">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14240">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi kenarlık stilini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14240">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14241">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14242">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14242">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14243">**style (stil)** Kenarlık stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14243">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14244">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14244">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14245">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi kenarlık stili kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14249">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14249">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14250">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14250">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14251">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14251">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14252">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14252">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14340">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14340">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14341">Pencere öğesi tuvali al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14341">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14342">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14343">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14344">Bu hizmet, bu pencere öğesinin üzerinde işlendiği tuvale bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14344">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14345">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14346">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14346">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14347">**return_canvas** Pencere öğesinin tuvali için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14347">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14348">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14348">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14349">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi tuvali al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14349">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14350">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) pencere öğesi tuvali bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14350">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14351">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14351">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14352">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14352">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14353">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14353">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14354">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14354">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14355">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14355">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14393">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14393">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14394">Pencere öğesi alt öğesini Algıla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14394">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14395">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14396">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14397">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin üst pencere öğesinin bir alt öğesi olup olmadığını algılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14397">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14398">Bu hizmet alt öğeleri aramak için önemlidir ve üst pencere öğesi alt pencere öğesinin bir üst öğesiyse TRUE değerini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14398">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14399">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14400">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14400">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14401">**alt öğe** Alt pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14401">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14402">**return_detect** Algılama için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14402">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14403">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi alt algılama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst öğe veya alt pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14407">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14408">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14408">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14409">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14409">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14446">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14446">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14447">Pencere öğesi alt öğeleri çiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14447">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14448">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14448">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14449">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14449">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14450">Bu hizmet üst pencere öğesinin tüm alt öğelerini çizer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14450">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14451">Bu hizmet, normalde tüm standart pencere öğesi çizim işlevleri tarafından çağrılır ve alt pencere öğelerinin özel ana pencere öğesi türüne eklenmesine izin vermek için herhangi bir özel çizim işlevi tarafından çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14451">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14452">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14453">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14453">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14454">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14454">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14455">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14455">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14456">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14456">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14457">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14457">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14458">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14458">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14495">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14495">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14496">Pencere öğesi istemci alanını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14496">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14497">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14497">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14498">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14498">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14499">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin istemci alanını genel pencere öğesi boyutundan pencere öğesi kenarlık genişliğini çıkararak hesaplar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14499">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14500">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14500">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14501">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14501">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14502">**border_width** Pencere öğesi kenarlığı genişliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14502">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14503">**return_client_area** İstemci alanı döndüren hedef</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14503">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14504">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14504">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14505">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi istemci alanı get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14505">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14507">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14507">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14508">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Pencere öğesi kenarlığı geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14508">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14509">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14509">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14510">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14510">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14511">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14511">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14548">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14548">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14549">Renk al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14549">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14550">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14550">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14551">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14551">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14552">Bu hizmet, sağlanan kaynak kimliğiyle ilişkili rengi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14552">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14553">Bu hizmet yalnızca görünür pencere öğeleri tarafından çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14553">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14554">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14554">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14555">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14555">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14556">**resource_id** Rengin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14556">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14557">**Ek B,** kaynak kimlikleri için önceden tanımlanmış renk içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14557">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14558">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14558">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14559">**return_color** Renk için hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14559">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14560">**Ek A** önceden tanımlanmış renkler içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14560">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14561">Uygulamanın özel renkler de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14561">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14562">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı renk get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14564">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14564">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14565">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Pencere öğesi tuvali geçerli değil veya pencere öğesi görünmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14565">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14566">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14566">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14567">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14567">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14568">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14568">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14569">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14569">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14570">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14570">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14574">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14574">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14575">Pencere öğesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14575">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14576">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14576">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14577">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14577">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14578">Bu hizmet bir pencere öğesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14578">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14579">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14579">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14580">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14580">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14581">**ad** Pencere öğesinin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14581">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14582">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14582">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14583">**Stil** Biçim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14583">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14584">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14584">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14585">**widget_id** Pencere öğesinin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14585">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14586">**Boyut** Pencere öğesinin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14586">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14587">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14587">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14588">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14588">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14591">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) pencere öğesi zaten oluşturuldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14591">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14592">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) geçersiz pencere öğesi denetimi blok boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14592">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14593">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) üst pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14593">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14594">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14595">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14596">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14596">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14633">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14633">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14634">Pencere öğesi oluşturulduysa test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14634">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14635">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14635">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14636">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14636">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14637">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesinin daha önce oluşturulup oluşturulmadığını belirlemede sınar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14637">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14638">Herhangi bir hatayla karşılaşılmadıysa, pencere öğesinin henüz oluşturulup oluşturulmadığına bakılmaksızın bu işlev GX_SUCCESS döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14638">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14639">Testin sonucu, test işaretçisinde return_test olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14639">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14640">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14641">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14641">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14642">**return_test** Test sonucu hedefi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14642">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14643">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı test tamamlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14646">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14647">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14648">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14648">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14685">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14685">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14686">Pencere öğesi silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14686">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14687">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14687">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14688">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14688">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14689">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14689">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14690">Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu dinamik olarak ayrılırsa, gx_system_memory_free serbest bırakıldığında depolama alanı için çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14690">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14691">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14691">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14692">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14692">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14693">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14693">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14694">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi silme GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14694">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14695">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14695">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14696">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14696">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14697">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Bellek boş işlevi tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14697">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14698">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14699">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14699">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14700">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14700">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_delete(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been deleted. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14739">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14739">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14740">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14740">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14741">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi üst öğesinden ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14741">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14742">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14743">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14743">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14744">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14744">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi ayırma GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Bu işlevin geçersiz çağıranı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14746">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14746">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14747">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14747">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14748">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14748">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14749">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14749">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14750">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14750">Example</span></span>
