## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14787">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14787">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14788">Çizim pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14788">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14789">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14790">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14791">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi çizmektedir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14791">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14792">Bu işlev normalde GUIX tuval yenileme mekanizması tarafından dahili olarak çağrılır, ancak özel çizim işlevlerinin uygulanmasına yardımcı olmak için uygulamaya açıktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14792">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14793">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14794">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14794">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14795">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14796">**Hiçbiri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14796">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14797">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14797">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14798">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14798">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14799">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14799">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>

```C
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14839">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14840">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi varsayılan çizim işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14840">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14841">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14841">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14844">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14844">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi çizim işlevi geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14850">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14850">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14851">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14851">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14889">Pencere öğesi olayı oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14889">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14890">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14890">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14891">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14892">Bu hizmet, belirli bir tür veya GX_EVENT sınıfı olan GX_SIGNAL bir olay türü oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14892">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14893">gx_widget_event_generate (), 16 bit pencere öğesi KIMLIĞINI, geçirilen event_type ile birlikte tek bir 32 bit GX_EVENT. gx_event_type değerine kodluyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14893">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14894">Değer parametresi, oluşturulan gx_event kodlandı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14894">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14895">gx_event_payload gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata alanı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14895">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14896">Oluşturulan event.gx_event_target alanı her zaman çağıran pencere öğesinin üst öğesi ile yüklenir, yani oluşturulan olay her zaman ilk olarak oluşturma pencere öğesinin üst öğesine gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14896">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14897">Gx_widget_event_generate yalnızca GX_SIGNAL Range olay türlerini göndermek için kullanılması gerektiğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14897">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14898">Kullanıcı tanımlı olay türleri dahil tüm diğer olay türleri için, Gux olay kuyruğuna gönderilen olayın her alanı üzerinde tam denetim veren gx_system_event_send () API 'sini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14898">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14899">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14899">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14900">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14900">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14901">**event_type** Olay türü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14901">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14902">**Ek E** , önceden tanımlanmış Gux olaylarını içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14902">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14903">Uygulama tarafından ek olaylar eklenebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14903">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14904">**değer** Ek olay bilgileri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14904">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14905">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi olay oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14910">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14910">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14911">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14911">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14912">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14912">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14951">İşlem pencere öğesi olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14951">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14952">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-14954">Bu, tüm pencere öğeleri için varsayılan olay işleme işlevidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14954">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14955">Özel bir olay işleme işlevi yazıldığında, herhangi bir olay türü için varsayılan eylem, her zaman Olayı bir pencere öğesinin temel aldığı pencere öğesi türüne iletmektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14955">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14956">En temel GX_WIDGET türüne dayalı pencere öğeleri varsayılan olay işleme işlevi olarak gx_widget_event_process kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14956">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14957">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14958">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14958">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14959">**event (olay)** İşlemeye olay işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14959">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14960">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi olay işleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14965">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14965">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-14967">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-14967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15005">Pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15005">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15006">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15008">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesi olay işleme işlevini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15008">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15009">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15010">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15010">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15011">**event_processing** Yeni olay işleme işlevinin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15011">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15012">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi olay işleme geçersiz kılma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15016">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15017">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15018">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15056">Pencere öğesi üst öğesine olay gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15056">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15057">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15057">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15058">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15058">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15059">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi üst öğesine bir olay gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15059">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15060">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15061">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15061">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15062">**event (olay)** Olayın işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15062">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15107">Pencere öğesi arka plan rengini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15107">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15108">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15108">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15109">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15109">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15110">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi arka plan renklerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15110">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15111">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15111">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15112">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15112">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15113">**normal_color_id** Normal durumda dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15113">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15114">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15114">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15115">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15115">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15116">**selected_color_id** Pencere öğesi odağında dolgu renginin kaynak kimliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15116">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15117">**Ek A önceden** tanımlanmış renk Kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15117">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15118">Uygulamanın özel renk Kaynak Kimlikleri de ekleyyana dikkat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15118">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15119">**disabled_color_id** Stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED ayarlanmamışsa, Fill Color kaynak KIMLIĞI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15119">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15120">**Ek A** , önceden tanımlanmış renk kaynak kimliklerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15120">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15121">Uygulamanın özel renk kaynak kimlikleri de ekleyebileceğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15121">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15122">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pencere öğesi dolgusu rengi başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15127">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15128">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15129">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15166">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15166">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15167">Üst pencere öğesinin alt pencere öğesini bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15167">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15169">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15170">Bu hizmet, istenen KIMLIK değeri ile bir pencere öğesi arayan belirtilen üst öğenin alt öğelerinde arama yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15170">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15171">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15171">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15172">**üst öğe** Aramanın başlatıldığı üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15172">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15173">**widget_id** Aranacak pencere öğesi KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15173">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15174">**search_depth** İşlevin alt pencere öğelerini arayacaktır özyinelemeli iç içe geçme düzeyini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15174">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15175">Bu değer <= 0 ise, yalnızca üst pencere öğesinin anlık alt öğeleri aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15175">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15176">Bu değer GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, tüm alt pencere öğelerinin tüm alt öğeleri, göreli olarak aranır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15176">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15177">0 > başka bir değer için bu değer, iç içe geçmiş bu işlevin, istenen pencere öğesi KIMLIĞI için alt pencere öğeleri arasında ne kadar arama yapılacağını sınırlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15177">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15178">**return_widget** Bulunan pencere öğesi için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15178">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15179">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) pencere öğesi kuruluş değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15184">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15184">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15185">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15185">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15186">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15186">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15224">İlk alt pencere öğesine İşaretçiyi döndür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15224">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15227">GUX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin yapılandırılmış bir listesini tutar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15227">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15228">Bu hizmet, üst öğenin ilk alt öğesi için bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15228">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15229">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15230">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15230">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15231">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisini iade etmek için işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15231">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15232">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15236">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15237">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15237">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15238">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15243">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15243">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15246">Gezinti sırasına göre odağı bir sonraki pencere öğesine taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15246">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15247">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15247">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15248">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15248">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15249">Bu hizmet odağı, odağı kabul eden pencere öğeleri listesinde bir sonraki küçük pencere öğesine taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15249">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15250">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15250">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15251">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15251">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15252">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15252">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15253">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odağı taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15253">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15254">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) odağı taşınmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15254">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15258">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15258">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15259">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15259">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15260">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15260">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15261">Ayrıca Bkz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15261">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15264">Odağı gezinti sırasında önceki pencere öğesine taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15264">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15265">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15265">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15266">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15266">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15267">Bu hizmet, odağı gezinti sırasında önceki pencere öğesine kaydırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15267">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15268">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15268">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15269">**pencere öğesi** Geçerli olan pencere öğesi işaretçisi giriş odağa sahip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15269">**widget** Pointer to widget that current has input focus.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15270">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15270">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15271">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odak taşındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15271">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15272">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) odak taşınmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15272">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15273">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15273">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to previuos widget in navigation order. */ status =

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the input focus has been moved to the
previous widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15279">Belirtilen kaynak KIMLIĞI için yazı tipi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15279">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15280">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15280">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15281">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15281">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15282">Bu hizmet, bu pencere öğesinin görünür olduğu ekran yazı tipi tablosundan belirtilen kaynak KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili yazı tipini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15282">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15283">Bu işlev yalnızca görünür bir pencere öğesi tarafından çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15283">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15284">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15285">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15285">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15286">**resource_id** Yazı tipinin kaynak KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15286">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15287">**return_font** Yazı tipi işaretçisi için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15287">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15288">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yazı tipi başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) GEÇERSIZ kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Pencere öğesi tuvali geçerli değil veya pencere öğesi görünmez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15294">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15295">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15296">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15300">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15300">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15301">Pencere öğesiyle ilişkili bellek serbest bırakma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15301">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15302">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15302">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15303">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15303">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15304">Bu hizmet, bir pencere öğesi denetim bloğu ile ilişkili belleği serbest bıraktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15304">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15305">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15306">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15306">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15307">**resource_id** Yazı tipi kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15307">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15308">**return_font** Yazı tipi işaretçisi için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15308">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15309">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15309">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15310">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarıyla serbest bırakıldı pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15310">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Boş bellek işlevi tanımlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15313">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15314">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15315">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15315">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15353">Pencere öğesi öne taşı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15353">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15354">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15356">Bu hizmet, alt pencere öğelerinin üst Z sırası listesinde pencere öğelerini öne taşır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15356">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15357">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15358">**pencere öğesi** Taşımak için pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15358">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15359">**return_moved** Pencere öğesi taşındığını gösteren hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15359">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15360">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi öne taşıma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) zaten ön pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15366">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15366">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15367">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15367">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15368">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15368">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15406">Pencere öğesi yüksekliğini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15406">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15407">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15409">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi yüksekliğini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15409">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15410">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15411">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15411">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15412">**return_height** Pencere öğesi yüksekliği için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15412">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15413">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi yüksekliği al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15418">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15418">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15419">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15419">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15420">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15420">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15459">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15461">Bu hizmet pencere öğesini gizler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15461">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15462">Bu pencere öğesi hala üst öğeye eklenmiş, ancak tuval üzerinde çizim yapılmasına izin verilmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15462">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15465">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15467">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15467">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15470">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15470">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15510">Son alt pencere öğesine İşaretçiyi döndür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15510">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15511">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15511">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15512">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15512">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15513">GUX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin yapılandırılmış bir listesini tutar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15513">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15514">Bu hizmet, üst öğenin son alt pencere öğesine bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15514">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15515">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15516">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15516">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15517">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi döndürme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15517">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15518">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15522">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15523">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15523">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15524">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15544">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15544">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15576">Pixelmap al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15576">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15577">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15577">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15578">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15578">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15579">Bu hizmet, sağlanan kaynak KIMLIĞIYLE ilişkili pixelmap 'i alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15579">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15580">Bu hizmet yalnızca görünür pencere öğeleri için çağrılmalı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15580">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15585">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı piksel haritası get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Geçersiz kaynak kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_previous_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15597">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15597">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-previous-sibling-of-the-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15598">Geçerli pencere öğesi önceki çifti işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15598">Return pointer to previous sibling of the current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15599">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15599">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15600">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15600">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15601">GUIX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin ağaç yapılandırılmış listesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15601">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15602">Bu hizmet, geçerli pencere öğesi önceki çifti için bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15602">This service returns a pointer to the previous sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15603">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15603">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15604">**geçerli** Geçerli pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15604">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15605">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisini iade etmek için işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15605">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15606">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15606">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndürüldü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15608">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15608">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15610">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15610">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15611">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15611">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15612">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15612">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve previous sibling widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_previous(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
          return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15619">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15619">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15620">Pencere öğesini yeniden boyutlandır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15620">Resize widget</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15622">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15623">Bu hizmet pencere öğesini yeniden boyutlandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15623">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15624">Pencere öğesi görünür durumdaysa otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınır ve yeniden çizim için sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15624">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15625">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15627">**new_size** Yeni pencere öğesi boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15627">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15628">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi yeniden boyutlandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15633">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15634">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15672">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15672">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15673">Kaydırma pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15673">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15674">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15675">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15676">Bu hizmet, pencere öğesini kaymalar ve isteğe bağlı olarak onu kirli olarak işaretler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15676">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15677">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15678">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15678">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15679">**x_shift** X ekseninde kaydırma için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15679">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15680">**y_shift** Y ekseninde kaydırmak için piksel sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15680">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15681">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE, aksi takdirde kirli olduğunu GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15681">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15682">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi kaydırma GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15686">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15686">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15687">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15687">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15688">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15688">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15725">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15725">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15726">Pencere öğesi göster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15726">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15727">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15728">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15729">Bu hizmet pencere öğesi gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15729">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15730">Pencere öğesi yalnızca üst öğeye eklenmişse ve üst pencere öğesi de görünürse görünür hale gelir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15730">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15731">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15731">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15732">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15732">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15733">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi gösterme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15738">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15739">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15739">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15740">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15777">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15777">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15778">Pencere öğesi durumu ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15778">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15779">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15780">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15781">Bu hizmet, durum bayraklarının herhangi bir bileşimini belirtilen pencere öğesine ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15781">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15782">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15783">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15784">**durum** Ekleme durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15784">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15785">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi durumu ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15789">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15790">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15791">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15791">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```
