## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15829">Pencere öğesi durumunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15829">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15832">Bu hizmet pencere öğesinden durum bayraklarını almaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15832">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15833">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15834">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15835">**return_status** Döndürülen durumun işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15835">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15836">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi durumu get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15840">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15841">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15842">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15842">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15878">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15878">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15879">Pencere öğesi durumunu kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15879">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15880">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15881">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15882">Bu hizmet, belirtilen durum bayraklarını pencere öğeleri iç durum değişkenlerinden kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15882">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15883">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15883">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15884">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15884">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15885">**durum** Kaldırılacak durum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15885">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15886">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15886">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15887">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durumu kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15887">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15888">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15888">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15889">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15889">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15890">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15891">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15892">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15930">Test pencere öğesi durumu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15930">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15931">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15931">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15932">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15932">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15933">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere öğesinin durum bayraklarını sınar ve sonucu "return_test" ile işaret edilen bellekte depolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15933">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15934">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15935">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15935">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15936">**durum** Sınanacak durum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15936">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15937">**return_status** Testin sonucu için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15937">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15938">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15938">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15939">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi durum testi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15939">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15942">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15943">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15943">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15944">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15944">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15954">Görünür bir pencere öğesi ve dize kimliğiyle ilişkili dizeyi alma (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15954">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15955">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15956">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15957">Bu hizmet, gx_widget_string_get_ext() kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15957">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15958">Bu hizmet, verilen dize kimliği değeri için dize tablosu girişini döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15958">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15959">Bu hizmet gx_display_string_get benzerdir, ancak etkin görüntü çağıranın geçirilene değil otomatik olarak belirlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15959">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15960">Bu hizmet yalnızca görünen pencere öğeleri için kullanılabilir, yani bu pencere öğesiyle ilişkili ekran bilinir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15960">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15961">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15962">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15962">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15963">**string_id** Kaynak üst bilgisinde yer alan dize kimliği değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15963">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15964">**string** Dizeyi iade etmek için değişkenin adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15964">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15965">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi durum testi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15969">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-15970">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15971">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15997">Pencere öğesi stili Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15997">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15998">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-15999">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-15999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16000">Bu hizmet pencere öğesine bir stil ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16000">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16001">Ayrıca, aşağıdaki eylemler alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16001">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16002">Eklenen stil GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16002">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16003">Eklenen stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16003">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16004">Pencere öğesi görünür durumdaysa otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınır ve yeniden çizim için sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16004">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16005">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16006">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16006">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16007">**Stil** Eklenecek yeni stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16007">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16008">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16008">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16009">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16010">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi stili ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16010">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16014">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16015">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16015">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16016">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16016">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16054">Pencere öğesi stilini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16054">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16055">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16056">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16057">Bu hizmet pencere öğesinden stil bayrağını almaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16057">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16058">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16059">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16059">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16060">**return_style** Döndürülen stilin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16060">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16061">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pencere öğesi stili başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16066">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16066">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16067">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16067">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16068">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16068">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16106">Pencere öğesi stilini kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16106">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16107">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16107">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16108">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16109">Bu hizmet pencere öğesinden bir stili kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16109">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16110">Ayrıca, aşağıdaki eylemler alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16110">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16111">Kaldırılan stil GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16111">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16112">Kaldırılan stil GX_STYLE_ENABLED, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16112">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16113">Pencere öğesi görünür durumda ise, otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınmış ve yeniden çizim için kuyruğa alındı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16113">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16114">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16114">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16115">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16115">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16116">**style (stil)** Kaldır için stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16116">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16117">**Ek D,** tüm pencere öğeleri için önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerin yanı sıra pencere öğelerine özgü stilleri içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16117">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16118">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi stili kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16123">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16124">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16125">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16163">Pencere öğesi stilini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16163">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16164">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16164">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16165">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16165">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16166">Bu hizmet pencere öğesine bir stil ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16166">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16167">Küme stili GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT içeriyorsa, durum GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT eklenir, aksi takdirde durum kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16167">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16168">Küme stili GX_STYLE_ENABLED içeriyorsa, durum GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE eklenir, aksi takdirde durum kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16168">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16169">Pencere öğesi görünür durumdaysa otomatik olarak geçersiz kılınır ve yeniden çizim için sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16169">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16170">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16171">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16171">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16172">**Stil** Ayarlanacak stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16172">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16173">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16173">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16174">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16174">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16175">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere öğesi stil kümesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16175">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16179">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16179">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16180">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16180">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16181">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16181">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16218">gx_widget_text_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16218">gx_widget_text_blend</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16219">Pencere öğesine atanan metin Blend (kullanım dışı)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16219">Blend text assigned to widget (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16220">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16220">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CHAR *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset, 
    UCHAR alpha)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16221">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16221">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16222">Bu hizmet gx_widget_text_blend_ext () kullanımı için kullanım dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16222">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16223">Bu hizmet, geçerli fırça ve metin hizalamasını kullanarak belirtilen metni bir pencere öğesi üzerinde karıştırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16223">This service blends the specified text over a widget using current brush and text alignment.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16224">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16225">**pencere öğesi** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16225">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16226">**TColor** Metin rengi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16226">**tColor** Text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16227">**font_id** Yazı tipi kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16227">**font_id** Font Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16228">**dize** Çizim dizesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16228">**string** Drawing string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16229">**x_offset** Çizim konumu ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16229">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16230">**y_offset** Çizim konumu ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16230">**y_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16231">**Alfa** Değer karıştırma 0-255</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16231">**alpha** Blending value 0-255</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16232">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere öğesi genişliği get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16332">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16332">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16333">GUX, üst ve alt pencere öğelerinin yapılandırılmış bir listesini tutar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16333">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16334">Bu hizmet, geçerli pencere öğesinin en üstteki görünür alt öğesine bir işaretçi döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16334">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16335">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16336">**geçerli** Geçerli pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16336">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16337">**widget_return** Pencere öğesi işaretçisi döndürme işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16337">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16338">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) işaretçisi döndü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) geçersiz pencere öğesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16342">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16343">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16344">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16353">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16353">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET **return_widget)
```

```C

/* Find horizontal scrollbar under “parent_widget”. */

                GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL_BAR, &retrieved_widget);

```

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(

    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16576">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16576">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16577">Pencere oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16577">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16578">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16578">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16579">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16579">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16580">Bu hizmet bir pencere oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16580">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16581">GX_WINDOW GX_WIDGET türetilir ve tüm gx_widget API hizmetlerini destekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16581">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16582">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16582">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16583">**pencere** Pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16583">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16584">**ad** Pencerenin mantıksal adı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16584">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16585">**üst öğe** Üst pencere öğesi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16585">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16586">**Stil** Pencere stili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16586">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16587">**Ek D** , tüm pencere öğelerinin yanı sıra pencere öğesine özgü stillerin önceden tanımlanmış genel stillerini içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16587">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16588">**window_id** Pencerenin uygulama tanımlı KIMLIĞI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16588">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16589">**Boyut** Pencerenin boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16589">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16590">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu işlevin çağıranı geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Pencere Öğesi zaten oluşturulmuş</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Geçersiz pencere öğesi denetim bloğu boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16599">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16599">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16657">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16657">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16658">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16674">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16674">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16675">Bir pencereyi önemli bir şekilde yürütür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16675">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16677">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16678">Bu hizmet, bir pencereyi önemli ölçüde yürütür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16678">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16679">Pencere istemci alanının dışında herhangi bir kullanıcı girişi (Pen olayları, vb.) yok sayılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16679">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16680">Bu işlevin sürekli engelleyici bir yürütme döngüsü girdiğini ve model yürütme sonlanana kadar çağırana dönmediğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16680">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16681">Alınan herhangi bir olay için olay işleme sıfır olmayan bir durum değeri döndürdüğünde veya gx_window_close API işlevi çağrıldığında kalıcı yürütme sonlandırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16681">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16682">Sıfır olmayan olay işleme dönüş kodu, bu API 'ye geçirilen return_ptr aracılığıyla çağırana döndürülür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16682">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16683">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16684">**pencere** Pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16684">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16685">**return_ptr** Kalıcı yürütme çıkış durumunun kaydedileceği konum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16685">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16686">GX_NULL olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16686">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16687">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yürütme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR (0x05)** Olay kuyruğundan alma olayı başarısız oldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16693">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16693">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_root_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16762">gx_window_root_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16762">gx_window_root_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16763">Kök pencere için işlem olayı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16763">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16764">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16765">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16765">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16766">Bu hizmet belirtilen kök pencere için olayları işler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16766">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16767">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16768">**root_window** Kök pencere denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16768">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16769">**olay** İşlenecek olaya yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16769">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16770">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kök pencere olayı başarıyla işlendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16774">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16775">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16776">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16792">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16792">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16793">Kök pencereyi bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16793">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16794">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16794">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16795">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16795">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16796">Bu hizmet belirtilen pencere öğesi için kök pencereyi bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16796">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16797">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16797">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16799">**return_root_window** Bulunan kök pencere için hedefin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16799">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16800">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16800">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16802">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Kök pencere yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16802">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16805">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16805">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16824">Pencere kaydırma bilgisini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16824">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16825">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16825">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16826">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16826">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16827">Bu hizmet pencere kaydırma bilgilerini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16827">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16828">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16829">**pencere** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16829">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16830">**Stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL veya GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16830">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16831">**return_scroll_info** Kaydırma bilgisi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16831">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16832">Ana pencere, üst pencere kaydırma çubuğunu, görüntülenebilir alanı ve kaydırma artışını ve sınırlarını bilgilendirmek için bu yapıyı başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16832">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16833">Varsayılan uygulama, Windows istemci alanını görüntülenebilir alan olarak kullanır ve piksellere göre kayar, ancak özelleştirilmiş pencere uygulama, kaydırma parametrelerini kullanabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16833">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16834">**Ek ı** GX_SCROLL_INFO yapısının tanımını içerir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16834">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16835">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı pencere kaydır bilgi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) geçersiz tür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16840">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16841">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16842">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16842">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16859">Pencere kaydırma çubuğunu bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16859">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16860">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16861">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16862">Bu hizmet belirtilen pencere için kaydırma çubuğunu bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16862">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16863">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16863">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16864">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16864">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16865">**tür** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL veya GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16865">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16866">**return_scrollbar** Kaydırma çubuğu için hedefe işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16866">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16867">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16867">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16868">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Başarılı pencere kaydırma çubuğu bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16868">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) kaydırma çubuğu bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) geçersiz tür</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16873">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16874">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16874">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16875">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scrollbar_find(&my_window,
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16893">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16895">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere için duvar kağıdını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16895">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16896">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16897">**window (pencere)** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16897">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16901">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16901">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16902">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pencere Öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16902">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16903">İzin Verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16903">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16923">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16923">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16924">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16924">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="933fc-16925">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pencere için duvar kağıdını ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16925">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16926">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16927">**pencere** Pencere işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16927">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16930">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) bu Işlev için geçersiz çağıran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="933fc-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) pencere öğesi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16935">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16935">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="933fc-16937">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="933fc-16937">Example</span></span>

```C

                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

```
